prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: NA
review: This system is awesome.  The pulleys are smoother than any cable machines at my gym.  The handles, rope, and bar are the same quality as my gym if not better.  At first I was attaching the pulleys to my pull-up bar, but then I picked up some lag type eye bolts and strategically placed them in some studs in the wall and ceiling of my garage and now I have so many configurations I can do almost any workout my gym offers but from home.I didn't own any plates at first, but I purchased an ankle strap with a plan in mind- I have a set of adjustable dumbbells so I was hoisting one of them up and down for a couple days until my plates arrived.I recommend the CAP rubber bumper plates, I purchased 100 pounds in various weights for $75 and I'm getting more.I'm about to purchase the SERTT lat bar and a v-bar to round out this system, maybe even a couple more pulleys so I can leave them all in place.You have to be creative but you can set these pulleys up in so many different ways.  If you own this system, a set of adjustable dumbbells, and a bench you can do a complete workout from home.  Very happy with the quality and value of this purchase and if you are considering buying something like this I highly recommend it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 31 January 2024

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Great product amazing value
review: After doing quite a bit of research I settled on this product to upgrade my home gym without breaking the bank. I’ve used all of the attachments and different pulley setups and couldn’t be happier. Everything is well made and the price can’t be beat for two pulleys. I’ve seen similar systems for double the cost and can’t imagine them operating any differently. I’ve separately purchased some ankle cuffs for leg workouts and extra carabiners to make things a breeze when changing configurations/attachments.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 August 2023

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Bin sehr zufrieden
review: Das SERTT Gewicht Seilzugsystem Gym ist ein großartiges Fitnessgerät für alle, die zu Hause trainieren möchten. Ich habe es auch ausprobiert und muss sagen, dass ich von der Qualität und Vielseitigkeit des Systems beeindruckt bin.Obwohl ich nicht alle Teile des Systems benutze, die mitgeliefert wurden, sind die Teile, die ich benutze, von höchster Qualität und erfüllen meine Bedürfnisse perfekt. Das Seilzugsystem ermöglicht es mir, verschiedene Muskelgruppen zu trainieren und zu stärken, indem ich eine Vielzahl von Übungen ausführe. Das System ist einfach zu installieren und zu bedienen, was es zu einer großartigen Option für Menschen macht, die neu im Bereich der Fitness sind oder einfach zu Hause trainieren möchten.Ein weiterer Vorteil des SERTT Gewicht Seilzugsystems ist seine Robustheit und Haltbarkeit. Das System ist gut gebaut und die Materialien sind von hoher Qualität, was mir das Vertrauen gibt, dass es lange halten wird.Insgesamt bin ich sehr zufrieden mit dem SERTT Gewicht Seilzugsystem Gym. Es ist ein großartiges Fitnessgerät für zu Hause und ich würde es jedem empfehlen, der nach einer einfachen, erschwinglichen und vielseitigen Möglichkeit sucht, um in seinem eigenen Zuhause zu trainieren. Obwohl ich nicht alle Teile des Systems verwende, die mitgeliefert wurden, kann ich sagen, dass die Teile, die ich verwende, absolut top sind und meine Bedürfnisse perfekt erfüllen.

review: Llegó todo muy bien empaquetado, en una buena caja y con todos los accesorios metidos en sus respectivas bolsitas, muy bien protegidos. La calidad de las distintas partes es muy buena. Las poleas son muy silenciosas y se ven resistentes. Los mosquetones son bastante robustos, no como los de productos similares, más pequeños y endebles. Los demás accesorios se ven estupendos también. La bolsa de tela que trae está muy bien también. Muy contento con el producto en definitiva, no esperaba tanto la verdad. Gracias.

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Wish I ordered this YEARS ago!
review: I wish I had ordered this for my home gym years ago! The overall quality of this is fantastic. I was really surprised. Doesn't feel cheap at all. And set up is super easy. I simply hook it up to my pull up bar in the door frame. Takes about 20 seconds. Pile the weights on and go. I'm using standard plates and the loading pin measures about 13" tall. Plenty of room to stack a decent amount of weight on.For the last several years I've been using barbells and dumbbells. Basic stuff. But wow, it's so nice to have access to such a wide range of new exercises now!The only exercises that don't quite feel right are the cable flyes (when the pulleys are attached to a pull up bar) and bicep curls.With cable flyes in a gym, the pulleys are directly at your sides, which creates a constant tension on your chest muscles no matter where your arms are in the range of motion. When this set up is attached to your pull up bar at home, you have to step forward which moves the pulleys are behind you. So once your arms are pointed straight out in front of you, the tension is taken off your chest muscles and placed directly onto your shoulders and triceps. So at best you get the same stimulation you'd get from a dumbbell chest fly with the same limitations of that movement.For bicep curls, it just doesn't feel right when the loading pin is attached to the pulley and allowed to glide freely on the cable (like they show in the pictures). So an easy fix for this is to simply not use the cables. Load up the loading pin with your weights, attach the rope or straight bar to it, and do your curls that way. No cable needed. You get a lot more tension on your biceps that way than if you try to let the pulley glide freely on the cable.Otherwise, all of the tricep, shoulder, back and ab movements feel FANTASTIC with this set up. SERTT offers two different options for this set. One is a little cheaper and comes with fewer attachments and cables. I highly encourage you to spend the extra $10 on this one for the extra cables, attachments, and pulley. I'm constantly discovering new exercises to do and I wouldn't be able to do them without the extra equipment that comes with this $65 option.Highly, highly recommend this!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 December 2021

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Perfetto
review: Set completo per fare molti esercizi , acquisto azzeccato !

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Cantidad de ejercicios
review: Cantidad de ejercicios que puedo hacer ahora con esto

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Pas mal mais pas très stable
review: Il est pas mal mais manque de stabilité lorsque que on levé le plateau de disque de poids si on va a vitesse normale a explosif le plateau se balance car il manque un point d'ancrage au sol pour évité ce balancement dangereux.Il manque au minimum deux autres poulie, deux a 4 attaches supplémentaires pour bien stabiliser et faire les exercices avec deux poignets différent,la longueur des câbles et limite il faudrait aussi le fixe sur une cage a traction qui tient la stabilité sinon tout se renverse .Intéressant comme base ,les poignet leur grip et faible pour la prise en main matériel de base a amélioré ou pour du dépannage .

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Impressed
review: Pleasantly surprised by the quality of this item. I bought this as a starting point and expected to upgrade some of the components over time. But there’s no need, everything is very well made and heavy duty. The pulleys are really smooth and work perfectly (I’ve had 50kg on them), and the tricep rope is the same as the ones in my local gym. Good purchase.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 May 2023

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Yes, you can do lower body exercises!
review: I was told that you couldn't do lower body exercises with this system but as I have a power rack I bought an upgraded pulley from Amazon that bolts onto my cage and I put it on the side of my rack. Then I attached one of the straps from this set onto the bottom of the opposite of my rack. Voila. I can do glute kickbacks, side leg extensions for inner thighs and ham curls with weights which I could only do with bands before. I will be checking out to see what I can figure out for quads. The other straps I attached to the top back and front of my rack for when I want to do upper body stuff. The chains and extra pulley's are great.

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Esta bien
review: Cumple su cometido aunque las cadenas podrían mejorar y poner algún agarre más

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Qualità inaspettata
review: Carrucole robuste, buona qualità dei materiali, ben confezionati. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo. Aggiornerò tra qualche mese di utilizzo la recensione.

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Fantastic piece of kit at a great price

date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 October 2023

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Gym/On the go
review: I bought this product a couple months back, mainly to use at my work during free time. It feels sturdy, with no problems, lifting moderately heavy weight.The BEST part about these cables though, is taking them when I have to travel to oil rig sights. There’s always have something to set up on, heck even TREES, just to keep my workout going! Out of all the accessories my favorite is the rope handle. Super versatile and sturdy. I highly recommend this product to anybody!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 November 2023

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: A set to invest
review: If you have something at home to attach the rols to I would recomend on investing in it.But I would also get an extra or two hooks to connect everything if you want to be more creative with it.It holds together quite good and is easy to edit, if you dont need to change cable length all the time.You should find a setting where the cables do not need to be shortend, but extending is done easily via chains.Would buy again.

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Best bang for buck
review: I got this with a little bit of skepticism, however I absolutely love it! It was a good price for the versatility of this item! It’s so easy to set up and rearrange for different exercises, the options are limitless!

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Very Smooth!
review: I’ve wanted a proper cable machine for years but couldn’t justify the massive cost. I have a pull down attachment to my power rack and this has worked but is very rigid with the cable direction and not very smooth.This pulley system is very smooth, much smoother than my Lat pull down attachment.I’ve on out done a push workout so far, but I’ve managed to do various tricep movements, cable flies and lateral raises and all felt great.I highly recommend this product for any home gym user but you will definitely need either a power rack or pull up bar to attach to.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 May 2023

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Un bel set da Home Gym
review: Un bel set per molte combinazioni di esercizi, il tutto da agganciare ad una Power tower.Lo consiglio perché prendendo separatamente tutti i componenti sarebbe costato più del doppio.Il contenuto della confezione rispecchia la descrizione nei minimi dettagli.Lo consiglio per chi deve attrezzare una piccola palestra in casa.

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Great bit of kit.
review: I love this set. Really good quality components that feel like they’ll last. I use it connected in various ways to my “power-tower” / pull up station and the possible combinations of connections for different exercises is really impressive. For about £60 I’ve been able to add another 10 - 15 different weighted exercises to my home gym set up. I’m considering adding some wall and ceiling anchors to really optimise how I can use it now.

title: Producto impecable
review: Llegó todo muy bien empaquetado, en una buena caja y con todos los accesorios metidos en sus respectivas bolsitas, muy bien protegidos. La calidad de las distintas partes es muy buena. Las poleas son muy silenciosas y se ven resistentes. Los mosquetones son bastante robustos, no como los de productos similares, más pequeños y endebles. Los demás accesorios se ven estupendos también. La bolsa de tela que trae está muy bien también. Muy contento con el producto en definitiva, no esperaba tanto la verdad. Gracias.

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Wish I ordered this YEARS ago!
review: I wish I had ordered this for my home gym years ago! The overall quality of this is fantastic. I was really surprised. Doesn't feel cheap at all. And set up is super easy. I simply hook it up to my pull up bar in the door frame. Takes about 20 seconds. Pile the weights on and go. I'm using standard plates and the loading pin measures about 13" tall. Plenty of room to stack a decent amount of weight on.For the last several years I've been using barbells and dumbbells. Basic stuff. But wow, it's so nice to have access to such a wide range of new exercises now!The only exercises that don't quite feel right are the cable flyes (when the pulleys are attached to a pull up bar) and bicep curls.With cable flyes in a gym, the pulleys are directly at your sides, which creates a constant tension on your chest muscles no matter where your arms are in the range of motion. When this set up is attached to your pull up bar at home, you have to step forward which moves the pulleys are behind you. So once your arms are pointed straight out in front of you, the tension is taken off your chest muscles and placed directly onto your shoulders and triceps. So at best you get the same stimulation you'd get from a dumbbell chest fly with the same limitations of that movement.For bicep curls, it just doesn't feel right when the loading pin is attached to the pulley and allowed to glide freely on the cable (like they show in the pictures). So an easy fix for this is to simply not use the cables. Load up the loading pin with your weights, attach the rope or straight bar to it, and do your curls that way. No cable needed. You get a lot more tension on your biceps that way than if you try to let the pulley glide freely on the cable.Otherwise, all of the tricep, shoulder, back and ab movements feel FANTASTIC with this set up. SERTT offers two different options for this set. One is a little cheaper and comes with fewer attachments and cables. I highly encourage you to spend the extra $10 on this one for the extra cables, attachments, and pulley. I'm constantly discovering new exercises to do and I wouldn't be able to do them without the extra equipment that comes with this $65 option.Highly, highly recommend this!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 December 2021

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Pas mal mais pas très stable
review: Il est pas mal mais manque de stabilité lorsque que on levé le plateau de disque de poids si on va a vitesse normale a explosif le plateau se balance car il manque un point d'ancrage au sol pour évité ce balancement dangereux.Il manque au minimum deux autres poulie, deux a 4 attaches supplémentaires pour bien stabiliser et faire les exercices avec deux poignets différent,la longueur des câbles et limite il faudrait aussi le fixe sur une cage a traction qui tient la stabilité sinon tout se renverse .Intéressant comme base ,les poignet leur grip et faible pour la prise en main matériel de base a amélioré ou pour du dépannage .

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Impressed
review: Pleasantly surprised by the quality of this item. I bought this as a starting point and expected to upgrade some of the components over time. But there’s no need, everything is very well made and heavy duty. The pulleys are really smooth and work perfectly (I’ve had 50kg on them), and the tricep rope is the same as the ones in my local gym. Good purchase.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 May 2023

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Yes, you can do lower body exercises!
review: I was told that you couldn't do lower body exercises with this system but as I have a power rack I bought an upgraded pulley from Amazon that bolts onto my cage and I put it on the side of my rack. Then I attached one of the straps from this set onto the bottom of the opposite of my rack. Voila. I can do glute kickbacks, side leg extensions for inner thighs and ham curls with weights which I could only do with bands before. I will be checking out to see what I can figure out for quads. The other straps I attached to the top back and front of my rack for when I want to do upper body stuff. The chains and extra pulley's are great.

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Gym/On the go
review: I bought this product a couple months back, mainly to use at my work during free time. It feels sturdy, with no problems, lifting moderately heavy weight.The BEST part about these cables though, is taking them when I have to travel to oil rig sights. There’s always have something to set up on, heck even TREES, just to keep my workout going! Out of all the accessories my favorite is the rope handle. Super versatile and sturdy. I highly recommend this product to anybody!

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: A set to invest
review: If you have something at home to attach the rols to I would recomend on investing in it.But I would also get an extra or two hooks to connect everything if you want to be more creative with it.It holds together quite good and is easy to edit, if you dont need to change cable length all the time.You should find a setting where the cables do not need to be shortend, but extending is done easily via chains.Would buy again.

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Best bang for buck
review: I got this with a little bit of skepticism, however I absolutely love it! It was a good price for the versatility of this item! It’s so easy to set up and rearrange for different exercises, the options are limitless!

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Very Smooth!
review: I’ve wanted a proper cable machine for years but couldn’t justify the massive cost. I have a pull down attachment to my power rack and this has worked but is very rigid with the cable direction and not very smooth.This pulley system is very smooth, much smoother than my Lat pull down attachment.I’ve on out done a push workout so far, but I’ve managed to do various tricep movements, cable flies and lateral raises and all felt great.I highly recommend this product for any home gym user but you will definitely need either a power rack or pull up bar to attach to.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 May 2023

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: NA
review: This system is awesome.  The pulleys are smoother than any cable machines at my gym.  The handles, rope, and bar are the same quality as my gym if not better.  At first I was attaching the pulleys to my pull-up bar, but then I picked up some lag type eye bolts and strategically placed them in some studs in the wall and ceiling of my garage and now I have so many configurations I can do almost any workout my gym offers but from home.I didn't own any plates at first, but I purchased an ankle strap with a plan in mind- I have a set of adjustable dumbbells so I was hoisting one of them up and down for a couple days until my plates arrived.I recommend the CAP rubber bumper plates, I purchased 100 pounds in various weights for $75 and I'm getting more.I'm about to purchase the SERTT lat bar and a v-bar to round out this system, maybe even a couple more pulleys so I can leave them all in place.You have to be creative but you can set these pulleys up in so many different ways.  If you own this system, a set of adjustable dumbbells, and a bench you can do a complete workout from home.  Very happy with the quality and value of this purchase and if you are considering buying something like this I highly recommend it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 31 January 2024

prod_name: HSERTT Weight Cable Pulley System Gym
title: Bin sehr zufrieden
review: Das SERTT Gewicht Seilzugsystem Gym ist ein großartiges Fitnessgerät für alle, die zu Hause trainieren möchten. Ich habe es auch ausprobiert und muss sagen, dass ich von der Qualität und Vielseitigkeit des Systems beeindruckt bin.Obwohl ich nicht alle Teile des Systems benutze, die mitgeliefert wurden, sind die Teile, die ich benutze, von höchster Qualität und erfüllen meine Bedürfnisse perfekt. Das Seilzugsystem ermöglicht es mir, verschiedene Muskelgruppen zu trainieren und zu stärken, indem ich eine Vielzahl von Übungen ausführe. Das System ist einfach zu installieren und zu bedienen, was es zu einer großartigen Option für Menschen macht, die neu im Bereich der Fitness sind oder einfach zu Hause trainieren möchten.Ein weiterer Vorteil des SERTT Gewicht Seilzugsystems ist seine Robustheit und Haltbarkeit. Das System ist gut gebaut und die Materialien sind von hoher Qualität, was mir das Vertrauen gibt, dass es lange halten wird.Insgesamt bin ich sehr zufrieden mit dem SERTT Gewicht Seilzugsystem Gym. Es ist ein großartiges Fitnessgerät für zu Hause und ich würde es jedem empfehlen, der nach einer einfachen, erschwinglichen und vielseitigen Möglichkeit sucht, um in seinem eigenen Zuhause zu trainieren. Obwohl ich nicht alle Teile des Systems verwende, die mitgeliefert wurden, kann ich sagen, dass die Teile, die ich verwende, absolut top sind und meine Bedürfnisse perfekt erfüllen.

title: Very Smooth!

I have a pull down attachment to my power rack and this has worked but is very rigid with the cable direction and not very smooth.This pulley system is very smooth, much smoother than my Lat pull down attachment.I’ve on out done a push workout so far, but I’ve managed to do various tricep movements, cable flies and lateral raises and all felt great.I highly recommend this product for any home gym user but you will definitely need either a power rack or pull up bar to attach to.

prod_name: Fat Gripz Pro
title: NA
review: I bought the Fat Gripz Pro and the Fat Gripz Extreme. I will review both here, because they had pretty surprising use cases for me.An important thing to note is that I have quite large hands, not freakish, but 24 cm from pinky to thumb, and about 19 cm from middle finger tip to wrist. This latter number is important because my hands will comfortably wrap around the Fat Gripz Pro with my fingers and thumbs just touching and honestly I find they can make certain lifts, like bench press (I know this is not their intended use), MORE comfortable. But, for when I want to be uncomfortable, I use the Extremes.I remember agonizing over if I should buy the Extremes as well as the Pros given a lot of reviews, by much bigger and stronger folks than me, said the Extremes were pretty hardcore and you should start with the Pros and work your way up. I am very enthusiastic about improving my grip, in part because I have ulnar nerve damage in both my arms which has weakened my grip (for reference, my grip fails around ~150kg deadlift), so I figured I'd buy both and work my way up to the Extremes. In reality, I felt pretty comfortable with the Extremes straight away and they're exclusively what I use for grip/forearm training, while the Pros I use for warm ups, grip "drop sets", or for push exercises where I want something comfortable in my palm.The only negative thing I have to say about both the Pros and the Extremes is that I wish they were longer (wider?) as they are about the same width as my palm, so I have to be quite precise with where I place them.TL;DR: if you have big hands and are tossing up between the Extremes and the Pros, don't be discouraged by people telling you not to get the Extremes straight away. They're slightly smaller than a tin can, so if the idea of curling a 20kg can of baked beans is okay to you then I'd say just go for it.

prod_name: METEOR Olympic Barbell
title: NA
review: Ordered when on Prime Day sale for $83. Shipping was super quick. The product however was not up to standard.1. Looked like a prior return, zip lock on the tube ends packaging had been cut already, tape was used to resecure the tube, plastic was broken in multiple spots.2. Multiple scrapes and dings in the bar itself, along with the rubber decal being deformed3. Both bar ends had significant rattle/movement. During the return process communication with the seller was good, however they insisted that the bar was new and the rattle was normal. I have another barbell (7ft olympic) and have since purchased another EZ Barbell from another company, both have little to no rattle, and smooth bearing movement of the sleeves.

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Fantástica relación calidad precio
review: The Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station has become an indispensable part of my home gym, and it's transformed the way I work on my upper body strength and endurance. This heavy-duty dip bar is designed for tricep dips and more, and it's proven to be a solid addition to my fitness routine.The build quality is impressive, with a sturdy frame that supports my weight without any wobbling or instability. The safety connector adds an extra layer of security, giving me peace of mind during intense workouts.The dip station is versatile, allowing me to perform a range of exercises that target my triceps, chest, shoulders, and more. It's like having a mini gym at home, which is incredibly convenient.The Prosource Fit Dip Stand is easy to assemble, and it doesn't take up much space in my home gym area. I appreciate the attention to detail in the design, such as the foam grips for added comfort during workouts.If you're serious about your fitness and looking to level up your upper body strength training, the Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station is a must-have. It's a durable and versatile piece of equipment that helps you work towards your fitness goals efficiently and safely.

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Very well made and sturdy - great
review: The Prosource Fit Dip Station is quite alright however the connector does not really work properly, i.e. the screws to fit the connector do not properly screw in.  However the bars work well because they are sufficient weight not to move around when performing moves.  I think Prosource could go back to the drawing board and re-design.

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: IMPRESSIVE !!!!! ---> Update: Impacts my whole regimes Significant improvements !!
review: Muy buen grosor para agarre.Fácil montaje.Bien empaquetadoBastante estable para una ok indinidad de ejercicios.

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Could have been better
review: Really well made, very sturdy, very easy to assemble - great

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Awesome
review: Update: Very easy to clean before use, very well made, and engineered.  In the week or so I have had these still starting slow - all my systems fire up - thank you !!!!I have not even assembled it yet and exceed expectations !!!! knock on wood !!!! :)It is heavy enough that the box stands upright and the pieces are very solid and heavy.  Measuring the adjustable widths seems perfect !!!!!!  NO chests/shoulders/backs are the same and it seems there is just 1 standard width they allow you to own.I have to wash all parts proper for the manufacturing processes toxins as with any and all new bought.  smart easy and cares :)Thank yo so much something tells me this will be the best ever in rehab and inter-muscular movements a long ways down the the roads !!Will up date

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Calidad y muy buen precio
review: I wanted to have more home equipment for exercising. I ordered dips bar which somehow took almost one month to arrive. I would say worst shipping experience I ever had. Except that when the parcel arrived the box was damaged as you can see from the picture (I still kept it because I wanted the product and could not wait another month to get the replacement). unfortunately not only box but the product was also partially damaged. you can see few pictures of defects which it had.Positive side is that it is really easy to assemble and feels like it can handle the weight. I am around 85 kg and used the bar few times already and had no issues so far.If you are lucky and get proper shipping then it worth the money.

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: overall pretty good
review: If I'd had this dip station as a kid, I wouldn't have broken my arm from enthusiastically swinging between the backs of the dining room chairs and the back of the couch like a tiny hyperactive monkey after school.Needless to say I'm an adult now (kind of) and learned my lesson well about the questionable stability of dining chairs for the sake of acrobatics back then.I bought the "Lite" Dipping Station version. Despite the listed weight capacity of up to 400lbs, I wasn't sure if this would be sturdy enough to handle my heavy body weight so I really hestitated between this one and other ones, but I've had it for about 3 months now; it's still trucking same as it did on day one.This is a good one. It doesn't adjust up/down like some stations, but instead is basically two heavy duty bars connected to the bottom parts. I think that's what makes it so solid. It's very few pieces, and a lot of good heavy soldering where they connect. I'm glad I got this one instead of the kind that might "adjust down" on me unexpectedly while I'm using it. It's weird that an item named "lite" seems better to me than one named "pro"..? but... whatever. They're completely different styles and this one's a way better design for what I wanted and was looking for. Nice and solid, no up and down adjustables relying on little pins. Just solid.The dipping bars were pretty easy to put together and came with the only tool it needed (for putting in the screws.) It was easier than putting together a metal bedframe; it took maybe 5 minutes including reading the directions; you just have to pay attention to where the holes are on the lower part (like where the connecting bar goes. between the two) Otherwise it'll take an extra minute as you flip it.The connecting bar keeps the two dipping bars from skidding on smooth flooring, so I'd recommend putting it on, especially if you're a heavier weight, even though it's not necessarily needed. It keeps the bars together so you don't have to worry about it sliding.The cushion "handles" on the station are actually comfortable. No weird smell or any "stickiness" from them although it's gotten hot this summer. I didn't know at first if I'd like them, but they're good, and so far have been very durable.Getting it has made it SO much easier for me to do a little exercise more frequently without the exhaustion of setting up anything or planning to exercise, or the pressure of doing it for a set period of time. Once it's put togther, there's nothing to adjust, prep, or set up. It's just there: you can do it as you walk from your room to whereever or back, or not, and it takes literally no extra mental or physical effort or good intentions or planning. You either do or you don't, because it's right there and on the way. Stick it in front of a doorway and it's great. It's accessible. You don't have to take it out or put it away. And it barely takes any space. (Unlike my slant bench... that doesn't quite fit the room when set up... that I have to pull out to even use, and takes up a bunch of horizontal real estate I could use.)There are some things that when you buy them, they help you with your life, and this has been one of them, so thanks, company. You did a good job, and it's appreciated. I needed it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 25 July 2021

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Good set of bars
review: This is a good and affordable set of parallel bars. They are slightly wobbly and off-angle with the connection bar but with enough weight, it barely matters. They're very adjustable and it was a breeze to install. The only thing that's weird was when I opened the package there was this strange brown dust/dirt/substance that fell out of the package and off of the pieces themselves. It had a weird smell and I accidentally got a tiny bit on my lip when I went to scratch my nose and my lip was tingling for a bit (I had no idea I'd gotten whatever this was on my fingers until I saw brown fingerprints on the instructions booklet). Regardless, it's a good item, I'm happy with my purchase.

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Excelente calidad en los materiales
review: Viene en una caja compacta y pesa como unos 5 kilos. Me sorprendí al momento de ver los materiales, son muy buenos y la pintura es excelente. El instructivo solo dice qué viene dentro de la caja pero no existen instrucciones tal cual de armado, sin embargo, es intuitivo. Te toma unos 10 minutos máximo armar el equipo. En el instructivo vienen las fotografías que de dicen qué ejercicios básicos se pueden realizar. Voy a disfrutar mucho este equipo.

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Pleased. Solid design. Good investment.
review: Love it! I read all the reviews before purchasing, and although most of the reviews were great, the odd one got me doubting whether this was a solid product or not. Now that I have received it and put it together, I love it. Take your time putting it together and hand tighten it lossley until you can line it up on the floor and make sure everything is squared before final tightening with the Allen wrench, then put the safety bar in. It moves a little when weight is not on it, but is totally solid when you put body weight on it. The vid in the review that shows a bolt not tightening, you'll notice he hasn't put the safety bar in, which has the thread that will actually make it tighten. So no worries on that. If you're a super big guy wanting to do handstands on the fully extended height, be aware that you are probably pushing it to the max, and if you're surprised it is not the most stable, well, duh. I'm a 5'7 female, and before I attempt to do a handstand on these bars four feet in the air, I might attache some straps to provide more stability, just in case, which is just a good fail safe, unless you have perfect balance. If I wanted to do a handstand and be wobbly AF, I would simply take off the exterior rubber caps to the feet and add an additional steel pipe, which I appreciate is easy to do. And I'd put it up against a wall if I was afraid of tipping forward or backward. In my opinion this is a solid design that you could further adapt if you wanted to push the parameters of its capacity. Bad reviews are; the product may have a manufacturer defect ( it can happen), but most likely people not knowing how to put it together right, probably due to using the Allen wrench right off the bat, which could cause the parts to tighten on uneven threads, and make it wobbly. So many options to choose from or spend more money on, I got mine, and was totally pleased that I chose this one. Relieved.

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Thick metal but wobbles
review: Excellent product overall. The metal tubing and base are solid and we have tested with weights from 100 lbs to 250 lbs. It was easy to assembly and move around. It has rubber on base for keeping it from sliding. Only marked down because it is wobbly, which doesn't bother anyone else. Rest of the family would give this 5 stars. Still highly recommend it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 January 2024

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Anchas y agarre demasiado grande
review: Por partes:  Muy bien al precio que las compré, aunque todo el material de gym está pasadísimo de precio últimamente...  Calidad media-alta del acabado y los materiales, muy estables y robustas, aunque nosotros pesamos 60 y 75kg. En este rango de peso, ningún problema, ni se mueven. Más estables incluso que las de mi gimnasio PERO----> NO RECOMENDADO para personas personas bajitas o pequeñas (por ejemplo chicas, menos 1.70cm, etc...) salvo que estés cómod@ en posiciones y agarres muy abiertos.  A mí me quedan algo anchas (mido 1,70), en el límite de estar incómoda por la apertura, querría poder juntarlas más, pero no se puede. Tengo las manos relativamente pequeñas y no puedo cerrarlas al rededor de la barra ni por asomo, es muy gruesa.  Mi pareja tampoco puede cerrarlas completamente, pero al tener la mano más grande, no está tan incómodo. Como también es más ancho de espalda y hombro, la separación entre las barras (al mínimo) es correcta para él.  Teniendo ésto en cuenta, SI LAS RECOMIENDO, sobre todo para hombres más grandes, creo que aguantarían sin problema 90-100kg, son muy buenas.  Creo que están pensadas para tíos de dos metros, digo yo, porque que al mínimo un tío de 1,80 vaya justo...no sé señores...

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: 公園の柵
review: 見た目通り、公園の柵です。近所の公園で柵が紛失したら、これを持っている私が泥棒と疑われること間違い無しの柵具合です。太さも高さも大きさも公園の柵なので、手の小さな人や握力の弱い人は最初のうちは使いにくいと思うかもしれませんが、トレーニングを続けて強靭な肉体を獲得すれば問題ありません。誰だってはじめの一歩は思い通りにいかないものです。学校の机のように足がガタつくので、少し厚めのマットを下に敷いて利用すると安心です。面倒くさがりの私は折り畳んだバスタオルを噛ませて利用しています。普段は車両の進入を阻止したい場所に置いておくこともできて一石二鳥です。（やったことはありません）自宅で気軽にディップスやローなどができて最高です！

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: しっかりしていてすごくいい
review: 購入してから一週間が経ちました。今までは週に二三日、筋トレをしていましたが、これを買ってからはほぼ毎日筋トレをするようになりました。ディップスは肩や胸にすごく良く効くみたいです。使用後に爽快な疲労感がありこれがたまりません。斜め懸垂もけっこう効きます。今まではジムに通っていたのですが、これとベンチのお陰でジムに通う必要がなくなり、毎月の会費が浮くことになりました。これは想定していなかったのですごく嬉しいです。これを買ったことで毎日筋トレができるようになり、なおかつ節約にもなったというすごく良い買い物でした。

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: La simetria brilla por su ausencia
review: Están bien. Teniendo en cuenta que hay un porron iguales de diferenres marcas (todas chinas) entre 50 y 80 euros, mejor comprar estas que son las más baratas (Me costaron 50). Son sólidas pero traquetea un poco al hacer los fondos porque no deben estar perfectamente niveladas, pero es tan leve que no afecta al ejercicio a menos que seas un psicópata de la perfección. Lo ridículo del producto es que no son iguales ambas barras, una es más grande que la otra (como puedes ver en la foto), se ve que se la pelan los controles de calidad.Por lo demas bien, quitando los problemas evidentes de diseño, a lo que el ejercicio se refiere funcionan correctamente como cualquier otras barras para fondos básicas. La barra para unir las 2 en uno no la veo necesaria, con o sin ella no siento ninguna diferencia pesando 80kg, asi que mejor sin ella para que sea más cómodo guardarlas.

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Advantage of being joined together
review: These are heavy duty and stable. no worries about them shifting on you unless you are perhaps 250+ pounds plus. Even then as long as you use them right shouldn't be a problem. I have them at home and bought a second pair to take to my vacation home. Good value.

title: Convenient
review: Its a very convenient product to have. It does take some space but I never miss a workout. Built well and I’ve never felt scared to use or had a feeling that it wouldn’t hold my weight. Here and there when I’m close to failing there is some wobbles but it does not feel like it’ll break. I do recommend this product if you need to workout and don’t have time for a gym definitely add it to your collection.

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Bastante mediocres y con fallos
review: Relación calidad precio malo para mi gusto, por un poco más creo que puedes conseguir cosas mejores, son las segundas barras que tengo y están muy lejos de la calidad de otras valiendo no mucho menos.Tiene fallos que son impensables para el precio que tiene como por ejemplo que una sea más grande que otra, una de ellas es inestable y es molesto y ruidoso porque al usarlo tiembla si no le pones algo debajo y el agarre para mi gusto muy ancho y que tenga como una especie de goma en mitad de unos pocos centímetros lo veo totalmente innecesario y molesto para algunos ejercicios.Creo que no revisan lo que fabrican la verdad....

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Buen par para varios ejercicios
review: Lo que me gustó es que se puede hacer varios ejercicios con ella fondos,dominadas Australiana,flexiones,flexiones asistidas flexiones elevadas ,dominadas asistidas a una mano,incluyendo también progresiones para full planche ,l-sit ,hefesto.Aunque el hefesto y el full planche se necesita tener buena estabilidad al principio incómoda debido a que en las barras se tambalea y es difícil hacerlo.Es fácil armarlo y desarmarlo cuando voy al parque. Aunque es verdad que nunca se debe de apretar de más las tuercas porque estás pueden barrerse con el tiempo o romperse.Deben de apretar lo justoTambién comento los que publican que las barras son gruesas son una incomodidad .Aconsejo que ejerciten primero los antebrazos para tener fuerza en ellas ya que nunca podrán realizar dichos ejercicios si no tienen fuerza en las manos para realizar inclusive dominadas y lo fondos .Lo otro es que solo mide 1.50 cm de alto  que es lo maximo que llega las barras lo que si es verdad no lo adquieran las personas altas de 1.70cm para arriba ya que se golpearan las rodillas solo es para personas enanas como yo que soy de 166cm.que es perfecto pues obvio que no toco el suelo con mis rodillas del suelo y si insisten en adquirirlo. bueno tendrán que subirlos con un par de libros para compensar la altura que necesitan para realizar dichos ejercicios como el hefesto y fondos.

prod_name: Prosource Fit Dip Stand Station
title: Bent and unsteady, but workable
review: I bought this to do pull ups in a lying down position to strengthen my back after an injury. It’s not easy to adjust the height so that’s a draw back (it’s screwed together), but I won’t be changing heights until I increase in strength which will take some time. My chief complaint is that one of the bars sits flat, no unsteadiness while the other bar is uneven and shakes. I put a shim underneath to even it out so I made it work for me. It’s a pain to take it apart, put it back and return for another that potentially will have the same manufacturing problem, so I’m just dealing with it. Other than that it seems solid and does the job. That’s my experience so far.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 November 2022

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Twist-Stepper- so wie gewünscht
review: Why does the computer not go back to nil? Unless I remove the batteries it keeps counting from one day to the next.The stick handle seems quite wobbly.It was easy to put together,  I watched the Utube video, thankyou to who suggested that.

Da mein in die Jahre gekommener Stepper seit ein paar Tagen nicht mehr richtig funktioniert, habe ich ihn gleich noch ein zweites Mal gekauft.

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Amazing product
review: Antes de comprar el aparato he leido miles de reseñas de esta y otras maquinas parecidas, mi conclusion despues de 6 meses es el siguiente.Es una maquina que funciona con dos hidraulicos lo cual significa que estos tienen una vida util diferente al resto de la maquina, pero estos pueden ser reparados o remplazados, aunque por el pequeño precio que tiene la maquina en si no creo que valga la pena, para que estos hidraulicos funcionen bien y tengan una vida util larga es importante mantenerlos bien, lo mas importante es evitar que estos lleguen a calentarse mucho o esten en funcionamiento mucho tiempo a una temperatura alta, por dentro tienen un aceite especial que es la que se calienta y pierde sus propiedades, la mejor forma para que no se caliente es o utilizarlos en tramos cortos de unos 15 min y dejarlos enfriar o utilizar un sistema de enfriamiento para que no se caliente tanto, un sistema simple consistiria en un ventilador a la altura del suelo o ventilacion cruzada; ya sea cerca de una puerta al exterior o aire acondicionado en la estancia. En invierno o en un clima frio seria suficiente para que no se calentara tanto, aun asi sienpre es mejor usarlos periodos cortos 15 o 20 min y dejar que se enfrie. Si dejamos que se caliente mucho y lo hacemos de forma prolongada lo que sucedera es que el haceide pierda sus propiedades mas rapido de lo normal y el hidraulio deje de funcionar. Estos consejos es para que dure mas tiempo de ll que puede durar sin mantenimiento que ya es vastante, calculo que usandola cada dia 30 min su vida seria de 2 años como mucho.Teniendo en cuenta lo anterior evitaremos que nos salgan ruidos antes de lo normal.Y una vez dicho esto sobre la maquina para hacer ejercicios es muy buena, es una maquina muy basica y muy funcional, simula que subamos escalones, de echo notaremos presion en los musculos por encima de las rodillas tal cual como cuando subimos escaleras de forma continuada, un ejercicio por cierto muy completo ya que si se ejecuta bien se ejercita casi todo el cuerpo.He leido comentarios de que hay a personas  que no se les suve el nivel de pulsaciones, pues me cuesta mucho creer que sea asi, yo cuando llevo mas de 5 minutos noto que me cuesta respirar y que mi corazon aumenta sus latidos.Soy una prueba de que la maquina quema calorias pues a 800 calorias a lo largo de dia que uso la maquina en este periodo he perdido vasta te peso claro esta que intentando comer sano pero no deja de ser una maquina que puede remplazar una caminara.La maquina a los meses empieza a hacer ruido de sus hidraulicos pero no es muy molestoos ni nada malo es algo normal no deja de ser una maquina con un sistema mecanico, como el resto de maquinas que tambien lo hacen ya sea bicicletas cintas etc...Si quieres perder peso y o hacer ejercicio en casa esta es una maquina calidad precio efectiva.

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Easy to use and effective
review: 安いですが、作りはとてもいいと思います。ペダルを踏み込むにはそれなりに力が要るので、普通にテクテク歩けるぐらいの人じゃないと使うのは厳しいと思いますので、そこは要注意でしょうね（踏み込む高さを調節する機能はありますが、踏み込みにかかる力は同じぐらいの印象）。ただし、日本語の組み立て説明書がないのはマイナス。当方は英語で書かれた図面を見てなんとなくで組み立てられましたが、図面に馴れてない人は困ると思います。メーカーは単にモノを売るだけでなく、こういう健康器具を必要とする高齢者のことを考えてあげてください。販売地域に対応した説明書1枚作る手間を惜しんではもったいないですよ。せっかく良いものを作ってもこれでは拒まれます。（ちなみにウェブサイトに日本語の説明書があるとかいう説明が中に入っているのですが、サイトにアクセスしてPDFを開いてみると説明書ではないというマヌケぶり）

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: I'm pleasantly surprised!
review: Originally, I was browsing for a treadmill, but I really wanted something that would develop stronger muscles for walking uphill or step climbing (a few months ago I walked the length of the Grand Canyon,  rim to rim, and I want to stay in shape for the next trip). When I read the reviews for this piece of equipment, I was still slightly undecided about it, but I chose to take the risk.I've only had it for three days. I am 5' 11", 205 lbs., and 69 years old.I had no problems putting it together; the base comes already assembled. The only assembly needed is with the vertical upright. I was very careful with the assembly instructions, and it took about 30 minutes to set up. But I went very slow. The equipment is made in China (imagine that!), so the instructions lack proper English, but they're manageable. The front of the base has a knob that will adjust the tension. The stepper makes very little noise; it's hardly noticeable.The base is approximately 18" by 18".Also, there's nothing to plug in.Before ordering, I thought that the handle would be too low for me, but it's the perfect height. I have mine set at optimum height (same as in the picture in the ad).Initially, I only took about 50 steps, and I was already breathing hard, so I got some rest. I felt that my leg muscles were receiving the exercise that I was looking for. Three days later, I'm doing 200 steps and then stopping. The air cylinders get pretty warm. I check the stepper every time I get off of it, looking for damage or anything loose. So far, everything is fine.I've also discovered an added bonus: I can place my hands on the bottom horizontal part of the handle (grip tighly) and slightly lean forward while stepping. As I take the steps, I slightly push up on my upper body with my arms, causing my biceps, triceps, and chest muscles to also get a workout, along with my legs. I just have to be careful not to lean forward too much, so I won't fall frontwards. So be very careful with this.As mentioned above, I've only had this equipment for three days. But so far, I am pleasantly surprised. Turns out that it was exactly what I wanted. And the price is very reasonable.UPDATE: I've had this stepper for almost 8 weeks. I have worked up to 3,000 steps a day. However, when I get near 700 steps, it begins to squeal. I've used different lubricating sprays, but the noise is still annoying. I finally found something that works: I place a small fan on the floor, directly in front of the red tension knob of the stepper. This cools down the bottom area, and that eliminates the noise.I'm still satisfied with the purchase.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 January 2023

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine

review: Excellent appareil de qualité. N'ecoutez pas les commentaires qui disent que ce n'est pas pour ceux qui ne font pas de sport !!! Faut bien commencer par qque chose et cet appareil compact est idéal.Je vais m'eclater avec de la bonne musique de plus il est silencieux vous pouvez même en faire la nuit sans déranger vos voisins ✌️

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Works well and easy to put together
review: Assembly of this is not as difficult as putting together an IKEA product, and they give you all the components to do so.  I was hesitant to buy after reading some of the reviews of the stepper failing after a few months. If it does, I will update the review, but it’s been a week and it works well.  One caveat: if you are a Canadian customer, you aren’t covered by the warranty.  The main handlebar and adjustment knob did not thread together, so I contacted Sunny customer support via email.  They always responded within 24 to 48 hours.  They shipped me replacement parts for free, but I did have to pay for shipping.  That was $55 CAD.  However, they told me that Amazon would likely cover that cost within 90 days of original purchase date.  I contacted Amazon support by phone, and they did refund me back on my original form of payment the shipping cost (without needing the invoice).  But, you only have 90 days to do that.  Even though two of the parts did not fit together (handlebars), I could use the machine until the replacement was sent, and it was an easy process to do it.  It would not deter me from buying another Sunny product in the future. Overall, I’m happy with the purchase.

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Where has this been all my life?
review: This is the most amazing little stepper machine. Manual instructions never make sense to me, but once I figured out where all the bolts went it was a breeze to assemble. I'm about 135 pounds/5'8" tall and this machine has no problem remaining sturdy with about a 10 minute workout. I need core exercise or I suffer from sciatica real bad. I've only been using this stepper for a few days and already it has strengthened my lower back, and even sorted out a recurring issue I've had with my right knee for over 30 years. It does a great job tightening the muscles and is easy to use. I think with the "twisting" motion it somehow realigns the skeletal system, aiding in reducing aches and pains. I'd highly recommend this stepper to anyone who's been thinking about it, but not sure if they should spend the money on it or not. Worst case scenario, return it. Otherwise I think most people will be very happy with this equipment.
