prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Good for the money
review: Perfect for mini work outs while watching tv. Gets my butt off the sofa. Not my primary means of exercise but getting in a couple of hundred steps while watching tv keeps me from being too sedentary in the evenings. Helps with my digestion too just getting upright. Not too heavy to move and place against a wall while not in use. The handle is nice to keep balanced while stepping but it is a little wobbly. The step counter works nicely. It will start squeaking when it warms up but it's not too annoying. Again, not going to be my primary cardio but completely fits the bill for breaking up prolonged sofa lounging especially during football season.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 January 2024

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Facile utilizzo
review: Facile da montare e da utilizzare. Piuttosto faticoso se alle prime armi. Ho deciso per il momento di non montare il manubrio per essere più comoda nello spostarlo visto che non pesa poco.

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: 梱包状態と取り扱い、組立説明書
review: 製品は箱の中にぐちゃぐちゃになって梱包されており、一瞬使い古し後の再梱包状態と思わせるようなものが入っていました。部品等の傷はなかったが、開梱する人の目線で梱包を考えたほうが良いのではないか取説に日本語表記が無く不便、日本市場で販売をするなら日本語ガイドは必要でしょう。最近、電子部品、小物など購入にあたり、中国製の品質は良くなったと思っていたが、この製品を購入し品質にまた疑問を抱いています。

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Piccoli suggerimenti
review: L’apparecchio risulta solido e robusto, abbastanza efficente; un suggerimento per quando si deve fissare l’asta del manubrio, una volta raggiunta l’altezza desiderata e fissata la manopola nel foro di fissaggio, stringetela forte ma mentre la ruotate dondolate l’asta in piu direzioni. Vedrete che risultera ben fissata e piu stabile

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Zu schwergängig für Senioren
review: Leider lässt sich der Widerstand nur ungenügend variieren und der Stepper ist für Senioren zu schwergängig. Wir konnten das Gerät nicht verwenden.

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Excelente aparato de ejercicio
review: Excelente aparato para hacer escaladora está muy compacto y está muy bien construido recomendable

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: steppter est trop dur
review: le steppter est trop dur même réglé au minimum. Pas adapté au sénior

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Good 15 minutes workout
review: Good 15 minutes workout.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 December 2023

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Great little machine with ONE small challenge
review: I love this stepper!  The one "complaint" (and it is really just a precaution):  If you are weak (or perhaps elderly), do NOT depend on leaning on the handlebars to get on the machine - get one foot on first, then the handlebars will help you mount the machine; otherwise, it easily tilts and could throw you to the floor.  It is small, compact, easy to move and gives me a great workout.  I have a Cubii (can I say that?) and enjoy using it to keep my circulation strong, but it did nothing to help me build strength in my thighs to navigate stairs.  Perhaps they could add some weight on the "front" of the machine to counter-balance it, but then it wouldn't be as easy to move around.  I'd buy it again.  So many people don't understand how important it is as you age to keep the thigh muscles strong enough to lift you out of chairs, climb stairs, etc.  Having to pull (or push) yourself up a flight of stairs or out of a recliner with arm/shoulder muscles alone is asking for trouble - too easy to break or dislocate something - then what are you going to do?
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 January 2024

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Waste of Money
review: Had a previous version of this unit for a couple of years.  It worked great until a frame weld broke.  Bought this as a replacement because the base is a sturdier design.  I used to do 2000 steps in a half hour on the old one, which was a great workout.  This new unit is so incredibly stiff, I'd be lucky to do a few hundred in a half hour.  In addition, unlike the old one, the counter only works with a full top to bottom stoke so when trying to step quickly it's useless.  Don't waste your money on this piece of junk.

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Boa qualidade
review: Serve muito bem para o pretendido

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Us eYou Tube video for assembly
review: Came yesterday incredibly well packed. Exploding diagrams not my thing! You Tube saved the day with their video which you can watch through then stop at each step to work through it. Easy peasy!Gives your lungs and legs a good workout, start slow and build up. Good to have step depth to change and handlebar height change as I'm only short. Small footprint to store, seems well made. So far very pleased.UPDATE: no guarantee in UK according to Sunny, disappointing! I was suspicious when I could find nothing in the manual. Hope it lasts as pleased so far.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 March 2023

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: The screw does not totally fit into the bar
review: The screw does not totally fit into the bar, need some help or replacement

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Excelente
review: Breve espacio y efectivo

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Etwas schwergängig am Anfang der Übungen.
review: Nimmt wenig Platz weg.  Könnte leichtgängiger sein. Gutes Übungsgerät

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: SERVICIO DE AMAZON NEFASTO. FALLABA EL DISPLEY Y NO ME SOLUCIONARON EL PROBLEMA.
review: La máquina funciona, pero no es de recibo que si falla el display no puedan cambiarlo, simple y llánamente. Después de montar la máquina lo que menos apetece es desmontarla otra vez, empaquetarla y enviarla. SOLO era el display, pero no me ofrecieron ninguna solución, aun siendo un cliente muy habitual. Lamentable.

prod_name: Sunny Health & Fitness Twisting Stair Stepper Machine
title: Ben oltre le aspettative
review: Ho avuto diversi stepper in passato ma questo è il non plus ultra. Semplicemente eccezionale.Robusto , non cigola come glia altri e i pedali sono molto alti quindi si fa più fatica ed è quasi paragonabile a quelli usati in palestra.  Molto ma molto soddisfatta

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: La calidad de agarre
review: I use it to deadhang and stretch out the spine after an entire day of sitting. You can physically feel the lower spine stretched out and more relaxed after doing so. Give it 4 stars as one of the holes for the screws was shredded and didn't work right, but I was still able to build and use it.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Easy to use, work well.
review: Low quality. But return condition

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Gracias
review: The design is fantastic but unfortunately I am missing the locking nuts (quantity 4) that secures the thing together. If someone could send those out to them that would be greatly appreciate

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Gute Verarbeitung länge sehr zu empfehlen!
review: Is the manual missing or normally not included at all?

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Item not even and reused box
review: La verdad el montaje sencillo y el apoyarla va muy segura de agarra perfectamente la recomiendo 100 por cien

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Ottimo accessorio.
review: These straps work well with the Iron Gym pull-up bar. They use velcro for closure and they feel very sturdy. No concerns at all about them coming off when I'm working out. Not much else to say, really. If you need straps like these and you don't want to spend a lot, you should probably get them.One small word of caution though: they are not heavily padded, so if you weigh much, you may find these uncomfortable. I'm fairly light, so it's not a big issue, but for folks putting a lot of pressure on their arms, these may become painful.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 October 2014

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: NA
review: Todo bien

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: NA
review: Habe diese an meiner Decke angebrachten Klimzugstange angehängt, von der Höhe sehr gut, alles andere war mit einfach zu lang von den Schlaufen her!

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: NA
review: Item not even and reused box

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: NA
review: Utile per implementare il già ottimo Iron gym. Si montano e smontano in 10 secondi, ci vuole solo un pò di accortezza per renderli della stessa lunghezza, attancando con cura gli strap.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Simple and Awesome
review: The pandemic taught me how to get a good workout at home, and even now that we're out of it the habit remains. This pull up bar is surprisingly durable and supports my weight without a problem (230lb), and it allows me to get some back work in whenever I want. I use only the parallel grips, as the regular grip is a little too narrow for my shoulder width, but that's what I prefer anyhow and I have no concerns about them breaking.I will say, it may be beneficial to put a tennis ball or something protective on each end of the bar that presses against the door frame, and it is starting to leave a visible indentation. But, that is also variable depending on the weight of the person using the bar and how hard it presses into the frame.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 December 2023

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Iron Gym + tiras abdominales
review: 100% recomendado. Entrega en 24 horas. Tambien compré las tiras abdominales y estoy muy contento con ellas. Paciencia al ppo.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Slow delivery
review: Took 3 weeks to deliver.Everything else was good
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 October 2021

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Iron Gym...
review: They are great,  I am 93 kg and the velcro is very strong...
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 June 2015

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: A few adjustments as it did not fit the door frame.
review: Seems sturdy. Easy to assemble, tad there are 4 screws and it comes with a wrench. And the metal tubes are pretty solid. When assembled it was too wide for the door way. I took off the rubber end caps and cut off 1.5 inches off each side and then put the rubber caps on again. Fits perfectly. I also wanted it higher so on the backside of the door frame I secured a piece of wood that boosts the bar up about 2.25 inches. This will also help with the weight (I’m 220lbs) on the moulding around the door. The only thing that puzzles me is that everything is metal but the bar that rests horizontally on the back of the door frame. It’s plastic. Seems somewhat durable, but I wonder if that will be the thing that might break. We will see.***Update (3 weeks later): solid and functional. I’ve done about 900 chin ups/pull ups on it, and it flexes, but it is sturdy and solid. The foam pads have ripped a bit, but I just use hockey tape and wrap the handles. No other issues. Great purchase.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: It's NOT a "Bauchgurt", though!
review: They are Arm Supports.There are two wide Velcro straps that you help you stabalize your body while suspended from your upper arms on a pull up bar.  It enables to isolate your stomach muscles by lifting your knees to your chest. Great workout tool for abs!

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Es importante medir la puerta en la habitacion antes de comprarlo
review: Iron Gym Upper Body Workout barra me sirve muy bien. Es sufficiente suerte para mi peso de 67 kilos.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Ottimo prodotto per fare addominali
review: Venditore ok. Utile per eseguire addominali appesi alla sbarra. Soddisfatto del prodotto e dell'acquisto. Rapporto qualità prezzo molto buona. Consigliato.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Mine came a little scuffed
review: Mine was slated to come in 3 weeks but arrived only about 1/2 week after. Not a deal breaker, but when it finally arrived the package was crumpled, the bubble wrap was browning and the ziploc containing the screws was completely ripped. The tiny washers basically dropped out asap and I almost lost them. Foam was already dented in some areas, harmless but looks bad. Then during assembly I found out that the bottom screws were perfect but the top ones had too much leeway even with the given washers.I fixed it by putting extra 6.8mm washers to tighten the top area (as pictured). Unfortunately my door frame didn't suit the design of the bar and it hangs awkwardly at a 45 degree angle somewhat dangerously - at least it's still usable because of the horizontal bar being shorter than the doorway (2nd pic).As for the positives the metal is pretty sturdy, cushioning is just ok. My packaging looked like ancient warehouse goods but the product itself is fine. Ideally you want your door frame to hang about 2.4cm off a wall to get the bar to stand straight as intended, but even if it doesn't (like mine) it can still be used. Just exercise caution and don't swing on it.TL;DR Product seems fine, but delivery and condition leaves some to be desired. Chances are I got a warehouse leftover

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Strong Straps & Strong Abs
review: Straps are very strong. Excellent velcro - can support full 160 lbs dead weight no problem (I have read reviews of it support heavier dead weight).Padding is fine. Material is a little scratchy on bare arms... but that's not a problem because whiners end up quitting anyways. Your abs will be burning so much you wont even notice a little skin discomfort on the arms.Excellent lower abs and hips workout.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 May 2013

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Five Stars
review: Secure
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 June 2016

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Simple mais efficace
review: Le produit est conforme aux photos.Il s'installe en quelques secondes.Un excellent complément pour la méthode Lafay.Attention par contre, le produit est prévu pour des épaisseur d'encadrement de 20 cm.Si l'encadrement est moins épais, il faudra prévoir des cales pour compenser.Dommage que les sangles pour ses suspendre avec les bras (pour faire des abdos) ne sont pas réglables.Mais globalement très bon rapport qualité/prix.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Sturdy, Strong, and Consistent
review: I bought this product 3 years ago. I've used it almost every day since, it's worked great and has come along with me on my body building journey ever since. The build quality is great, the grips have remained comfortable, and everything about the bar is great.However, the metal holder for the bar hasn't been able to stand the test of time very well. It's gotten a lot of bend on it and just this morning I had it finally bend too far on me.Is it possible to get JUST the metal bit? I've loved this bar forever and I don't need a new one, but I do need a new holder.Overall, 9.5/10. After 3 years of everyday use, the metal piece will eventually give out. The bar itself, 10/10.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 January 2024

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Extremely easy to take down and put up
review: The item was delivered without any additional boxes (so everyone who saw the the box knew it was a workout bar). It took 5 minutes (10 minutes max) to set the bar up and put onto the door. So far, there is no damage on the door and it is super easy to set up and take down. My husband is 6'0, 165lbs and I'm 4'11, 105lbs and both of us use the bar. We have toddlers running around the home so we constantly need the doors closed, which means we take the bar down daily and put it back up at night when they are sleeping. It is super easy to take on and off. I'm super happy we bought it. The only con to the bar is how bulky it is since we live in a small space and we constantly need the doors closed during the daytime. Aside from that, I would 100% recommend the product.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Geniale Alternative zu Klemm-Türrecks
review: In meiner alten Wohnung hatte ich ein Türreck, welches man zwischen den Türrahmen verkeilt. Die Gumminoppen haben abgefärbt und die stetige Spannung ihre Spuren am Rahmen hinterlassen. Außerdem hat das Türreck doch auf Dauer auch gestört.Der Iron Gym ist eine geniale Alternative, sofern man einen Türrahmen im Haus hat, dessen Maße passen. Meiner hat eine Tiefe von 18,5 cm, das Gewicht hängt so allerdings schon an den Rundstangen, der Plastikteil liegt nicht mehr auf der Wand auf. Dennoch hält es mein Gewicht von 75 kg ohne Probleme. Also erst Ausmessen, dann Bestellen!Lieferung: Wie immer top und zügig durch Amazon.Verpackung: Alle Einzelteile sind sicher in Schaumstoff verpackt, Kleinteile getrennt. Im Lieferumfang enthalten sind der Iron Gym (bestehend aus 4 Stangen plus der Plastik/Schaumstoff Auflage), ein kleiner Ernähtungs- und Trainings-Ratgeber, ein Sicherheitskeil und die Sicherheits-Befestigung. Letztere sind beide optional und verhindern, dass der Iron Gym sich beim Training aushängt. Der Keil wird einfach in den Türrahmen gesteckt, die Befestigung wird mit Dübeln in der Wand verankert. Doch wie gesagt, beides optional, ich trainiere ohne.Qualität: Ich war überrascht, wie robust die Konstruktion wirkt. Die Schaumstoffpolster halten einiges aus, die Metallstangen sind allesamt solide und ohne scharfe Kanten. Die Montage ist eine Sache von Sekunden - statt dem beigepackten Schlüssel würde ich für die Schrauben aber eigenes Werkzeug empfehlen. Die Schrauben jedoch nicht zu fest ziehen!Handling: Klimmzüge müssen natürlich mit angewinkelten Beinen durchgeführt werden. Die Griffe sind angenehm und rutschfest, 3 Griffstellungen sind möglich. Auch für Liegestütze (2 Griffmöglichkeiten) und Sit-Ups ist das Gerät klasse. Für Dips ist ein Stuhl praktischer als dieses Gerät, da zu tief.Meine volle Kaufempfehlung. Sollte sich auf lange Zeit meine Meinung zum Iron Gym ändern, werde ich die Rezession natürlich dementsprechend aktualisieren.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: barra de dominadas
review: muy práctica la barra de dominadas que NO necesita ninguna instalación. es una muy buena opción para casas con un diseño bonito que no permiten otro tipo de opciones

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Buenas
review: Estupendas, resistentes, el velcro estupendo. No le doy el máximo, porque vienen sin las anillas  para enganchar mosquetones (lo sabía antes de comprarlas). Estas correas yo no las uso para lo que sugiere el fabricante. Son estupendas para engancharlas al cable de máquinas de poleas y hacer recto abdominal, oblicuos y transverso. Son de mejor calidad que las que tenía. Las recomiendo

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: tres insatisfait
review: mauvais produit ne tiens pas du tout sur l'encadrement de mes portes, mal conçuje vais aller chez decathlon pour trouver celui qui me conviendrane pas acheter

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: not bad
review: I'm sometimes a bit concerned that the Velcro might not hold, but in yet to fall on my Harris from a great height. Cheap and cheerful
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 September 2014

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Great bar for any level fitness
review: I have worked out for over 50 years, always had a pull up bar.  I needed a new one and decided on this one.  I am happy with it.  I do pull ups and dead hangs everyday.  I was skeptical at fist of the pressure type door mounted bar ... I was surprised at the ease of assembly, and it works !!  I had two grandkids on it and it held up.  I love the size and the versatility - multiple hand grips - works great and fair price.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 December 2023

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Buon Prodotto
review: Fa esattamente quello che deve fare. Le bande sono piuttosto resistenti e ci si può allenare comodamente. Lo consiglio certamente.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Reliable doorframe apparatus
review: Sturdy and fits on my doorframe as advertised. One star deducted because the "grips" are actually pretty slippery, not very easy to use without some extra tape or chalk or something.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Prodotto ottimo ma arrivato con qualche pecca
review: Sbarra molto resistente, ma arrivata con qualche pezzo mancante e con bulloni non buoni poichè girano a vuoto. Ne comprerò altri, ma la sbarra merita.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Preis-Leistung Top
review: Ich habe mir dieses Klimmzug-Türreck nach langem Hin- und Herüberlegen dann doch gekauft. Zuerst natürlich meinen Türrahmen ausgemessen, um da komplett auf der sicheren Seite zu sein, dass alles passt.Das Türreck ist super einfach aufzubauen und lässt sich dann einfach in die Tür hängen. Es sitzt und passt alles und hält auch meinen Freund mit seinen knapp 80 kg beim Training locker aus.Von der Verarbeitung und Montage ist das Türreck wirklich top. Leider muss ich einen Stern abziehen, was aber eher an der Konstruktion eines solchen Recks an sich liegt. Es kann eben von der Türrahmenleiste rutschen, was mir gestern abend schmerzlicherweise deutlich gemacht wurde. Ich habe Beinheben bis zu den Händen gemacht und habe dabei wohl das Reck irgendwie von der Türrahmenleiste gehoben. Auf jeden Fall bin ich böse auf dem Hintern gelandet und hab mir ordentlich was geprellt. Für diese Übung ist das Reck dann wohl nicht geeignet.Für einfache Klimmzüge, Liegestütze und Bauchübungen am Boden ist die Stange aber echt empfehlenswert, zumal für diesen Preis.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: No recomendable
review: Tiene muy mala estabilidad y no lo he podido colocar en la puerta porque no se sujeta nada de forma q lo tengo en el armario

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Facil de instalar y muy util.
review: Una buena herramienta para ejercitarse en casa

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Gut fürs morgentliche wach werden
review: Schneller Versand! Obwohl der 05.07. als Liefertermin angegeben war war der Artikel schon am 28.06. da! Die Verarbeitung ist ganz gut. Ich war etwas skeptisch wegen der angegebenen Türmaße, aber es passt perfekt!Gegen mein Studiotraining würde ich es zwar nich eintauschen, aber um morgens den Kreislauf ein wenig in Schwung zu bringen wird es ausreichen!

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Buen material
review: El material es muy bueno, llegó en excelentes condiciones. El problema es que no especifican el ancho de la puerta ni la altura, y porque en México la mayoría de las paredes son muy gruesas por eso no va a quedar en todas. Si pueden comprar alguno que tenga la opción de extenderse de los lados mucho mejor y así garantizan que quede en su puerta.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Good Addition to an Iron Gym, Especially If You Like Velcro
review: Bought to use with my Iron Gym (duh) so that I could do hanging ab exercises.  They do work well enough, but I sometimes question if they will hold me (the closures on them are velcro - and while the contact area for the velcro pads is substantial, I still hesitated at first to put my full weight on them.  That said, they do hold (I'm about 175lbs) and don't seem to be straining at all but I'll knock off half a start for using velcro over a different hanging solution (not to mention the ripping sound of parting that much velcro when you remove them).They do enable me to do the hanging ab crunches I purchased them for, but not the oblique movements - this is not due to a fault in the product itself per se, but more just a fact of how it works - since you're hanging under the Iron Gym, you're in the middle of a door frame.  This means that side to side movements will be limited by the width of the door frame itself.  So half a star lost here.Still overall, a good product if you already own the Iron Gym (or similar) and want to expand your use of it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 August 2015

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Roto en menos de 3 meses
review: Llegó a finales de Septiembre, y le he dado unos 30 entrenos de uso. El narrow grip ya se ha roto sin hacer ningún mal uso, y conservándolo adecuadamente. La pared ha quedado llena de manchas negras. Los bordes de las puertas están mellados. Voy a solicitar una devolución del dinero, me parece vergonzoso.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Very few flaws—well built
review: I purchased this for my twelve year old daughter, who wanted to strengthen her arms. Therefore, I never planned on doing any “heavy-duty” workouts with it or such, so I can’t properly rate it in regards to range of motion as I have no experience in that department, but it seems to be sturdy enough for dips, pushups, etc from what I can tell. In regards to the set-up, the instructions were a bit confusing, but there are many Youtube videos online easily guiding you through the process, so that was no problem.Everything was very well packaged and nothing was damaged-everything was in bags, that were indicated.Now in regards to the sturdiness. I’ll be honest, at first, I was a bit worried that it would fall. We hung it on my daughter’s doorframe, so it would be a pull-up bar. After pulling on it quite a few times to test the durability, we tried it. I believe the weight limit is something around 250lbs or so. I feel as if this bar would be sturdy enough, but I am not positive.Last two things—the only big flaw I noticed was that since we hung ours on the doorframe, we must be really careful to not push up when  when doing pull-ups as that would cause it to fall from the doorframe and for the person to injure themselves. Lastly, I read some reviews mentioning that the individual’s doorframe began to bend and the bar caused problems in the doorframe. Since I haven’t had it very long, and since the primary user of the bar is only around 80 lbs, I haven’t seen any issues in the doorframe, but only time will tell.Overall, I recommend this bar for recreational purposes, and just to get a good workout in at home. It serves our purpose and is very helpful.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 January 2020

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: An unnecessary addition
review: I bought a bar and was thinking to also add this item to complete the set but I am afraid to say that the original bar AB workout band were better than this extra ones so did not make it a great use.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 March 2015

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Zufrieden
review: IRON GYM TOTAL AB WORKOUT BAUCHGURTE sehr gut für meine Bauchmuskeln und meine Ausbildung Ich bin froh, dass ich gekauft

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Artículo  Excelente
review: Excelente

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: J'aime mais...
review: Quand même un peu déçu. Le montage, les tractions tout va bien. Mais c'est un produit étudié pour le porte américaine ?Premièrement il ne tient pas sur mes portes, j'ai dus fixer des crochets dans mon mur parce que le malheureux petit crochet livré avec l'appareil a tenu 2 secondes. Deuxièmement la barre de traction et trop longue par rapport à mes portes standards, je n'ai pas la place pour poser mes mains sur la mousse. Si j'ai gardé le produit c'est uniquement à cause de son prix attractif et du fait que je ne voulez pas une simple barre.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Rapporto qualità prezzo
review: Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo per questo oggetto semplice ma robusto, ideale per la palestra e per chi si allena a casa. Spedizione nei termini come al solito.

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: I am very happy with this purchase.
review: I was planning on buying ab straps that cost about 5 times the cost of these but figured I would take a chance and I am glad I did...  The straps are held together with velcro so they are easily adjustable and can be used on a power rack without any issues.  At first I was afraid that the velcro wouldn't support my weight but it did and it is very strong.  The straps do have a small amount of padding in the so they are comfortable and don't really dig into your arms like some straps that I have used in the past.  Overall, I think that they are well worth the price so just buy them already.  I hope this helps you make your decision!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 March 2013

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: kleines Fitnesscenter für Zuhause
review: Habe lange gesucht, nach einem Model, was für meine Tür passt (67 cm breit, 12 cm dick, Gipskarton).Die Beschreibung stimmt. Wand hält Belastung aus. Diverse Übungen sind möglich, z.B. 3 Varianten von Klimmzügen.Bitte Beschreibung lesen.Aufbau ging schnell (5 min.), da intuitiv möglich. Alle Teile, auch notwendiges Werkzeug lagen bei.Der Schaumstoff schützt die Zarge. Habe noch keine Schäden im Türbereich feststellen können.Schnell mal ein Paar Übungen einwerfen - nun kein Problem mehr.Negativ:Durch die Höhe der Stange hängt man tief. Beine sind anzuwinkeln!

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: Excellent with some strengthening of the door frame
review: Most likely be prepared to strengthen the top of your door frame. Attached is what I did (wood bar screwed in the 2X4 with 3 crews of 3” each). I also put 2 steel plates (DIY) so the exercise bar does not fail if you touch it by accident This makes it semi-permanent, and I can remove it in seconds if needed. I am 200 lbs and it does not move at all. So unless you believe blue elephants exist, this is a perfect exercise tool with some need of thinking and DIY capabilities. With detailed review and pics, please understand I will not reply to questions. Enjoy 😉

prod_name: Iron Gym Pull Up Bars
title: NOT IRON GYM
review: I had read the reviews before so I knew that the product was a FAKE. Surprisingly the product wasn't as bad as reviewed. It is a Door Gym not and Iron Gym, also I think the items are second hand, due to poor conditions.  I think the seller should be more honest about the product they are selling as it is deception.The item was poorly packaged (just in a large jiffy bag), and the main box was also damaged.It did arrive before estimated date. The item smells and feels new (just a 'knock-off' version). However the damaged instructions suggest the product maybe second hand. Some reviews have reported having difficulty fitting the Door Gym together. I didn't have this problem, all screws were present and fit the frame (just).The item fits inside my door frame and hold my weight. The pads are comfortable (one is a bit loose) and i feel safe using the product.  The main bar may prove to be weak as it is in two sections with nothing (not even a clips inside the bars) holding them together so your weight is resting on the plastic bar at the top. However, this is nothing a bit of duck tape can't strengthen.  , Box and Instructions damaged but efficient seller.Yes, the seller lied, deceived and has used 'fake' pictures of the item hey are selling, something you expect from eBay NOT Amazon.  The material is cheaper than the Iron Gym but as you are only a few feet from the ground I can't see any health risks. Also, it costs just over £10, what do you expect?! If you want amazing quality good then your going to have to pay top prices. There is a reason Gym's charge high monthly rates, and it is because their equipment is expensive! I'm afraid there is not such thing as a bargain anymore only expensive imitation and copy cat products.It suited my needs as it will not be over used but if you are a heavy male/female or intend to use this product intensely I suggest you purchase the real thing.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 December 2013

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Very good
review: The resistance bands are quite long, so you can't achieve resistance in the full range of movements that are illustrated on the workout sheet included.  The individual bands are also very light - even using all of them together it's a light workout, so great for high rep exercise or slow tempo work, but not if you're looking to increase muscle mass.  All in all a good piece of equipment, great for beginners, but it has limited application and not recommended if you are already in good shape and looking to be challenged.

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Price vs quality
review: Getting older, now, and I needed to transition to something more portable than an established gym setup.First time, trying this, after initially bagging out on it, lol. That said, I must say, that I am very impressed with it, and I can take it anywhere with me.Some people complain about not having enough tension bands, but I say, just buy some more, they are cheap enough and can be purchased on their own.

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Very Strong and Durable
review: It was all I expected
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 October 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: A great idea
review: I’m so surprised because for how much I paid for this setup, I thought it wouldn’t be this nice of quality. Everything you need is in this box!I wish the examples told you what they were usingbut other then that, I 100% recommend it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 January 2024

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Solid good quality set for a portable gym
review: Easy to set and use. Good for people on the go like me traveling truck driver. Will give a good workout because of its strong resistance bands. Material is built well. Have had no issues to this day. I ended up buying another one for more resistance and works better for me. Good bang for your buck. Highly recommend!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 July 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Decent product, but not for people under 6’0”
review: This was, in my opinion, a great set for the prime day price with which  I bought it. The bar fits together perfectly, and it isn't too heavy but substantial enough. I don't know how well the rings on each end will hold up, because they're fastened onto the bar's ends, not screwed in as I expected. The quality of all the components seems fine!!My one comment is that the included straps are waaay too heavy for me to use. The product description was pretty much accurate, so I cannot say I was surprised. I was really hoping that this company would also offer different strengths of straps for purchase separately, or that a product would exist that otherwise fills this void. However, there isn't much at this time.Still, this set is an excellent idea! I'm getting lighter straps that hopefully will fit, and if the 30lb straps that are included are fine for you, this is an excellent way to try out this form of strength training for yourself. Particularly for prime day, this was an EXCELLENT value.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 July 2021

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Great quality for the price.
review: I like the quality of the bar and the option to use 3 or 2 pieces. The bands have nice resistance with 6 bands included. The quality of the whole set is good with a workout chart included. My only con is shorter bands are not include for rowing excersize, there is not enough resistance with the included bands.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 November 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: A More Affordable and Great Alternative to Redge Fit
review: This product looks great on paper, but I’m thinking of returning it while I can.It’s looks really well made and sturdy, and I bet it would last over a decade, but here is the problem: I’m 5’7”.For most of the exercises that require the door frame, there’s no problem. But a lot of the exercises I can crank out 40+ reps with all 6 bands, and I’m not a muscular guy by any means.My recommendation to the seller: add shorter bands for your shorter clients, or at least offer them.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 May 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: NA
review: Great quality a good price. I'm happy with the product.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 9 November 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: NA
review: This "home gym" is much more than I expected. The bar is very robust amd seems to hold up to the instense resistance put on it between you and the bands. I REALLY appreciate the fact that the bands are covered by the nylon sleeves because, like most men, I HAVE BODY HAIR and there's nothing more uncomfortable than bare latex or rubber bands rubbing against your body and pulling your friggin hair. It's what has kept me from using the other band systems I've owned in the past. But the Innocedar bands are a huge relief and was the major reason I chose THIS system over the Redge Fit one. The 3-piece bar is another reason because it's wide enough to be.used comfortably for men with wide shoulders. And the price was the final deciding factor. With a good amount of resistance, the bands are great for people just getting into band fitness or those who are trying to get back into shape after years of not hitting the gym (like yours truly) and seeking a low-impact solution when time has caught up your joints. The Redge Fit system seems to be an okay product but for the price you're getting more with the Innocedar. Redge Fit does offer their app, but you can easily find great band workout vids and channels on YouTube for free. BUT... I've only been using this for a short time. I'll post a update if anything changes.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 22 August 2021

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Solid
review: Good solid set best price I seen for these his one is good quality
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 May 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Incredible
review: Little gym at home
date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 June 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Great at home equipment
review: I’m needing something simple yet effective for at home workouts. This set is perfect for me!  I like that I have the ability to increase weight by adding straps and the included workout pictures help me put together a routine. This is getting me back in the groove of exercising without having to join a gym!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 June 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Solid Product for home gym or for travel!
review: Got this package yesterday and completed my first workout last night. More importantly, I knocked out a 30 minute workout during my lunch break. Easy to use and comes with pictures and workout details.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 July 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Very Nice!!!
review: I love that the bar for the stretch bands can be used in two different lengths.  Plus, all the stretch bands have the same stretch capacity of 30 bounds.  The set is well crafted.  It is easy to change and add all of the attachments.  The two foot pedals are definitely a plus to have with this set.  Once your feet are in the pedal straps, they don’t slip out while doing your stretch routine.  I am extremely pleased with my purchase.  This is an outstanding movable gym that you can travel where ever you go that has a door to anchor the resistance bands.  This movable gym takes up minimal space in your suitcase and or in your home.  The cost was reasonable.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 April 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Not great for leg work
review: This product is great for upper body workouts, but for lower body exercises, such as deadlifts and squats there is not enough tension, unless you like 6’5” tall lol. For chest press, lat Pull-downs, seated row, triceps, biceps and shoulders  and even ab work the band system works great.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 June 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Quality made!
review: I tried a few of these portable gyms and this was by far the best designed and best made. Highly recommend. Plus it comes with a display showing about 60 different ways to use it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 31 May 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Best bands I’ve tried…
review: While waiting forever (6 months) for my Torrobands to arrive, I ordered these. Much less expensive, included a bar and more accessories plus much more versatile. Plus they arrived within three days of ordering. Best bands system on the market. I’m a CPT and I’m setting up an adjustable wall track system so I won’t need a door and these are perfect for that. After a complaint to the BBB my Torrobands arrived the next day… comparing the two these are much better, sleeve coated and durable. A much much better buy…
date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 November 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Nice
review: Nice device with different workout options.One thing, however, is that it would be nice to have different length of tension cords.Smaller options would be nice for different workouts, and for different human height.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 October 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Same results as gym!
review: I’d been going to the gym 3-4x a week for years, but life changed and it was going to be harder to get there regularly so I bought these. 3 weeks in and I’m in just as good of, if not better, shape than when I was going to the gym.Just because of how resistance bands function though you’ll need a door or buy some wall mounts (which is what I did) to anchor the bands too though in order to get a high level of resistance for maximum results.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 August 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Add Shorter Rope into the mix
review: While I enjoyed the product, it is surprising that all the elastic rope were the same length. This does not work for shorter members of the family - no tension at all if you are below 5' 4" height
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 April 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Great set!
review: This was a great set for the money. It’s very versatile and does everything I needed it to do. My only criticism is the strong chemical smell on the handgrips. I’m hoping that the smell subsides with time.  I would definitely recommend this to be added to your home gym equipment.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 25 July 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Caution
review: Workout equipment is not as easy to use as the description implies. Length of cords are not easy to match with with desired length. Just a complete mess and would not recommend
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 November 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Higher Quality Than Expected
review: Had a couple weeks. Happily surprised by the quality of the 3 piece bar with actual steel bits. Figured it would be all poly bc of the price & the extras included. To me, it does feel as strong and light as the bar at the gym. I am someone who sweats quite a bit so I do not usually use bars with padding bc of grip issues, but the padding on this bar is very stable and does not get slippery nor sponge wet.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 June 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Great product
review: This is great. My suggestions are to include more bands so the difference between 1 band and two isn’t a 30 pound difference.  Also Include a carry bag to hold all the stuff. Otherwise it’s perfect.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 August 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Great product
review: A lot of people will say "you get what you pay for" well this is wrong.  This is a perfect workout tool.  Love this thing
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 April 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: PORTABLE
review: I LIKE IT  I CAN TAKE IT ALMOST ANY WHERE I GO 👍
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 May 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Resistance bands dont produce nearly the force advertised
review: The resistance bands don't give anywhere near the advertised resistance.I'm 5'11" and a 30lb band gives around 15lb of weight when tested with a luggage scale stretched out from foot to fully extended arm, 7lb when at a bicep curl distance.I expected to get 180lbs of resistance when using all 6 bands, but with these numbers it's gonna be more like 90lb.Resistance band issue aside, the package arrived damaged and looked like it was previously opened and the items just thrown back in the box (the outer amazon box itself was undamaged and unopened)The bar itself looks and feels good, nice and sturdy, the outer material feels comfortable to grip. If the resistance bands were the advertised weight it might be worth 5 stars.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 March 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Seems good
review: Has worked out good for me since the workout items were delivered.  Will it hold up?  Can’t answer that right now.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 September 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Great value for what you get
review: Have a personal training business. We often order kits our clients can take home to mimic some of the exercises done in our gym.  This set comes with plenty decent bands and all the attachments you could want.  I like how they got thicker door stoppers so it is less likely to damage doors. Also the Foot/Shoe attachments are great for my clients who may otherwise have disabilities making it difficult to use a traditional ankle strap.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 25 January 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Doesn’t screw all the way together
review: It’s a great value however I received a faulty part. I can’t screw the end piece on any further than what’s shown. This faulty end looks different than the other side that screwed in easily.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 January 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: The bands are too long
review: I like everything but I’m 6’1 and the bands are to long for some of the exercises, if you could adjust them it would be a lot better
date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 June 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Bar problems with product
review: I just purchased the product and so far I'm enjoying the system. The one flaw is the bar has a problem with the screw together system, one side does not work as the screw side is to small to thread and the other side will screw in but is not holding. So beware of this problem
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 October 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Nice
review: First workout and it kicked my butt well worth the money

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: fine

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Bar is heavy and perfect length for a wide guy like myself
review: I very impressed about the weight and length of the resistance bar. I’m a fairly wide man and I can get a firm over my shoulders grip…..great choice plus the bands are well made and have a good resistance. Complete 5 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on 25 March 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: It’s a real workout!
review: It’s as advertised. I’ve been using it almost every morning. The only thing I wished it had is a video showing all the exercises. It’s great for the mature person, like myself, that’s trying to get active again.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 March 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Missing the middle bar -
review: Would have been a great review if all the pieces were there .

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Full body workout
review: I'm about 5ft 10in and the bands are a little long, but when I cross them they worked. I'd suggest if anything  sending different size bands. Also, you have to use all 3 bars or none at all. You can't make it so you use 1 or 2 bars. This would be incredibly effective. But when used properly this thi g whoops my butt. If you're under 5ft 5in you may struggle to get resistance.

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Good kit bungees are very short
review: Good kit bungees are very short
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 April 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Quality issue with bar
review: I received my order today. Everything looks good, except the eyes on the ends of the bars. They are super loose. They wiggle, push in and out and I’m sure if I applied enough pressure to them, they would snap. I tried spinning them in hoping they would tighten inside, but no luck.I honestly do not feel comfortable using the bar. I’m sure those metal clips wouldn’t feel too good with the SnapBack resistance.If there is anyway I could get a good replacement bar sent out, I may just keep it. Otherwise I will be sending it back for a refund unfortunately. Everything else seems to be good quality, it’s just the eye hooks at both sides of the bar.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 January 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: A Great Value for the Money
review: This is exceptionally well made. Great portable gym for a low cost. I will order another one so as to increase the weight bands for exercises such as squats.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 May 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: I like it
review: Good workout, easy to assemble and lots of tension!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 December 2022

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Poor quality
review: I’ve been using it regularly for 4 months now. Why the poor rating? I have to be careful when using it. The clasps come loose from the bar and rebound at high speeds. This has happened over a dozen times. It’s happened so often with one band that I’ve marked it. I would stop using the band if I didn’t need all of the bands for a solid workout. Also you can’t do all of the exercises as displayed in the chart. There just isn’t enough resistance. For example, if you try to do the row exercise, there is still slack on the bands. I have work-around but if they show an exercise I shouldn’t have to figure out an alternative. I’ve tried to contact this company and Amazon about getting replacements, but all I hear are crickets.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 January 2023

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Excelente
review: De muy buena calidad

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: Band not good enough the rest of equipment great
review: I gave 3 stars because of the band. The band don't feel right it doesn't have enough elasticity. And it should have different strength/weight. Other than that the idea is great and the rest of the equipment is excellent

prod_name: INNOCEDAR Home Gym Bar Kit with Resistance Bands
title: It’s totally a complete compact gym and I’m loving it
review: So far I like everything with the sturdiness and the flexibility. It really gets all body parts a workout. Definitely a great value for the money.

title: As advertised
review: Sturdy, well built, functional for a variety of exercises. Good addition to support your workouts.

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Perfect for beginners
review: I love this! I got in shape in no time. It's not "cheaply" made, it's awesome!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 February 2024

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: So many additional pieces
review: There’s pretty much nothing you can’t do with this product. There is a ton of additional pieces and pop ins and add ins. It was really a great buy and adorably pink! Also comes with nylon pink bag to hold accessories together
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 February 2024

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: It’s decent
review: The plastic doesn’t feel as sturdy as I would hope and I feel like it could snap in half with enough pressure applied. It doesn’t slip on the wood flooring so that’s a plus. Some of the slots were really hard to fit the handles into and the extras are just ok but I would use my own straps to be safe especially the resistance bands.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 September 2023

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Quality
review: The board has a lot of functions but it does slide
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 November 2023

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Great
review: Super easy to set up and put away, I use it in my home office and it doesn't take up much space. I can do a multitude of workouts and then put everything away neatly.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 October 2023

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Great workout!
review: I purchased the push-up board as a birthday gift for my friend, and she absolutely loves it. She uses it to have a great workout right at home without having to go to the gym. The board is easy to fold and comes in a simple packaging that all fits in the included duffle bag.  Great for on the go as well.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 31 May 2023

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Great Quality
review: Bought this for my wife, quality is good. Highly recommend
date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 September 2023

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: All in 1
review: Love this set! All equipment you needed to use while working out at home and very affordable. I never thought that i will have this in one purchase. I love using this set! And it also comes with a bag to put everything and you can bring it anywhere you want to workout.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 April 2023

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Nice workout set!
review: I like this workout kit. Pink is super cute. I got this Becuse I want to excise my shoulders, arms, abs, abdominal muscles.so I do not have to go gym three time a week . I can just stay home and work out any time I want . This set is easy to use and easy to store. The quality is better than I expected. I carry the board and bands with me when I send my daughter to dance class . So I can workout in waiting room while I am waiting for my daughter . I do enjoy it so much !
date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 July 2022

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Amazing Buy
review: Great buy and able to use when wanting to work out at home and not the gym.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 July 2023

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Easy for beginners
review: I like that it so sturdy and wasy to use even when I haven't done any exercise in a few years.  My health has put it on very slow. Stenosis puts your bones and mussels  on hold and everything hurts. Especially in the mornings.  But this system is gonna do the trick for me I believe.  Thankyou for your help and support 🙏
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 December 2022

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Polyvalent
review: I bought it for my pregnant daughter, she's into fitness, she love it, very polyvalent, can do à lot of her exercise while pregnant and after
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 May 2023

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Questionably sturdy.
review: Although I’m supposed to use the board for push-ups, it seems as if the middle will cave in. Otherwise the features are as described. The instructions are oddly vague.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 April 2023

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: So easy to use!!!
review: This set is so easy to use, and you break a good sweat! Definitely worth the money! I use it every single day & LOVE how you can adjust the push up board to workout specific muscles! Amazing!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 31 December 2022

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Fits my expectation perfectly!!
review: This fits my expectation perfectly! Everything looks exactly the same as what's in the picture. Even provided a training guide labeling which muscles are being practiced with which instruments. Now I definitely don't have an excuse to not work out since I got all these things at home. Can't wait to start exercising.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 July 2022

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Happy 😊😊😊
review: Exactly what I was looking for! Happy to far😊. Very sturdy and easy to use.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 February 2023

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Great value set
review: This set comes with so many items for a great price. Everything that came in the set was high quality and super cute as well! The push-up board is cool and a good way to get some more variety in at-home workouts.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 July 2022

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Poor quality.
review: If you are looking for quality equipment that will last and help you stay/get in shape do not buy this.The only worthwhile part of this was the training base/pushup board and core sliders, even then they are mediocre at best.The 8 shape yoga band came with dents in it and has little to no resistance, the same with the resistance bands. The hip bands are flimsy and not very durable, as well as they will constantly slide down. Lastly, the training guide has incorrect info, as well as no training.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 December 2022

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: I like this product
review: I like everything  about this product
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 March 2023

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Very Cute!
review: Super cute workout gear!! These were the perfect addition to my home workout gym. I wanted something pink and pretty, and the resistance band stretches great and has't broken yet.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 9 August 2022

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Very good product
review: Great home workout kitI love this workout kit. It is beautifully made, easy to use, and got decent quality. Got me right started !
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 July 2022

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Works for EDS
review: I have a connective tissue disorder called Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome. My doctor approved this and it works well with my prescribed exercises
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 August 2022

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Push up set
review: I was really excited about this but it is very flimsy for being made to support someone, it sounds like its going to break and creaks alot
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 April 2023

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Cheap

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board
title: Very nice set
review: Everything in this set is great 👍 sturdy and durable. Good quality

prod_name: LALAHIGH Push Up Board

I was scasred the ropes and bands were going to snap in mid workout, used it once and packed it back up for a return and refund that same evening. Even the board is rickety and weak at the hinges, thought it was going to snap being on it....SAVE YOUR MONEY, THE PRICE IS NOT WORTH IT!
