prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Matching the expectations!
review: Really good for home exercise!

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Très bien
review: Je les utilise pratiquement tous les jours ils n'ont pas bougé d'un poil, la résistance est bonne, on peut les accrocher partout, pratique pour les entraînements en intérieur comme en extérieur, les poignées sont hyper pratiques et solides.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Una palestra da viaggio
review: Mi alleno spesso coi pesi a casa, ma vivendo in posti diversi per ragioni di studio e avendo un solo set di pesi cercavo qualcosa di leggero da portarmi sempre dietro. Durante la quarantena ho scoperto queste resistance band che hanno rivoluzionato la mia routine di allenamento. Ho propeso per queste per il prezzo (non sapendo se mi ci sarei trovato bene ho comprato le più economiche). Sono di buona fattura e sono ancora integre e non hanno perso resistenza. Ho notato solamente che in alcune si è impressa una piega esattamente a metà, dovuta probabilmente a un mio non corretto utilizzo, ma questa non ha compromesso le caratteristiche di base. Le manopole e i supporti per le caviglie sono comode, l'attrezzo per attaccarle alla porta molto utile.Consigliato per tutti i livelli di preparazione.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Excellent quality
review: Excellent quality
date: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 24 March 2021

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Very good all rounder
review: Good quality and works effectively
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 February 2024

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Recomendables
review: Las compré porque me las recomendó mi fisio y la verdad que estoy contenta con ellas. Parecen muy resistentes y trae los elementos necesarios para adaptarlas a diferentes posiciones y poder hacer diferentes ejercicios

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Bra
review: Gör det de ska. Lite långa, men passar nog perfekt om man inte är lika kort som jag😁

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Set funcional
review: El set de bandas elásticas trae 5 gomas de diferentes resistencias, desde la más ''light'' (amarilla) hasta la más resistente (negra). Relación calidad precio es correcto, viendo el precio de otros artículos similares en Amazon y por el momento no se han roto (editaré el comentario más adelante si esto sucede). Trae correas y anclaje para puerta, por lo que es versátil para poder ejercitar diferentes grupos musculares con diferentes ejercicios. Trae un folleto con algunos ejercicios de referencia.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Kann ich empfehlen.....
review: So also, die Griffe könnten stabiler sein.Aber im großen und ganzen ist es ein sehr gutes Produkt für den Preis.Hanteln sind halt doch viel teurer und zur Überbrückung, bis die Studios aufmachen auf jeden Fall eine super Alternative.Ich kann sie Guten Gewissen empfehlen, geeignet für Bizeps, Triezebs und auch leichtere Rücken, Brust, Waden Trainings.Also Daumen hoch.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: easy gym in house
review: great to start fitness at home, many youtube videos have routines with Resistance Bands.could have been more stiffer the bands
date: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 15 September 2021

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Fragile
review: Certains élastiques ont cassées très rapidement

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Ottimo prodotto per l'allenamento domestico
review: Ho acquistato questo set di elastici per aumentare sia di numero che di intensità gli esercizi che si possono fare in un ambiente domestico e le aspettative non sono state tradite.Il numero di esercizi che si possono fare con questo attrezzo è praticamente illimitato, proprio per questo motivo richiede un minimo di programmazione, sia per il tipo di esercizio che per il numero di elastici da usare, in modo tale da non perdere tempo durante l'attività fisica. Ma una volta trovati gli esercizi che si vogliono fare e trovato il numero giusto di elastici fa il suo lavoro. Un aspetto negativo, ma intrinseco nella natura fisica dell'elastico, è che la resistenza che offre cambia a seconda della tensione applicata e questo può risultare un po' scomodo in certi esercizi o anche per una migliore ripetibilità degli stessi.Nel complesso è un attrezzo che mi sento di consigliare, permette di fare tanti esercizi a un prezzo davvero basso, però non aspettatevi la resa o la comodità di una palestra.Per quanto riguarda questo specifico prodotto presenta alcuni componenti un po' cheap come le fascette e i moschettoni, ma al momento è solo una sensazione perchè non si è ancora rovinato nulla. Un secondo ancoraggio da porta/finestra sarebbe stato comodo per poter avere maggiore velocità nel cambio esercizio in un'unica sessione di allenamento (un ancoraggio basso e un altro alto sarebbe comodo) ma organizzandosi ce la si fa.Concludendo, per il prezzo al quale si può comprare, lo consiglio e ne sono soddisfatto.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Does the job
review: Exactly what was needed. Quality good and great price.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 January 2024

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Très bien
review: Les résistances sont bonnes

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Horrible
review: 3 of the 5 have the same strength, are completely weak! Do not get it!

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: A good value item for the price range and quality.
review: I bought this item for my mother, who as she reaches her middle years has decided to do some fitness workouts.These Resistance bands provide an easy, stress free and gym free way for her to get in her exercise.The bands are the perfect range of weight for a woman in her early 50s and feel strong and intuitive to use, the door wedge and hand holds are also very useful and expand the way my mother is able to workout.My only gripe is the quality of the bag and the exercise instruction manual are somewhat lacking compared to the rest of the set.All in all a very impressive set for the price range and certainly a good way for a Middle aged woman to ease herself into exercise - although if you’re particularly fit you may be looking for something with more resistance.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 August 2023

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Resistenti e professionali
review: Li utilizzo da parecchio, posso dire che dopo mesi non si sono ancora usurati, certo è che però, essendo elastici bisogna saperli usare, potrebbe staccarsi un elastico in tensione, per cui raccomanderei l'utilizzo a chi già sa farne uso nella giusta postura

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Un kit para hacer ejercicio en casa a un precio más que asequible.
reviewer: Veramente belli, arrivati nei tempi previsti e resistenti anche all'acqua
review: Lo compré para hacer ejercicio en casa los días que no pueda ir al gimnasio o para cuando vaya de viaje.Cuando recibo el paquete me encuentro con los siguientes elementos:- 5 bandas elásticas de diferente elasticidad: Amarilla < Verde < Roja < Azul < Negra. Cada banda dispone de un gancho de anclaje en cada extremo para poder insertar los siguientes accesorios:o 2 empuñaduras de goma y 2 correas para anclar las bandas a nuestros tobillos.o 1 anclaje para enganchar las bandas a una puerta o ventana.- Además, el pack incluye una bolsa para guardar todo el material (muy útil especialmente para llevarlo a cualquier parte contigo) y una guía con algunos ejemplos de ejercicios.- Los materiales parecen resistentes, látex, nylon y metal, las empuñaduras se encuentran recubiertas de un acolchado que las hace realmente cómodas.Si buscas en internet podrás encontrar multitud de ejercicios aparte de los que ya explica en el papel que incluye el kit.¿Recomendado?Sí, totalmente. Le doy 5 estrellas porque realmente me parece muy buen equipamiento por un precio ridículo.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Élastique de sport
review: Moyenne qualité

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: No muy buenas
review: En si las gomas están bien, son de buena calidad y traen una bolsita de tela para guardarlas; el problema aquí es la resistencia que ofrecen;se supone que son gomas para estirar y que, almenos, te cueste un poco pero yo, siendo una mujer de menos de 50kg y que no hace ejercicio de forma habitual no he obtenido los resultados que se suponían incluso con la más dura.En definitiva, no sirven para entrenar y la única forma de que ofrezcan un poco de resistencia es estirarla mucho. :(

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Kein ernst zu nehmendes Sportgerät
review: Dieses Produkt ist in meinen Augen für Reha-Sport oder totale Anfänger bedingt geeignet. Die Länge der Bänder passt für mich (168cm), die Griffe sind angenehm in der Hand. Das waren aber auch schon die Vorteile.Warum ich das Produkt nicht empfehlen kann und auch nicht mehr kaufen würde: Die Griffe sind für breitere Männerhände vermutlich zu schmal. Die Widerstandskraft ist so gering, dass die Bänder eher als Spielzeug anmuten denn als Sportgerät. Selbst das schwarze "heavy" lässt sich so mühelos dehnen, dass ich keinen Trainingseffekt daraus erkennen kann.Nimmt man alle Bänder zusammen entsteht ein Trainings-Widerstand, mit dem man leichte Übungen durchführen kann. Die Enden/Halterungen der Bänder sehen nicht sehr vertrauenswürdig und nicht lange haltbar aus.Der Versand war rasch, die Ware gut verpackt.Vom Produkt selbst bin ich jedoch enttäuscht und empfehle es nicht weiter, da kein/kaum Widerstands-Effekt.Das schreibe ich als mitteltrainierte Frau in den 50igern.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Buone bande elastiche, funzionali e resistenti ma poco scivolose.
review: Ho comperato queste bande elastiche per potermi esercitare senza utilizzare attrezzature.Grazie a i vari agganci e alla versatilità di poter scegliere quali bande utilizzare, il prodotto garantisce un'ottima flessibilità ad ogni livello di fitness e forza.Dal punto di vista della qualità' mi ritengo soddisfatto anche considerando il prezzo modico ma onestamente ho in passato provato bande che avevano un livello di elasticità leggermente superiore e quindi garantivano movimenti più ampi. Ho inoltre notato che il materiale di queste bande e' particolarmente aderente e in alcuni esercizi la mancanza totale di scorrimento tra le bande e i vari agganci limita ulteriormente un movimento fluido e continuo.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Good for beginners and seniors
review: I bought these resistance bands for strength training as I am a senior and don't particularly want to join the lycra-lithe at the gym. The bands are graded from very light to heavy. I started on the lightest (yellow) but needed to grade up as it was too light but can see that the lightest would be great for someone recovering from an illness, etc. I then started on the red band and used that for some weeks before progressing to the blue band. However, I aim to stay with the blue for a while as they can be tremendously deceptive. You really don't feel as if you are making an impact but, believe me, you are. I have found them easy to use and very flexible and have been following an exercise regime on YouTube specifically designed for my age group. I do prefer the tubes with handles as they seem more stable and don't give you whipped buttocks like the bands do if they slip...... Yes, I have had that experience and it really hurts! I would recommend these for anyone thinking of starting out to getting fit and they seem to have received favourable reviews when comparing them against gym equipment. Easier to use, portable, and the same benefits eventually.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 December 2023

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: The handles are poor quality
review: Although I was using all 5 bands together for most exercises, I would have expected the plastic in the handles not too bend and split after a few months.I'm careul not to overstretch the bands themselves, so no damage to those so far, but it's tricky using these bands without one of the handles. I can still use the ankle straps as an alternative for multiple bands but they're not a great substitiute. For single band workouts, you can hold the band itself (the coloured rubber part).I think I'll try the "loop" bands. No handle to break.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 December 2023

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Un pack muy útil y completo
review: Es un pack muy completo que incluye:5 cintas elásticas de diferentes resistencias: 4.5 Kg (la cinta amarilla), 6.8 Kg (roja), 9.1 Kg (Azul), 11.3 Kg (Verde) y 13.6 Kg (Negra).Varios accesorios: 2 mangos de gomaespuma, 2 correas ajustables con belcro para los tobillos, 1 correa con un tope para colocar en la puertaUna bolsa para guardar todo.Y una tabla con 30 ejercicios para realizar, pero si buscas por internet hay infinidad de ellos.La calidad me parece muy buena, las cintas son muy flexibles y resistentes. Las uso prácticamente todos los días y, por ahora, no presentan ningún tipo de defecto o desgaste.Además ocupan poquísimo espacio. Se recoge todo en la bolsa y se puede guardar fácilmente en cualquier sitio o transportarlas como mucha comodidad.Son realmente útiles si no tienes tiempo o no quieres ir a un gimnasio. La mayoria de los ejercicios requieren muy poco espacio para realizarlos.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Sprint in pandemia!
review: In Pandemia ho avuto la necessità di iniziare un po' di attività fisica in casa. Tuttavia con il tempo la semplice corsetta non era più abbastanza. Ho scelto queste bande elastiche perchè mi sembravano particolarmente adatte all'uso che dovevo farne. Con il supporto di un video preso dal web ma anche dal libretto illustrativo al suo interno, do un approccio diverso all'esercizio fisico, non è più un corpo libero, non hai l'ingombro dei pesi e sono esercizi equilibrati in rapporto al tuo peso e alla forza che puoi metterci.All'interno ho trovato:5x elastici di diverse resistenze1x sacchetto per contenerle2x maniglie ergonomiche2x fasce con velcro1x gancio per bloccare le corde allo stipite della porte1x librettoLo consiglio assolutamente!

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Top
review: Good!

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Top
review: Rien a dire conforme et bien emballer conforme livré avant la date

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: comodi ma poco robusti
review: comodi per un allenamento casalingo ma poco durevoli...

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Tolles Home Workoutequipment
review: In diesen zeiten sind wir irgendwie alle fast gezwungen auf Home Workout umzusteigen.Kurzhanteln und etwas Trainingsequipment hatte ich schon, also habe ich mir die Bänder bestellt.Lieferung war super schnell.Schon beim Auspacken fiel mir für den Preis die gute Verpackung incl. Beutel zum Verstauen ins Auge.Die Bänder machen einen stabilen Eindruck und man kann sehr vielseitig damit Trainieren.Habe sie jetzt seit knap einen Monat im Dauereinsatz mit hohem Wiederstand und sie halten perfekt und zeigen keinerlei schwächen.Für diesen Preis bin ich sehr zufrieden damit.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Perfectas para entrenar en cualquier sitio
review: Compré este pack de bandas por si sucede otra cuarentena y para tener material para entrenar. Al final estoy usando más estas gomas que yendo al gimnasio. Son muy cómodas de transportar a cualquier sitio.Gracias a su múltiples accesorios que trae tiene muchas facilidades para poder entrenar todas las partes del cuerpo. Para destacar la cinta que se usa para poner en la parte superior de la puerta. Me ha parecido muy útil. Las gomas se ven de buena calidad y duraderas. Calidad precio lo veo muy buen producto.Muy recomendable

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Great value for money!!
review: Half the price of similar items I've seen in the shops or online.  Handy bag to store away. Very happy with my purchase.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 January 2024

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Pas mal en rapport qualité-prix
review: J'ai aimé la composition du kit .Par contre, les élastiques semblent fragiles .A voir à l'usage

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Ist einen Kauf wehrt
review: Ich hab mir die Dinger zum Selbstversuch gekauft undzss sagen,sehr gute Geschichte. Mir persönlich gefällt Verarbeitung und leichte Handhabung ,ist vielseitig und nimmt keinen Platz weg.Leider leider leider gibt es ein paar kleine Kritikpunkte: in der beiliegenden Beschreibung sind nicht wirklich viele Übungen abgebildet; das Zuggewicht der einzelnen Bänder ( sollte dies unterschiedlich existieren)hätte man Kennzeichnen können; ob Einzelteile nachbestellt werden können ist auch nicht ersichtlich......desswegen nur 4/5 Sternen ABER....trotz allem.sehr gutes Preis Leistungsverhältnis

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Conforme à la description
review: Impeccable pour faire ses exercices, bon rapport/qualité-prix.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Gym addition
review: Ideal for our Boxing Gym, will get some good use.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 February 2024

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Buena calidad y facilidad de uso.
review: Razonable relación calidad/precio y facilidad de uso.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: OK. Easy to transport if you wanted a workout while away
review: These are ok to do a little workout on days I cant get to the gym but i wouldn't use to replace on a regular basisEasy to useAdapter provided to pop over a door for more exercises/rangeBox is a bit naff. A nice little bag would be handy to  transport and store. (Easily purchased or made i am sure)Several cables for different abilities and execises but not awfully tough so good enough for a lighter workout or just for a nice stretch.Great if you are homebound, a beginner or want to taje away/top up on days you can't get to the gym.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 December 2023

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Ottimi elastici
review: Un ottimo set di elastici, ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Gut geeignet als platzsparende Ergänzung zu Home Workouts
review: Ich habe mir die Bänder zu Beginn des zweiten Lockdowns gekauft um nicht wieder während der Schließung der Fitnessstudios zur Couch Potato zu mutieren. Mittlerweile habe ich einige Workouts damit hinter mir und muss sagen: Für dem Preis absolut unschlagbar. Zwar nicht so gut wie ein richtiges Fitnessstudio aber grade wenn man zuhause zumindest ein paar Übungen machen möchte ist das eine gute Investition. Übungen wie Rudern oder Pushdowns gehen damit problemlos, auch für Extrabelastung bei kniebeugen und Liegestützen kann man die Bänder verwenden. Ebenfalls positiv anzumerken ist wie stabil die Bänder sind.

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Ejercicio en casa
review: El juego se compone de cinco bandas de resistencia, cada una de ellas con diferente peso. Trae además dos tipos de agarre distinto, para usarse en distintos tipos de entrenamiento. También trae un anclaje de puerta que es realmente útil para trabajar ejercicios de pecho, abdominales, hombros o tríceps.No conocía este tipo de herramientas para hacer ejercicio y, personalmente, me han encantado. Además de que son muy cómodas de transportar

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Efficace à 1000%
review: Súper produit. Je recommande fortement surtout en cette période où les salles sont fermé, les haltères sont très cher, ceci est un moyen parfait pour les remplacer et faire même plus de choses avec, les accessoires fournie avec permette de travailler tout le corps, tout en pouvant régler le force à effectuer. Franchement y’a pas mieux pour faire son sport à la maison !

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band
title: Fine for a gentle workout while watching TV
review: The equipment is relatively inexpensive but does the job. Tubes can be combined for more resistance. The accessories are useful. Could have done with a more comprehensive user guide. The one supplied sells the equipment's versatility short. Easy to use - ten minutes as often as you like throughout the day.Can be used anywhere.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 December 2023

prod_name: Resistance Bands Set of 5 with Handle Strength Exercise Resistance Band

prod_name: VEICK Resistance Bands for Working Out
title: Super sturdy and great
review: Do exactly what’s needed have held up over the last few months being shut in doors and having dogs run off with them. Overall fantastic and I love the colors.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 February 2024

prod_name: VEICK Resistance Bands for Working Out
title: 懸垂の補助
review: 懸垂の補助に使用｡補助を着ける事でフォームを意識できる。徐々にベルトの色を変えて補助を軽くして最終的には補助無しで懸垂が出来る様になれる様に頑張ります。

prod_name: VEICK Resistance Bands for Working Out
title: Fitnissbänder
review: Sehr haltbar und die Lieferung ging sehr schnell. Bin sehr zufrieden.

prod_name: VEICK Resistance Bands for Working Out
title: Item received is not as pictured
review: I received 4 bands that you have to attach to handles and they range from 10-50lbs instead of 10-150lbs and they are poor quality.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 March 2023

prod_name: VEICK Resistance Bands for Working Out
title: what I was hoping for
review: Strong bands that will really last

prod_name: VEICK Resistance Bands for Working Out

review: フォーム確認に良い負荷が掛からない黄色やトレーニング用の高負荷紫色まで４タイプある割に価格がリーズナブル

prod_name: VEICK Resistance Bands for Working Out
title: Veick Resistance Band
review: Purchased a set of Veick Resistance Band.  They are very durable, sturdy bands.  My only minor issue, is the storage bag could’ve been bigger, as I find myself trying to manipulate them back into the tightly small storage bag.  4 1/2 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 April 2023

prod_name: VEICK Resistance Bands for Working Out
title: Product as described
review: Very good quality my son use them every day and work perfectly.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 February 2024

prod_name: VEICK Resistance Bands for Working Out
title: Excellent Bands!
review: Have wall gym Anchors I will use this product with.These bands are really solid.  I will enjoy this product very much !!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 9 January 2024

prod_name: VEICK Resistance Bands for Working Out
title: チンニングの補助に最適
review: 1番太い紫のゴムをチンニングの補助に使ってます。最初は足に引っかけるのが大変でしたが慣れれば自力でまず片方の膝にかけ、逆の足を入れてグリグリやると足首付近までいけます。全くできなかった小学5年の子供が1週間で狭い持ち手のフォームで3回できるようになり、その1週間後には一回もできなかった肩幅以上のフォームでも3回できるようになりました。出来るようになると楽しくて、暇さえあれば懸垂してます。買ってよかった。もちろんゴムくさいですが慣れました。

prod_name: VEICK Resistance Bands for Working Out

prod_name: EZ Curl Bar - Heavy Weight Training Accessory Designed for Total Gym
title: Great
review: Bought for a Totalgym XLS.  Does the trick.  Prefer it to single handles for some movements.  Just a word of warning, one of the clips popped off mid movement.  No big deal but be aware of it.  Would recommend.

prod_name: EZ Curl Bar - Heavy Weight Training Accessory Designed for Total Gym
title: The grip is amazing
review: Very Good Part to go with the Total Gym. Great Seller and Service. Thank you.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 December 2020

prod_name: EZ Curl Bar - Heavy Weight Training Accessory Designed for Total Gym
title: Perfect for Evo Gym
review: I love this product ! it has such a great feel to it ! The grip is very easy on the hands yet still very grippy when you need it to be ! It's the PERFECT size for my "Tower 200" !

prod_name: EZ Curl Bar - Heavy Weight Training Accessory Designed for Total Gym
title: Fits perfect on my bowflex
review: I bought this specifically to use with my Evo Gym so my review will be geared towards that. It’s the same width as the Evo Gym platform. The padding on the bar is comfortable and the bends are in just the right places. I’ve been using this primarily for bicep curls, upright rows and tricep push downs, but it works fine for squats as well.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 November 2023

prod_name: EZ Curl Bar - Heavy Weight Training Accessory Designed for Total Gym
title: good tension, easy to put together
review: Strong comfortable

prod_name: EZ Curl Bar - Heavy Weight Training Accessory Designed for Total Gym
title: Vert good
review: This Weider work out machine is great. I'm 5'1 and it worked good for me. And I can tell when this carona virus is over and people can come to my house again,  It will also work for one of my Grandsons who is 6'6.  I love that you can start out with light weight's and work your way up. And the bungie tension increaser is easy to change. You will want more weight when using your legs.  I put this together all by myself, not bad for a 72 year old woman. If I can do it you can do it.  I am so happy with this machine.Oh yes, I recommend buying the work out bar that is sold seperately.

prod_name: EZ Curl Bar - Heavy Weight Training Accessory Designed for Total Gym
title: This is what Bowflex should have invented
review: Now I can finally do a decent incline bench press on my Bowflex Revolution. The alternative was to use the provided hand straps. When you put the Revo's arms down low there is no slack in the lines, so if you need to add a lot of weight you might need a spotter to lift the bar off the bench to slide under it, or buy more links to give you more slack. Of course, you could simply buy a weight bar/weights and use the Bowflex bench, but whatever.I checked the two end screws before using after seeing a review where one screw broke off. On mine, one screw was loose and could be turned by hand. I suspect that might have caused that screw to break off as reported by the other reviewer. So check yours before using.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 February 2021

I love using the EZ curl bar. . . it's quick and easy to attach and makes my core feel well worked.  A worthwhile purchase and not too expensive. Is one of my new favorite attachments and not too costly.  I recommend this item.

prod_name: EZ Curl Bar - Heavy Weight Training Accessory Designed for Total Gym
title: Great addition for bowflex PR1000
review: I’ve been looking for a curl bar for a while to go with my Bowflex PR1000. The Bowflex is great but with the 1000, there aren’t many attachments that accommodate it. However, when I came across this curl bar, I went ahead and ordered it. It came in promptly and works like a charm. I love how it has latches on both sides so it works with the PR1000 like a charm.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 March 2021

prod_name: EZ Curl Bar - Heavy Weight Training Accessory Designed for Total Gym
title: Disappointed on design
review: As far as an easy bar, this product is fine, it'll do the job. However, after using this for less than a month, one side bolt that holds the carbineer in place pulled out of the threads. Understand I'm using this with a bowflex, so we aren't talking solid weight stress. Looking at the design, the bolt that holds the carabineer in place is not correct size. There is a shoulder on the bolt that should tighten up against the threaded insert inside the bar, allowing the carabineer to rotate on the shoulder freely, which would allow you to do the arc of a curl etc. But the carabineer is pinched between the bolt head and the easy bar, before the shoulder tightens against the threaded insert. When you pull the weight, there carabineer turns, which in turn rotates the bolt ever so slightly. After time, the bolt gets loose, then it pulled out. I had to rethread the bolt and the threaded insert, but it still is incorrect bolt. Only way I can make the shoulder of the bolt butt up against the threaded insert is too grind some of the easy bar off, allowing the bolt shoulder to reach the threaded insert. To much hassle for what it costs. I'm disappointed. This easy bar would have failed much sooner if I was using actual weight instead of a bowflex.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 March 2021

prod_name: EZ Curl Bar - Heavy Weight Training Accessory Designed for Total Gym
title: You may Quickly Get Attached to this Attachment...
review: I only gave it 4 out of 5 stars because the handle came with a few indentations and scratch marks on it (see pictures).  Other than that the bar is well made and easy to use.  Comes with around 6 inches of wire cord and quick clips that are easy to attach.  This is perfect for 2 handed bicep curls, preacher curls, tricep skull crushers, reverse grip skull crushers, and upper chest pullovers.  Decent price for a solid attachment for the Total Gym.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 March 2020

prod_name: EZ Curl Bar - Heavy Weight Training Accessory Designed for Total Gym
title: Thrilled with this bar
review: I'm using this on my Total Gym and I couldn't be happier with it.Arthritis in my shoulders and wrists forced me to stop using free weights. Switching to the Total Gym let me get back to resistance training but then arthritis in my CMC joints (lowest thumb joint near the wrist) was being aggravated using the individual hand grips on that apparatus. Switching over to the EZ Curl Bar has alleviated all the pain I was experiencing and I can do both pulling AND pushing exercises with it.I love it! Highest rating and highly recommended.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 April 2020

prod_name: EZ Curl Bar - Heavy Weight Training Accessory Designed for Total Gym

review: Great attachment for my Total Gym Fit, comfortable grip & seems to be made well! The regular handles attached to the cables were causing pain to my wrists when I do bicep curls & the ez curl bar solved that problem for me!I paid the current prize of $50 & my friends tell me it was $30 pre pandemic. So I know this was overpriced! Oh well ...

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Prodotto inutile
review: Attenzione la versione da 15kg sarebbe il totale di 2 manubri e non del singolo, ho verificato con bilancia di precisione ed ha un peso effettivo di 7,1kg per manubrio quindi insieme non arriva a 15kg.Dalle foto poi c’è immagine di un uomo che si allena, ma scusate ma con pesi da 7 kg non sono sufficienti nemmeno per mia nonna di 70 anni…Articolo completamente in plastica e considerando il il peso davvero ridotto non vale nemmeno il prezzo speso, peccato per la perdita di tempo.  Se posso permettermi di dare consiglio, obblighiamo i venditori a dare informazioni precise e verificate e non fuorvianti  in modo che gli acquisti siano più ponderati e si eviti perdite di tempo e resi inutili e di conseguenza inquinare meno il mondo….Spero che almeno il reso non faccia perdere ulteriore tempo.Non acquisterò mai più articoli di questo tipo.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo.
review: Se stai cercando un modo per allenarti con pesi a casa, i bilancieri regolabili potrebbero essere la scelta perfetta per te. In particolare, i bilancieri regolabili con tubo di collegamento multifunzione, di colore nero e rosso e con pesi da 1kg e 1,25kg, sono un'ottima opzione per chi cerca un prodotto versatile, facile da usare e dal prezzo accessibile.La cosa migliore dei bilancieri regolabili è la loro capacità di adattarsi alle tue esigenze di allenamento. Con la possibilità di regolare il peso dei dischi, puoi personalizzare il tuo allenamento in base alla tua forza e ai diversi esercizi che vuoi fare. Inoltre, il tubo di collegamento multifunzione ti consente di fare una varietà di esercizi.La qualità dei bilancieri regolabili è fondamentale per assicurarti di ottenere il massimo dei risultati dal tuo allenamento. Fortunatamente, questi bilancieri sembrano avere un'ottima qualità-prezzo, con materiali resistenti e durevoli che ti permetteranno di allenarti senza problemi. Inoltre, la facilità di intercambio dei pesi rende questi bilancieri molto convenienti da usare, anche durante l'allenamento.In sintesi, se stai cercando un modo per allenarti con pesi a casa, i bilancieri regolabili con tubo di collegamento multifunzione, sono un'ottima opzione. Con la loro capacità di adattarsi alle tue esigenze di allenamento, la loro qualità-prezzo e la facilità di intercambio dei pesi, questi bilancieri ti permetteranno di ottenere il massimo dei risultati dal tuo allenamento di forza.Do 3 stelle perché i pesi non arrivano a 10kg. I pesi descritti sono fuorvianti

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Bilanciere e manubri
review: Mi sembra un ottimo compromesso tra un attrezzo casalingo ed uno professionale. Per gli esercizi che devo fare io è perfetto, allenandomi da casa, ho preso quello da 10kg anche se.probabilmente non li userò mai tutti. Mi sembra ovvio che se dovete fare i "culturisti" e sbattete il bilanciere in terra i pesi possono spaccarsi, non è un attrezzo professionale, ma è molto valido per allenarsi a casa, e basterebbe avere un po' di delicatezza nel poggiarli. Per l'uso che ne devo fare io è perfetto e vale il prezzo pagato!

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: buoni ma non troppo resistenti
review: il prezzo è buono, l'unico difetto che ho riscontrato è la scarsa resistenza, per risolvere il problema basta non sbattere i pesi con forza o lanciarli per il resto è un buon prodotto che aiuta a stare in forma

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Gut..
review: Einfach praktisch, gut für Einsteiger..

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Top
review: Muito bom

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Sencillo pero completo
review: Barra y mancuernas en un mismo pack. Que cumplen con lo esperado. No se sueltan, y el material me parece adecuado si lo quieres usar en casa, ya que no daña el suelo.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Riecht extrem nach Plastik
review: Schlechte Verarbeitung und extremer Plastikgeruch, der auch nach Wochen nicht nachlässt. Hat in der Realität wenig mit den Produktbildern zu tun, Matte Plastikoberfläche und Gussgrate.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Benissimo
review: Penso per donna va benissimo.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Precio y utilidad
review: Por el precio de prácticamente una mancuerna tienes este kit que puedes mejorar con discos adicionales del mismo fabricante o incluso del Decathlon.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Bom equilibrio preço qualidade.
review: Na primeira remessa, um dos pesos do conjunto estava danificado e a perder areia. A questão foi resolvida prontamente pelo vendedor que enviou um conjunto novo sem demoras, nem burocracias. Excelente serviço pós-venda.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Pesas
review: Brutal calidad super buena al precio que esta muy contento👌👌👏

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Arrivato incompleto
review: La scatola sembrava ben imballata ma alzandola di capiva subito che c'era un problema in quanto era leggerissima, nonostante l'etichetta indicasse 10,5 kg di peso. Aprendo un lembo della scatola ho trovato solo l'asta di giunzione... Mancavano preso e bilancieri. Avviato il reso. Peccato perché era per un regalo di Natale

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Abbastanza pratico per uso domestico
review: È abbastanza facile da montare anche se avrei voluto che il pezzo centrale fosse più largo per l'uso che ne devo fare

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Regular
review: Colocando todos los discos a las mancuernas ya no hay espacio para 1 disco más es el peso máximo

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Ideal para tonificar
review: Muy util

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: E' un giocattolo di scarsa utilita'
review: Il "bilanciere" e' a misura di bambino, peraltro tecnicamente pericoloso da tenere con le braccia cosi' chiuse e puo' reggere al massimo due dischi per lato, per un carico massimo di 8Kg.I manubri sono anch'essi molto limitati dal taglio dei pesi 4x2kg e 4x1.5kg in tal modo e' impossibile avere 2 manubri da 5/6/7 kg.Nell'immagine c'e' un manubrio che regge 4 dischi per lato... che nella realta' non e' possibile.Quindi aggiungiamoci anche che fanno una pubblicita' ingannevole del prodotto.Ora il mio unico problema e' rimandarlo indietro dato che ho gettato la scatola in cui e' arrivato (anonima scatola di cartone, niente brand o simili).

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: non soddisfatta
review: non è stata chiarissima l'ordinazione dei pesi. l'ho messo subito da parte ed ordinato un bilanciere più serio alla decathlon. è stato un po' uno spreco di soldi

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Grande delusione, acquisto inutile
review: Questo acquisto è una grande delusione. Fiducioso delle recensioni ho preso i pesi per allenarmi. Dopo il primo utilizzo ho subito richiuso la scatola e fatto il reso.Il blocco a stella che garantisce la chiusura e sicurezza del prodotto si allenta ad ogni ripetizione e cambio esercizio.La lunghezza del bilanciere è ridottissima e quando esegui gli esercizi il gomito non raggiunge i 90°.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Given it’s versatility- a great value!
review: I don't have much experience with kettlebells to be honest.But this is solid steel and allowed me to recycle plates from my old weights setup.Also, because you only need the single kettlebell, it is easy to store.It take about 15-20 seconds to change the weight.Helpful tip: to change weight, I loosen the bolt at the bottom a bit, then stand it up, and spin the  handle around. Lift, add or remove weight, then rescrew.Much easier than laying it on its side and unscrewing it completely from the bottom.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Excelente
review: Feels like a kettlebell should, is widely adjustable, sturdy and stable. Adjusting weights takes a little getting use too, but not too awkward. Well worth the purchase price when compared to purchasing multiple kettlebells.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Very satisfied
review: Todo el procedimiento excelente

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
review: I was searching for an adjustable kettlebell with metallic mechanism contrary to plastic one in others presented in the market and here I've found it! Bought it on September and so far so good!I prefer gradual increase in weights for overcoming plateaus, so I was pleased to find out, that those empty plastic spacer discs have kind of a button, which can be opened. In that way I was able to fill them with sand and got 4 discs 400+ grams each
date: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 1 December 2023

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: EXCELENTE PRODUCTO
review: Exactly as described. Bought 2. One is slightly different color than the other and more glossy if anyone cares about that. V well made. Works as expected w the weight plates added instead of the plastic inserts. Cheapest and most well designed adjustable kettlebells I have found so far, am recommending.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 October 2023

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Sturdy but it’s not easy to change the weights.
review: Este producto es fabuloso. Compre dos y estoy muy contento.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Strong, heavy duty, versatile, easy to adjust, great ergonomics
review: Sturdy but it’s not easy to change the weights. I would not like this kettlebell system if I had to change the weights with any frequency. I use it for warm-ups and leave it at the same weight all the time.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 October 2023

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Relatively inexpensive but versatile introduction to Kettlebell.
review: I use the kb with 5 and 10 lb Olympic 2" weight plates and cheap sand weights for various exercises from bicep curls, tricep kickbacks, OH presses, kb swings, Turkish get-ups etc, and so far I can't say one bad thing about this versatile KB.Pros-Strong metal cast-iron-Ergonomic / traditional-angled handle (great for wrists, eg especially holding it to the chest for Goblet squats)-Heavy duty weight and feel (can probably take a beating, but the threads could come loose over time if you do)-Easy twist pin allows relatively quick weight changes (30s-1min)Cons/recommendations-I would like the pin style to be modified so that you twist the whole bottom plate is the nut with a solid pin attached to the head/top of the kb. It could easily by modified so that there are finger holes to loosen the 'nut'/bottom plate with one hand, while holding the kb in the other arm. It would also allow you to use the kb without any fake weight spacers as the bottom plate would then attach to the pin via threads. Just a thought.I highly recommend this adjustable kettlebell.2 things that I thought I would also mention:1. It is smaller than expected. It seems the kb was designed to 'fit' 5 lb weight plates very well, but 10 lb plates are wider (sand) and can't hold as many as metal plates, and 10 lb metal plates are larger in diameter than the kb itself (see picture). Not that this should be an overall deterrent for anyone since a) you can still mix and match 5 and 10 lb plates of sand and/or metal either way and b) it is my own error for not measuring weight plates and looking at the dimensions/diameter of the kb before purchasing. Again, this is a non-issue for me, I was just a bit surprised to see that the kb diameter was much smaller than I expected.2. Though the ad states the KB is rated for only 40-45 lbs max, I have used 4x10lb metal plates w the KB bringing it to 65 lbs total without issue, well so far. The threads to the pin are relatively wide and the steel is strong, but I assume they've capped the max weight at 40-45lbs since they assume the threads will wear down significantly quicker with regular use wear and tear (ie putting the KBs down hard, vibration, etc) and could become loose enough to wriggle free. Thus reducing their likelihood of liability. I'll update the post if I notice quicker than expected loosening of the threads, but so far to date (2 weeks or use everyday) it seems to stay tight and strong.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: It is EXACTLY what you think it is.
review: I think this is a good way for people who dislike gyms or live in remote areas to be introduced to Kettlebells. A lot of versatility in weight adjustment and it gives you a “feel” for Kettlebell exercises. Start with just the 20# weight (or add weight if you need to) on an easy program such as The Simple Six and go from there. An honest couple of months of use will have you determining if you want to make a further investment in regular Kettlebells.It’s not going to be perfect for quickly changing weights if that’s your thing and it definitely can’t be tossed around like regular Kettlebells (kind of an asset as it’ll encourage you to properly park your Kettlebell) but for the Kettlebell curious beginner on a restricted budget it can be a good start.BTW- you don’t need to go heavy right away to make gains. This is a good starting point.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: NA
review: Feels like a real kettle bell, adjustable…This feels like a real kettle bell. The handle, how it balances, how it swings, even how it sets down on the ground feels like the real one. This has to be the best adjustable kettle bell on the market right now. But there is one negative if you do farmer walk/run with it the  big center screw will get loose. I have ran with it at 44lbs (3x6lbs plates) and at every 200m or so the screw is loose by about 1/8 turn. It is not a lot, and honestly I am probably safe to run longer distances with it.All in all I love it. It is worth the buy I only wish this carry a bit more weight and the whole thing could be tighter.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 October 2021

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Must have
review: This is a really great addition to a home gym when you want to incorporate kettlebell exercises without buying individual bells. The grip isn't super thick so I can grip it easily, it's quick to change the weight, and the diameter of the spacers allows you to use 5lbs CAP weight plates you can buy from a place like CT perfectly. The only thing is if you wanted to get to 50lbs total, you'd have to toss on a 10lbs plate that will make it wider than the spacers/5lbs and that might be awkward depending what you're doing. Otherwise it's extremely sturdy and doesn't feel like it's going to fall apart. I regularly use it at 30lbs for swings and feel confident in it.Finally, I don't understand why so many reviewers are surprised that this doesn't come with the weights to expand this to the max capacity. The description and multiple images for the product clearly show that it's a base of 20lbs with 0lbs spacers in between until you add separate weights. There's absolutely no way that you would be able to buy a 20-50lbs adjustable kettlebell with all the weight plates included for the price of this on Amazon. Buying individual kettlebells for each size would also be way more expensive than this adjustable one plus the plates. It's not the fault of the product that these reviewers aren't understanding that. I definitely think this is a great product.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Great product and value!
review: This is a great value if you have the right plates already available AND if you can start off at 20 lbs.  It will save you lots of money (and storage space) over buying individual kettlebells.  While the handle is only 15 lbs (just under 7 kg), it's a big jump (+32%) to put on the base to make it 20 lbs. This kettlebell plus 4 - 7.5 lb "pancake" plates gets you to the maximum of 50 lbs (23 kg).  However, I prefer about 10 percent jumps in weight, so I added in a combination of 1.25 (close to half kilo), 2.5 (just over a kilo), and 5 lb plates I had from my dumbbells with the 7.5s and that provides a 20-50 lb range (9-23 kg) in 1.25 or 2.5 lb increments (about same as half kilo to 1 kg jumps).  This gives you the versatility to have very small to very large jumps in weight load.  Finally, it is about as tall as a traditional 35 lb regular kettlebell, but the handle is a little more squared (although not as much as a competition kettlebell).  Also, how you stack the plates and plastic spacers will greatly affect the balance and feel.  Overall, I found this to be a great option when I just started to learn kettlebell exercises and needed lighter weights. I was then was able to inexpensively add weight to the same piece of equipment as my strength increased.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 September 2023

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Good, sturdy and versatile adjustable kettlebell option
review: Appreciate the sturdy handle and base. The handle is similar to regular kettlebells and is made of metal so it’ll be durable. The size of the kettlebell as it comes is on par with other kettlebells of similar weight.Yes, if you want to increase the weight beyond 20lbs by replacing some of the plastic spacers with regular 1” weight plates, then you have to buy those separately (as clearly stated in the ad!). One ramification of that - as individual weight plates will have different circumference depending on the weight, the assembled kettlebell’s shape will also change to be more oval.I went to a local fitness store and bought a couple of 5lbs plates and one 10lb plate (see pics). Unfortunately the 7.5lb plates were sold out. Width wise, the 5lb plate is about the exact circumference of the existing plastic spacers, and I suspect that the 7.5lb plate would be just slightly wider. The 10lb plate is wider so it’ll make the kettlebell wider at that point - but that is similar to regular kettlebells that have a ball shape; you just have to adjust your stance when doing swings as you normally would anyway.Overall, good piece for those of us with limited space at home and don’t have room (or money) to buy multiple kettlebells of different weights.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Works well
review: I bought 3 of these so I didn’t have to swap weights all the time mid workout. Still cheaper then buying a whole set.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 December 2023

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Great Kettlebell
review: This thing has gotten me addicted to kettlebell workouts! May buy a second one. If you have some weight plates kicking around it’s well worth the cash. My only complaints are it’s a little slow to change weight if you wanted and it can loosen slightly. Nowhere near enough for the weight to fly off though. I regularly use it at 60lbs with no issues other than the odd 1/4 turn tightening.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Does not include weights
review: I don’t like how this item states that it can adjust from 20 to 50 lbs, but does not provide the weights.I sent it back.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Love this kettlebell!
review: Absolutely love this kettle bell! Super versatile - with 4 10lb plates you can get weights between 20-60 pounds. Sure enough to keep me going.Very sturdy. But be careful about dropping it - mine broke at the mounting bolt after about a year and a half. I immediately got another one, this time with insurance for $4 extra. Also great value!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 September 2021

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Great 20-lb Kettle Bell
review: I wanted a bell that I could add 5-lb weights to, and this bell was a great choice. I currently use only the 15-lb handle for a 7-minute workout...and what a workout! I am pleased that once I build my strength, that I can purchase more weights from Canadian Tire in 5-lb increments. The bell, itself, is a total 20 pounds, so this currently suits my needs. The bell is secure - no risk of weights flying off; the bottom lock ensures safety. The grips is suitable - I reviewed other bells, reviewers complained about handles becoming slippery when working out, but this cast iron handle is great. I highly recommend this bell for a safe and excellent workout. Check out Zen Kahuna on YouTube if you want a challenging and fantastic kettle bell workout!

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Good concept, poor execution
review: While the concept of this item is good, the execution of it is not.  The bottom screw that holds the plates is difficult to use, which would make it difficult to quickly adjust weight settings during rest periods in between sets.  I’m also not confident it would hold the weights during swings.  The material is also more slippery than a traditional kettle bell, which would make the grip more difficult to hold onto during swings for example.  Listen to the negative reviews on this one - they were totally on point - and this item was immediately returned.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 February 2024

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: goodkettle bells
review: Good quality and comfortable to use
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 January 2024

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: SO much better than the last adjustable kettlebell I bought.
review: It's great.  It's a size, shape, and weight range that makes sense and therefore works really well.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 October 2023

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Works with 1 inch plates you provide but...changing out stinks
review: I bought this device to try as my fixed KB collection was taking up too much space.  I had a pile of 1 inch hole / 10lb plates not being used so gave it a try.  Note, the little discs in the picture are just plastic spacers for when not loading > 20lbs.. The handle is 15 lbs and the base is 5lb so you have 20lbs with no additional plates.It does sit flat on the floor with no protrusion on the bottom...the part you secure is recessed.Main issue...changing plates sucks and mid workout double sucks. Let's say you are using 50lbs total and want to add a plate to make it 60lbs.  You have to stop your workout...flip it over...try and untighten the bottom...then balance it with the plates and discs slipping around...line up the holes while adding a plate...and retighten.  Too much time and effort.  Now your heart rate is down...you are cooling off.Second issue with this system...do not try to do cleans or racks with this. It is a totally different shape with 10 lb plates than a static, round KB.  Basically I use this for swings only where I do not plan on changing it out in between sets.  Using 5lb plates is not what I had in mind to get the weight I needed.Also, the piece that tightens on the bottom will not stay secured.  Your fingers will just fit in the recessed indent and finger right will not hold for long.  No issue with weights coming completely off or anything but the handle turns loose and weights may shift.  I tap the bottom piece with a hammer but it is plastic covered and causes damage.I plan to just load this with 50 or 60lbs total and leave it set up that way static all the time for 2 hand swings or goblet / sumo squats. Kind of defeats the purpose of why I bought it in the first place.The biggest pro was it did provide a way to organize and occasionally use my old 10 lb plates lying around.Update: Honestly, this is very limited in functionality and sits most of the time.  I did spot a kettlebe video series recently by Mark Wildman about Loading/ Unloading weight workout ( low to high positions) where I may finally get some more use from this.  I may try that workout.But overall,  I can not recommend this handle system item for purchase and would not buy again.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 June 2020

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: perfect fit with 7.5 lbs plates from dumbell set.
review: perfect fit with 7.5 lbs plates from dumbell set.  added 4 and left the 5 lb bottom palte offf for perfect 45 lber andd quick add to 50 much cheaper than buying a dedicated 45 and 50
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 August 2023

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Great Value
review: Love the shape, closest to a standard kettlebell in an adjustable model. It's supposed to weigh 20 lbs upon arrival, I bought 2 of these and neither was 20 lbs.  One was 17.7, the other 19.4.  Will maybe pry off the stopper on one of the plastic spacers and fill it with sand to get to a true 20 lbs. Or just buy a 2.5 plate to bring it up to 20 lbs because we need KBs in 5 lb increments.  Bought some used 5 lbs plates at the local Play It Again Sports store and we'll makes these KBs work. Cool product!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 April 2022

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: It’s only 20lbs, and way too expensive for additional weights compared to competition
review: To get the extra 25lbs, it costs $90 which is insane. In total for 45lbs like it should say, it’s $160. Outrageous. Its competition on here has 40-50lbs (in 1 package) for $80-$90. I can’t believe I fell for the deceptive price tag.  Just because of their deceptive advertising and outrageous price, this is just a horrible return on your money I’ve ever had the displeasure of witnessing here
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 February 2024

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: You'll need to get some weight plates to replace the spacer plates provided with the device.
review: I'm a bit concerned that the bolt might unscrew and release the weight plates during kettle bell swings, which is what I use this for...no problems yet!

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Minimal space and versatile with it's adjustability!
review: This adjustable kettlebell is great. The amount of space it takes up is minimal but because it's adjustable it provides you with great versatility. The combination of weights you can have with a singular kettlebell and some weight plates cannot be beat. All you have to have are standard / 1" plates to take the 20lb kettlebell, which is it's base weight, and increase according to the weight needed for your specific exercises.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 May 2022

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: a great way to start!
review: This thing got me down the kettlebell rabbit hole! I used it as is with the spacers for probably the first month or so and then added 5lb plates. once fully loaded, it proved to be a great challenge and work out. Some reviews are upset that it didn't come with weights, but if they'd simply read the description or looked at the provided images, they wouldn't have been so disappointed! If you're on the fence, I'd say go for it!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 March 2021

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Great value, easy to use
review: Not exactly ergonomic, but it'll get the job done.  I don't know why there are so many negative reviews about the lack of weight plates--the description clearly states that it comes only with spacer discs that can be replaced with standard weights, sold separately.  The discs/plates are easy to remove or add, and seem to stay sturdily.  At least, none have come flying off yet.  Being used to using regular kettlebells at the gym, having such a large handle when using relatively light weights is confusing to my muscle memory, but it's workable. The handle size is only really noticeable when doing swings--doesn't really matter when doing carries, goblet squats, DLs, etc.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 April 2020

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: A real space saver when creating your home gym
review: If you already own or are accumulating a one inch plate collection this will fit in well.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Great for space saving, adjustable weight kettle
review: Let me start by saying this is a great product. It is sturdy, has a great studded metal type feel and easy to grip for different exercises. It's a larger size in my opinion but I like that it can be modified for more weight plates which is a huge plus for my family's needs.ProsHeavy, easy to grip, works as intended. More plates can be added for additional weight (only one 5 lb place included with the my order)ConsMore bulky than some other kettle bell brands.The bottom nut will come loose with use sometimes and must be tightened.Overall it's a great addition to a small workout space that I've carved in my home.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 March 2018

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Decent Kettlebell - Adjustable
review: Love that it is adjustable, however it does take some time, so there's no quick swap mid work out...  Price was reasonable, especially during COVID where weights are like gold.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: This kettlebell nails it!
review: Loves the product! Very versatile! Works with any 1inch plates. Was even able to load 2, 25lbs plates to do bent over rows and it worked perfect. Loaded it up with 4 10lb plates for swings and it felt sturdy. Definitely saves space and money would highly recommend. Probably going to buy another one down the road to do more two hand work!

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Good price for a USED one!!!
review: I didn’t read properly but it only comes 20lbs total but its good as I have my own plates. For 20lbs, full price is not worth it but for $65 used thats worth!!!

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: It’s great like my gains
review: First of all, I’m getting ripped as we speak. The versatility of this is a game changer and ultimately a money saver because it’s so adjustable. It takes some time to swap out the different weights, and every few days I check that the tightener underneath is fastened. So I bought two. One for arms and lunges, and the other I stack heavier for doing swings.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 August 2021

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Multi-Stack Kettle Provides Added Flexibility
review: Seems to be a fairly decent product.  I liked the idea of variable weights.  Have not tested with full weight allowed, so not sure about handle strength.  Would like to have seen more pronounced and longer thread length on screw post that holds the weight stack to the kettle handle.  Because of this, I have not yet tested at full capacity.  Otherwise, a good concept; product finish is slightly textured, which is good for grip, with no rough castings our seams to injure user which is also good.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 December 2017

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: As Advertised, Great Product
review: So far I'm happy with this product and I can't wait until I'm able to find additional weights to add. I think this is a great alternative if you're limited by space/storage and do not want to pay higher prices for other adjustable kettlebells which are double/triple the price. The product I received is as advertised so I'm satisfied with my purchase. The description clearly states that the kettlebell comes 20lbs as is and includes (unweighted) spacing discs. You must add additional standard weight plates to reach the combined max weight of 50lbs.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 May 2020

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Weighs 20 pounds
review: Didn't realize I needed to purchase separate weights to increase to 40 or 50 pounds

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: it is what is expected.
review: When I ordered this Kettle belle I was worried about the quality because the price is low compared to the crazy high prices on Amazon. But it came as good as it should be. I will buy it again if I need another one.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: good value
review: welcomed addirion to my home gym

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Nearly perfect but note weighted disks not included!
review: I've used this for two months of remote sessions with my trainer and I'm really happy with it. The handle is wide and comfortable and it works well for every exercise I use it for.  It takes a hot minute to change the weight so it does takes a bit of planning. There is so much junk in the exercise market that finding something that's not a disappointment is gold.Note: If you already own standard 5lb bar weights, then this will work fine. If not, note that they will cost extra.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 May 2020

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: excellent fitness piece addition
review: great piece of equipment.  Perfect for what I do.  Read some complain about the time to add or subtract weights; they must do different excises than me because I set it on one weight and use it as part of a routine and as I get stronger I add another plate which only takes a couple of moments.  Did extensive research before I bought this and it is a great product.  You won't be disappointed having it in your home gym.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 September 2019

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Woudve been a good product if the weights were included
review: Please be aware that the product only includes the handle bar and the lock to hold the plates for the price which i think is excessive. I could get similar weighted kettlebells for about the same price but with the weight INCLUDED (you are free to order the weights separately but I would much rather it all be a part of the deal which does not seem to be an option as they don't have add ons either)

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Great
review: Gets the job done, very comfortable, durable, and affordable.

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Sturdy item
review: I like this item, just should have read more thoroughly as the plates are additional and this is quite a high price point. But definitely as advertised and so far a sturdy buy!

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set
title: Broke after a year
review: The kettlebell broke after about 12 hours of use (15 minutes a week for a year with 20 lbs of weight).  It turns out that there are only three small spot welds that attach the triangular piece that holds the weights to the center axle.  IMO, there should be a screw to hold it securely.Regardless, it would be fixable if there was some way to buy a replacement part.  However, Amazon refuses to support the product after a year, and the manufacturer doesn't appear to offer support or even have a website.So although I liked it well enough when I first got it, I have to mark it down for flimsy construction in a key part and a lack of post-purchase support.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 May 2021

prod_name: BCBIG Dumbbells Set

review: These are versatile as you can adjust the weight using one inch plates (not included). The handle feels a little slippery; fortunately have not had any accidents. The locking mechanism does feel secure though. Overall not too bad.

title: Your new go-to attachment!

prod_name: Vulken Tricep Rope Cable Attachment
title: It’s just GREAT
review: I was tired of tracking down 2 ropes in the gym to combine them to make a large rope. Or just waiting for a rope to become available, wasting time waiting as people use it.Now I just throw it in my gym bag (it’s extremely light) and set it up in 2 seconds. No more lining up the ropes, having them rub oddly against eachother. It’s just easier and the rope is longer and more comfortable because you can just slide your hand through without having to hold the odd shapes stoppers in your hands.Knowing what I know now I’d pay $60 for it. I got the longest version and my brother also loves it so much that he bought his own.I use mine for wide overhead extensions and boy it hits them nice 🤌.

prod_name: Vulken Tricep Rope Cable Attachment
title: Love this addition to my home gym
review: What a difference this type of strap makes. My hands have become mildly arthritic, so the standard rope is extremely uncomfortable in use on my pully system. But these straps completely solve for that. Plus the extra range just adds options to your work out.If you have a pully system, you really should invest (they're not expensive) in these for sure!

prod_name: Vulken Tricep Rope Cable Attachment
title: Great Cable. Just Improve the integrity of the hand grip
review: First off I love this cable. The only downside is the integrity of the hand grip. I have had mine for a few months now and it is already starting to look “mushed” or crushed. I use it 2x a week for my triceps. I would maybe double up the nylon or put a thicker grip in the handle of this cable. Just my opinion
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 December 2022

prod_name: Vulken Tricep Rope Cable Attachment
title: I think the shorter one might be more versatile.
review: Read a review that said they accidentally ordered the short version and wished they had gotten the longer one. I got the longer one because it made sense. In actuality, I think the shorter one would have been more useful. The length of the longest strap takes up a huge portion of the cable range. Even kneeling on the floor the weight stack hits the bottom too easily. In other words, the longest straps are possibly limiting unless using for very specific exercises.

prod_name: Vulken Tricep Rope Cable Attachment
title: Get this one first - Don't waste money on anything less...  But it has a small problem...
review: Had to drop to a 4^^^^. The handles are too low (long)  to work on most lat machines - if they were shortened about 4" it could get the 5****  back again. It should be okay as is if you attach to a power rack pulley system. Otherwise:  Has to be one of the (very) best items on Amazon for the purpose you would purchase this product.  Strong - very sturdy built, comfortable and just the right dimensions.  I Keep it in my gym but it is very easy to take with you to your gym away from home.  The ropes used for arm curls / triceps are okay but this gizmo has more flexibility. Can use with any machine that has a pulley weight stack.  Get one - be happy - you wont be disappointed. Could experiment to see if it would work with a resistance band attached to a door in your house. Talk about versatility - you got it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 September 2020

title: NA
review: Turned our little garage into a gym and had no idea what to do with the concrete floor which was covered in drywall mud and paint so expensive vinyl flooring or garage floor paint or ? Went on amazon searched gym floors and these mats showed up so for $300 I could cover over 240 sq ft which seemed reasonable had no idea how the product would perform and so far it’s been Fantastic it held together as I dragged my equipment over it and when my wife gets on the treadmill at 530 am she is so happy to feel soft flooring under her feet and she says it took the dirty concrete smell away. It’s great only took me 3 hours to lay down and cut to fit very easily.

prod_name: Yes4All Interlocking Exercise Foam Mats
title: NA
review: I've been using these mats for eight months in my home gym, and they've proven to be a very reliable choice. They offer durability, comfort, and ease of assembly, making them a great fit for my workout space.Size and Coverage: With two packs of the 6-tile set, I've covered a sufficient workout area. Each tile measures 24" x 24" x 7/16" thick, providing ample cushioning and support during exercises.Durability and Non-Slip: These mats have held up well under daily use, providing a non-slip surface for secure workouts. The textured, shock-absorbing surface is comfortable and protective.Easy Assembly: Assembly is a breeze with these lightweight puzzle pieces, and they can be fairly easily rearranged to suit different exercise needs.Multi-Purpose Use: These mats have proven versatile, serving as a comfortable and easy-to-clean floor for both my home gym and play areas. They've even accompanied me on camping trips.Cosmetic Wear: After six months of use, there are minor cosmetic blemishes on the mats, likely from heavy equipment or weights. However, these haven't affected functionality.In summary, the Yes4All Puzzle/Interlocking Exercise Mat Tiles are a solid choice for home gym flooring. They've held up well and provide a comfortable and secure surface for workouts. Despite minor cosmetic wear, they continue to serve their purpose effectively. I recommend them to anyone seeking an affordable and practical flooring solution for their workout or play spaces.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 September 2023

prod_name: Yes4All Interlocking Exercise Foam Mats
title: Just perfect
review: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5) I recently purchased these gym workout foam mat tiles, and they have exceeded my expectations in every way. Here's why I'm so pleased with them:Durable and Long-Lasting: These foam mat tiles are built to last. I've put them through intense workouts, and they show no signs of wear and tear. It's clear that they are designed to withstand the rigors of daily exercise.Easy to Clean: Keeping these mats clean is a breeze. A quick wipe with a damp cloth or a gentle spray with a mild cleaner is all it takes to maintain their pristine appearance.Perfect Thickness: The thickness of these mats is just right. They provide the ideal balance between cushioning and support, making my workouts comfortable and safe.Easy Assembly and Alteration: Setting up these tiles was a breeze. They fit together seamlessly, and if I ever need to change the layout or add more, it's a simple task. Their versatility is a huge plus.

Easy fix with use of an additional square or padded mat on top to absorb the weight. I had one extra square that I push around the  kitchen as needed.This works for me; beautiful and easy to clean at a much cheaper option than other types of new flooring. No more scowling at the ugly kitchen floor, just joy!

prod_name: Yes4All Interlocking Exercise Foam Mats
title: Exceeded expectations, easy to install, quality material
review: I needed an affordable flooring option for an area I wanted to turn into a utility room that was currently marred by an old, ugly and well worn linoleum floor. After doing a little research I chose these tiles and couldn't be happier. The tiles snapped together easily and I was impressed that out of 120 square feet not a single tile was miscut or otherwise flawed.I was a bit worried about the quality of the foam after seeing how light the tiles were but I was impressed after working on them after installing. They stick well even with no adhesive and locked together tight.Not only are these tiles affordable, they are also well made, look great, and appear to be made for the long run. I'm quite happy with the results of the install and would highly recommend them.
