title: good workout tool
review: I have both level 4 and level 5 bands and will say upfront these are not easy to use.  you will get a good workout with these as the bands are well designed and I believe will last a long time.  I have only had them for a short time but am adding to my workout routine.  you need to go to the website to get some exercises to do with these and those might be better done via video but the site is helpful.  I would say it might have been smarter for me to start with level 3 as level 4 is plenty difficult and level 5 I am not ready for yet
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 January 2020

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Highest resistance band I've come across
review: With this nearly year-long quarantine, it was becoming clearer that I needed a heavier-resistance band from the ones I already have. I could still get a pretty good workout with some movements such as lateral raises and a couple others, but there are some movements were even the conventional "heavy band" is too easy. For example: squats, presses, rows, bicep curls and others.The description of the 4 woven bands for more resistance and durability sure seemed to make sense as I read it for this product. And now from using it a few weeks I can say that it fully delivered as I'd hoped. It's nice being able to feel a challenge again and that I'm actually getting work in some of the movements mentioned above. It is a lot of resistance, so some movements will still require an easier one. For example, unless you're super short, I doubt there's hardly anyone who could do reps of lateral raises with these. Fortunately, this one (purple band) is the heaviest and they do sell other bands with less resistance.The only reason it's missing all 5 stars is that the plastic part on the handle is slightly jagged. It may seem next to nothing at first, but on a couple movements - such as bicep curls, it's quite apparent and can be a bit irritating. Something perhaps the manufacturer could look into and then truly make these possible the best bands in market.

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Decent piece of resistance equipment
review: It is easy to use. Provides decent resistance and use options. Initially the material had an odor which cleared in about three days. No regrets with this purchase.

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Martha
review: Me gustó mucho y mi entrenador de acuerdo en que fue una gran inversion. muy resistentes y cómodas, me convencí a comprar el siguiente nivel.

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Great grip and feels like it will never break
review: I love the braided cables. In the past I’ve used other brands that only had a single tube connecting the grips and they broke on occasion. This one feels like it will never break. I have three different ones and enjoy using them on all kinds of exercises. In particular I like taking them on vacations or trips where I won’t have access to a gym. Our trainer gave me several workouts that I can rotate through while away from our gym at home. Great product.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 May 2023

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Good travel option
review: I bought the heaviest version for a 2-week trip to Australia where I wouldn't have any access to a gym.  I like it much more than non-braided versions because I am not nearly as worried about the band breaking.  And the built-in handle is a plus over continuous loop ones (typically the style for heavier resistance).I did three main exercises with it: a seated row, a standing press and a squat so I could effectively work my whole body (even without attaching it to a door etc).  In all cases, I either stood feel shoulder width apart (press) on the band, more than shoulder width apart on the band (squat) or placed my feet spread widely apart on the band  (seated row).  This provided heavy resistance (I am 5'11" as a frame of reference) for the standing press, moderate resistance for the row, and fairly light resistance for the squat.  So to me, I would say it's roughly the equivalent of working out with 50-55lbs dumbbells at least for these exercises.  For one arm exercises like curls, it is very easy to change the resistance by moving your foot that is anchoring the cable to ground either toward or away from the handle you are lifting.  When I did these three exercises in rapid sequence, it gives a decent circuit training/metabolic training effect.  I wouldn't want this to be my main training modality, but for a portable option, I think it's the best I have found (it's hard to work your pulling muscles without equipment).  I think it's also  particularly good option for older adults who wish to add some strength training to their regimen but aren't inclined to lift weights or go to a gym - as there is significant resistance but risk of injury is relatively low.  Overall pleased with the product given my expectations and needs.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 August 2019

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Solid product
review: I feel very comfortable using this without worry of snapping. The resistance level is also superb

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Good quality
review: Excellent and sturdy feels very good when working out I am 6 2 210 lbs and work out three times a week and holding up well

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Well made high quality bands. Leave a faint rubber scent on hands when new.
review: These are fantastic for doing a pretty good and well rounded workout routine at home! Something to keep in mind also is that resistance bands differ from weights in a fundamental way since your muscles hold more tension at maximum extension; I feel that this gives me smoother movement and better form.I'm probably about as strong as the average desk worker who doesn't spend a ton of time in the gym, but does have some active hobbies. And I'm 5'6" tall. With that in mind, I think the blue band gives me a good amount of resistance with room on both sides - to make things harder or easier by controlling the slack. If you are about the same strength level but much taller, you might consider a lighter band and use the same logic for other scenarios.As for these specific bands, they are good to look at and seem to be built well and with high quality materials. The only con is that the first few times they WILL make your hands smell like rubber...faintly. Nothing that a quick wash won't remove.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 April 2015

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Remarkable!
review: Remarkable Product!Remarkable Quality!Remarkable Monetary Value!

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: great quality
review: Very well made and great quality.  This is going to last.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 September 2023

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Good product
review: This band is a replacement (same band) SPRI that lasted a long time. I was a little disappointed that the handles have been down graded. My first ones had removable handles that could be changed out between bands. Therefore I had to order the band and handles permanently attached. But it works just as well.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 July 2023

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Resistance is not the same!
review: I ordered the braided purple tube #5. I have ordered this same exact tube previously. When my NEW one came it was 1/3 skinnier and way less resistance. Same color, same number, same everything!  The new purple braided tube is equivalent to the red braided tubing which is 2 levels lighter!! Soooo disappointed!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 February 2024

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Stretch Your Boundaries!
review: I bought my original braided exercise cord over 25 years ago. It finally bit the dust about a month ago and I immediately ordered this new version. I am now almost 70 years old and this SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Band Exercise Cords can be used in a variety of ways, from head to foot,  that helps me keep mobile and flexible. I highly recommend it!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 22 June 2023

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Nice braided band
review: I wish it was a bit heavier but otherwise it's a nice product.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 June 2023

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Perfect
review: Perfect resistance
date: Reviewed in the United States on 31 August 2023

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Really helps
review: I wanted something easy to work my arms out with. I love this resistance rope.  I’m glad I got the easy one as it still works my muscles and I feel it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 May 2023

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Handles need work.
review: The product arrived with the foam on the handle torn about 1 inch.  I put tape around the foam to keep it from tearing anymore.  The strap on the handle should be a little bit longer because when I do curls with it the back of the handle rubs the side of my hand.  I wear gloves to protect my hands.  I didn't return it because I just don't want the hassle.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 October 2023

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Good resistance
review: Easy to use
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 June 2023

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Just as described
review: Great tool for excercise.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 May 2023

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Lightweight and great for keeping fit while traveling.
review: I bought these to maintain fitness while traveling. Also have a less resistive red band set for warming up.  These do a great job of stretching and pumping while on the road and are very light and compact to fit in luggage.  The red is about 15lbs of resistance and the purple 25lbs, but one of the benefits of these bands is you can vary the resistance based on how short the cable is when you pull -- I usually use these as the equivalent of barbells or pulley type weight movements with my foot as the fulcrum. The variations of movement are limited only by your imagination and flexibility, but don't be foolish and try to attach to furniture or moving objects like doors.These are now a fixture in my luggage for fitness maintenance when traveling, along with the perfect pushup device.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 9 May 2019

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Having 4 braided tubes is an excellent safety feature
review: I have been using surgical tubing exercise bands with the door attachment for many years.  The bands rub against the attachment's loop and chafe.  This results in their failure after a little more than a year's use.  (That corresponds to somewhat over 4,000 repetitions.)  I had been using the single tube bands.  Then one failed unexpectedly when I was pulling my arms back away from the door.  I landed on my back & head.  I switched to the 4 tube braided version.  I have had to replace the quad bands twice since I switched so far.  There is essentially no chance that more than one tube will fail at a time.Lasted 1 year 4 months
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 June 2020

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: A solid product for a decent price
review: I chose 4 stars because the heavy resistance band works as a resistance band should. I've performed exercises for various muscles with this such as bicep curls, shoulder raise and press, wrist curls, chest press and flys, back rows, quadricep extensions, squats, and tricep extensions (for the back/chest/tricep/quad exercises I did use a BodyLastics door strap in conjunction with this band). I've worked up a great sweat using this band. I'm taking one star off because the handles could be a bit sturdier. But don't get me wrong, the plastic on them is THICK and I don't see the band coming undone.. ever. It's called taking care of your product, the 1 star poster complaining about the handles breaking when he let them slam into the wall must be a lunkhead.This band will get you toned... work out 30-40 minutes a day. The casual exerciser may perform 10-20 reps, 30 second rest between each set... 3-4 times a week. You will see a difference.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 February 2014

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: So far so good., but.....
review: So far I like the product.  I have had many bands that have snapped in the past (regular SPRI bands).  It can be dangerous.  It looks like this will be hard to snap unless all the braided bands broke at once.Recommendation to the seller:  It would be SUPER HELPFUl if you added the weights of each of the levels in the product description.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 October 2020

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Good
review: I've had the medium level (3) resistance band for 6 weeks and so far so good. The resistance is about 30 to 35 lbs and I use it 3 to 4 to 4 times per week. Not as effective as free weights but it keeps me toned and serves its purpose.I'm able to work out all upper body
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 September 2020

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Versatile and plenty of resistance
review: I find this exercise band to be very versatile.  I now do virtually all of my upper body strength exercises with this, not just while traveling (where the portability is great), but even at home where I have standard dumbbell weights.  The very heavy resistance level provides plenty of resistance for me.This is my second purchase of this exercise band.  The first purchase lasted about 8 months of usage 5 days per week and then one of the four tubes broke.  While I wish the band had lasted longer, that was a pretty solid amount of usage to achieve, which is why I purchased the product again.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 January 2018

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Where's the "Get Started" Flyer?
review: Would it be too much to ask for? How about a guide to their use? How about a guide to their maintenance. Our gym has these and they work fine, but I travel with them in my suitcase and like them because they are very versatile. I've bought the book now and think a smaller flyer with the bands would be easy to produce. Similarly, the bands in the gym have a "grimy" finish while mine are bright and shiny. Can you wash them? If so, how?
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 July 2018

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Can use anywhere
review: Very versatile
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 July 2022

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Good but design flaw
review: So the bands are fine and they offer good amount of resistance depending on how long or short you make it. My main issue is the plastic piece that connect the handles and the individual bands. Depending on how you use them, like standing curls, these pieces rub against your wrists at the top. You can definitely feel the edges and they can get irritating.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 May 2020

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Great Heavy duty band
review: This is my second # 5 SPRI resistance band.  My first one failed (one of the tubes split) after only 2 years of 3 x per week use, and it's not like I'm Hercules.  I could not find another competing product of SPRI level quality, so I'm giving them another chance.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 25 March 2022

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Better than I expected
review: Had the band for about 4 months now and average a 4-5 day/week usage. It's been heavy enough resistance for bicep curls and shoulder raises when I brace it under my feet. Slightly lagging in resistance when I try back exercises by wrapping it around a pole or tree. But overall it provides great, stable resistance. Love the rotating hand grips so I can rotate my wrists when doing curls. No issues of the band snapping which is something I was worried about. I plan to order the next resistance level up.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 November 2018

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Great rope!
review: This is my second one. I made the mistake of not using the supplied anchor attachment and the braids slowly became shredded. I would anchor the rope to cemented park benches, rusty fences, and pipes, etc.It's strong, flexible, and great for all exercises if you have the strength to move it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 March 2021

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Better quality than expected
review: The braiding makes this nicer than most resistance bands I have tried. The strength seems about right for medium. I'm 5'11" and 190lbs and lift semi regularly. I wanted to the band to rehab past shoulder injuries. I find it is more than long enough to hold one end on the ground with my foot and do shoulder exercises with either arm. Only downside if any would be that the handles are not a solid plastic triangle.  The anchor is plastic and the grip itself is nicely padded plastic, though very sturdy.  A mesh straps connect these parts by running through the hollow grip. This in no way compromises the strength of the device, it probably make it more durable. It does make it slightly more difficult to hold the band during certain exercises depending on the angle.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 February 2013

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Quality product
review: I have used these same resistant bands at the gym and wanted some for my home workout area.  Good quality for the $$
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 February 2022

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Excellent exercise accessory, especially for home gym and business travel
review: This is my third (highest tension of the three). I use them at home and when I travel. A little bulky in the suitcase, but so worth it. If the hotel had a gym, they become even more versatile. But you can get a good sweat in 20-30 minutes just in the room or outside, weather allowing. You won’t turn into a hulk with these, but they will keep the time until you can get back in the gym.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 April 2019

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: Durability
review: For exercise I like it easy to use
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 October 2021

prod_name: SPRI Braided Xertube Resistance Bands
title: The large attachment piece on the handle presses against my ...
review: The large attachment piece on the handle presses against my wrist when I do curls with it (which is all I use it for). Other than that, it does what it's supposed to.This is probably not an intended result of the design, but I use the pattern in the braid to make sure the bands aren't twisted. Hold the handles apart and twist one until the blue line is straight, as apposed to barber-poled.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 May 2017

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: グリップ良し
review: 前回、使っていたものよりグリップが良く、背中のトレーニングでしっかり追い込めます。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 良いけどかゆくなる
review: 使いやすくていいけど、革が手首に触れる部分が赤くなってかゆくなる。みんなどうしてるの？

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 使いやすい
review: 使いやすいし、耐久性も問題ないです。最初からこれを買えば良かったです。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: グリップ力は申し分ない。
review: オールアウトと比較しても別格のグリップ力！さてどれくらいの耐久性があるのか期待したいところだが、中に入っている爪の様なものがトレ後に毎回ひっくり返る様に動くがこれは普通なんですかね。右手だけですが…

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 皮で出来ていて丈夫
review: 良い

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 買ってよかった
review: とっても気に入ってます

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: ありがとうございます
review: ありがとうございました

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: さすがゴールドジムのパワーグリップ！
review: スポーツジムで懸垂をする時に、先に握力が無くなってしまうので、そのサポートでこちらの商品を購入いたしました。実際に使ってみると、ほぼ握力を使わなくて良いので、狙った部位に効かせる事ができ、いつも以上に質の良いトレーニングを行う事ができています。筋トレをするときの必需品となりました。良いお品をありがとうございました。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 初心者こそ装着
review: 握力がネックでしたが、解消しました。おもりの重量アップして、狙った部位の筋トレ継続中です。素晴らしい。皮の匂いが独特です。耐久性は高そうです。しっかりしてます。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: サイズ
review: サイズでかなり悩みました。手首16cmでSかMか。みなさんのコメントを見て、悩みましたが、大きい方が無難だと思いMを選択。Sをつけてないので分かりませんが、大きい気がしました。でも、手首にサポーターをつければ、ちょうど良くなるので、これで使おうと思っています。結局は、ゴールドジムに行って試着するのが一番だと思います。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 耐久性抜群！
review: 2個目のリピートです類似品と比較すると高価に感じますが、耐久性に雲泥の差がありますハードに使っても3年は糸のホツレもないでしょうちなみにワタシは8年くらい使いましたが（写真の状態）、マジックテープも問題なし、グリップ力もオッケーでした先日についに買い替えました廉価品に迷わされることなく、ゴールドジムのコチラを購入することをオススメします

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 最高
review: ベンチプレスやスクワット時に滑らずホールドが高いので、力が分散せずに狙った筋肉に負荷かかかるので効率的に筋トレが出来ます。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 良い
review: 安物のパワーグリップを使っていたが買い替えたとても良い

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: まぁ、間違いないと思う。
review: 他のレビューと同様に耐久性はありそう。自分手首のサイズが中途半端なので、ストラップがきれいにマジックテープに貼り付けられず、大きく余るのがちょっとした不満。概ね満足。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 本物か？
review: グローブ同様、ゴールドジムで買ったものとは違う違和感

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 7年使ってます
review: もう、これ以外はあり得ない。ベロの長さとか、耐久性とか。使いやすい以外の言葉が見つからないし、これ以外は使わない。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: リピート購入です
review: 引くトレーニングではいつも助けられてます。初心者から上級者までおすすめです

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: マジック部分は、可なりしっかりしています。
review: 以前、他社の3500円くらいのを、使っていたのですが、デザインやカラーは、気に入って使っていましたがマジック部分が激弱で、1年持ちませんでした。なので購入しました。マジック部分のしっかり感は抜群だし、使いやすさも良い。総合が4点ナノは、少し値段が高いかなぁ～と。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: やっぱりゴールドジム最高
review: 他の安い製品を3年ほど使用してましたが、こちらの製品に買い換えました。結論、最初からこちらの製品にすべきだったです。質感が違い安心感があります。迷ったら、こちらの製品をおすすめします。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: サイズ選びにご注意
review: 手首の寸法でサイズを選びましたが、2サイズにまたがっている寸法の場合は小さい方のサイズを選んだ方が良いです。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: とても助かってます！
review: 滑りにくく、安定していて使いやすいです。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 丈夫でしっかり！
review: トレーニングで使用しています。とても丈夫でしっかりホールドしてくれるので、トレーニングにしっかり集中できます！

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: サイズは慎重に
review: ベロのサイズが合わなかった手首は16センチないくらいの俺でぴったりでしたが、ベロの長さが足りずに懸垂できなかった

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 10mm長いプロ。効率向上
review: これまで近所のスポーツ用品店で買ったスタンダードモデルを使っていました。ジムで友人が本製品「プロ」を使っていて、貸してくれたので試したところ、とても使いやすい。目からウロコ。何かに巻きつける動作がとても楽で、太めのシャフトでも気にせずセット出来ます。巻きつけるベルト部分の材質も薄く、見た目つるつるですが引っ掛かりのある(悪く言えばベタつく)素材になっています。最初からプロにしておけば良かったなと思いました。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: サイズですが
review: 手首が役17センチだったのでSサイズを注文しましたですが1度着用してみるとサイズが合ず、返品させていただきましたすると返品時の送料や着用料が購入金額の半分以上かったので、そこが残念です。そして、Mサイズを新たに注文しました物自体はよかったです

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 高重量の筋トレに必需品ですね‼︎
review: ジムのスタッフさんに薦められて購入しました。今まで懸垂が2回くらいしかできなかったのですが、初めてこのパワーグリップを使って5回できたことには驚いてしまいました。今まで以上に高重量の筋トレに挑戦していけそうです。装着も簡単で使いやすいと感じました。ただゴムがベタつく感じがするので、夏場には扱いにくいのではないでしょうか！

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 背中が進化
review: 文句なしです

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 耐久性抜群！
review: 初心者にも持ちやすく、安心して使えます！

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 長年愛用してます。
review: 耐久性抜群

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 人を選ぶ
review: がっちりシャフトを握ってデッドリフトをしたい人と、ひっかけるようにしてしたい人とで好みが分かれます。上腕から疲れやすい人は使用すると良いみたいですね。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 迷ったらM。後から調整は可能。
review: 手首のサイズ的にSでしたが、安かったのでMを購入。手首を保護するスポンジ部分を1cmカットしたらジャストフィットしました。後に店舗でSつけて見たら余裕がなかったのでMで良かったです。カットで調節できるんで、迷ったらMじゃないでしょうか。あと一応プッシュもできると書いてありますが、高重量のプッシュ種目はちょっと使いづらかった。プルはいい感じです。特にチンニングが最高。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 使いやすい。
review: 持ちやすいし使いやすい。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: Sでもよかった
review: 大体の男性ならMがいいとあったけど、ガリガリの自分にはSがよかったかも

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 悩むのは、SかMかではないのでは？
review: Mサイズを購入しました。手首周囲は16cmで問題なく使用できています。掌の痛みを意識せずに重量を扱えるようになったので、ジム通いされている方には必携のアイテムかと。Sだと間違いなく小さいので、同じ手首のサイズの方は購入はやめた方が良いです。ではMがベストかと言うと、そう言いきれない部分もあって、ジムでLサイズを使用したこともありますが、そちらのほうが、より掌を覆うことができました。そこは、好みが分かれてくるかもしれません。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: 最初の匂いだけ注意
review: 開封後1週間はとても臭くて耐えられなかったが外干しするなどしているうちに匂いは治った。機能には全く問題ない。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: サイズ選びは慎重に
review: 初心者です。付け方に問題あるのかもしれませんが、少し手首が痛いです。恐らくサイズが小さすぎたのかも？そんなに気になるほどの痛みではなく、使っているうちに慣れるかと思います。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: サイズが大きい

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,
title: ★確実なSMサイズ判断の為に。
review: 【　確実なサイズ選び　】　購入時、サイズ選びに迷いますよね。何故ならレビューの判定が両方存在するから。検証した人も居るようですがレビューがイマイチ理解不能でした。SかMかで迷った私の意見と写真で納得して頂けると思います。私の手首は16cmなので、Sを購入。結果、キツ過ぎました。製品実物を測ったところ、手首に巻きつける部分の長さは、手側＝18cm、前腕側＝14cm。つまり、手首に巻きつける部分は円錐状となっていて、前腕にかけ狭くなり手首が14cm以下の方でなければキツ過ぎとなります。SMサイズで迷っている方に私の投稿した画像も見て頂き、適切な判断からサイズを選択し購入していただければ幸いです。

prod_name: Gold`s Gym 3710 Power Grip Pro,

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: Best fitness product*****
review: It's sturdy, well made, and exactly what I was looking for to utilise my existing free weight plates and avoid purchasing multiple kettlebells. I prefer kettlebell deadlifts for my dodgy low back, and this is great because I can warm up light, then add more plates for working sets. I don't recall what it's rated to carry, but I can just fit 4 x 20kg plates on the shaft, so it's essentially replacing a wide variety of kettlebell weights at a lower cost.One downside of the design is that the shaft obviously needs to be long to accommodate weight plates and locking collars, but this makes the whole unit taller than most kettlebells at about 40cm in height, so unless you stand on blocks, you won't have the same depth of movement available before the unit contacts the floor. I cut a tennis ball and put it on the end of the shaft so it doesn't damage the floor, especially when it's loaded up.All things considered I'm very happy with it, and the unavoidable limitations of it's increased height are an acceptable trade-off against the cost of the multiple kettlebells it replaces.

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: NA
review: The construction is simple and solid, while fit and finish are little on the sloppy side of things. The chrome is solid, no flaking anywhere to be seen, even if it feels a little slick. It does let it work well for more dynamic movements. I find myself wishing the handle part was a little thicker, but It'll still do just fine.As others have mentioned, the pin does seem to hang pretty low and will hit the floor if you let it hang too low on some movements: I'm 6'4" and even for me that seems to be an issue.The nuts supplied are the normal spinlock ones every other dumbell handle seems to have, and while they do their job of locking in the weight, they seem to work best if you lock them back to back (see pictures).I'll be modifying mine to accept a locking pin at the bottom by drilling a 3/8" hole thru, that will let me load it with one extra plate while feeling safe that the plates can't rotate looseOverall happy with my purchase, since it'll hold as much weight as I can I can fit on it without causing durability issues, and very much securely so after modding the tip to accept a pin. Plus it's A LOT cheaper than buying kettlebells from 10 to 80lbs

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: Solid metal adjustable kettlebell for heavy workouts
review: I like this so much that I bought a second one for additional exercises (one per arm). They are a great price and unlike others that cannot break since they are completely solid metal. I am leery of any kettlebell grip or kettlebell handle for weights that involves any plastic parts since that could fail which is why I bought this instead. It's great for heavy kettlebell rows, heavy gauntlet squats and for swings where you have one in each hand which is why I bought a second one. I would not recommend them for other kettlebell movements since it would be awkward with bulky weight plates and I am not that confident in the pair of twist on connectors in those movements since they can come lose while using them. For those exercises you need to buy the cheapest traditional kettlebells you can.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 April 2023

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates

review: Solid, great value, work extremely well with your existing weights.  What more could you ask for.

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: Love it for powerlifting accessory training, very wise purchase!
review: This item was a little vague in description,  but once I recieved it I was very pleased with the construction. I can easily put 5-60lbs(70lbs total with handle complete)before switching to larger oversized standard plates. Very secure and if I was to make any suggestion, it would be to have the handle knurled for additional aid gripping. I added hockey tape, works fine.Not affiliated is any way, but people this is a safe buy for anyone looking to use a kettlebell is you already have standard plates.

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: Item listing of 6-pound option is mislabeled
review: The item listed as the silver, 6 pound option is actually the NewMe Fitness silver (chrome) adjustable kettleball handle with spinlock threading for 1" weight plates.It is a solid, high-quality adjustable kettleball handle with good ergonomics.  It has a welded on flange collar up near the handle.The two included spinlock collars are used on the threaded bottom of the bar to secure the 1-inch weight plates with redundant spinlocks for security.  If the spinlock collars shift, as sometimes happens with spinlocks, the user will be aware that 1 spinlock collar has come off before 2 spinlock collars both come off allowing the weight plates to fall.  Use both spinlocks on the bottom for this reason when using an adjustable kettlebell handlevwith spinlock collars.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 January 2024

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: Good Product, but not really 2" Olympic Sized
review: I have been in the market for an Olympic (2") loadable kettlebell that doesn't cost an appendage or organ. I am not a fan of the options I had seen to this point. I was thrilled when I saw NewMeFitness had recently released a 2" loading pin style kettlebell. This design made the most sense to me and the price point was just about perfect ($50). The only thing I did not like about the product from online viewing was they sent a spring clip with it to hold the weights down. No big deal I thought, I'll just use one of my Olympic collars and toss the spring, it is after all, a 2" loading pin, right?Wrong. The loading pin is 1.88"/47.6mm (pictured). Why on earth did they not just use the Olympic standard? We are talking adding .1" or 2.4mm to the diameter of the product here to make it fit all your normal Olympic equipment snug. The plates move around a bit more than they should (side to side) due to this sizing, and you are forced to use their spring collar to keep the weights down. I did message them about this and they appreciated my feedback and took it under consideration, but left it at that.Beyond my beef with the odd sizing, the finish is pretty cheap. I have done maybe a couple dozen swings with this and the paint is already chipping on it (pictured). The head and pin screw are all raw aluminum, so I would recommend you put some 3-in-1 Oil or something on it to make the joining of the 2 pieces less grinding.Beyond my few small squabbles with it, it works fine for most kettlebell moves I have tried thus far. I do like the locking level on the head that helps keep it secure when you screw it all the way down, nice touch in my opinion.I do very much like the design of this product, I still think it is the best budget one I have found thus far. I think this product could be MUCH better if they would just increase the diameter of the pin so you could use an Olympic collar and not their spring clip.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 October 2022

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: Amazing.
review: Amazing , fast shipping. And the bar is incredibly sturdy , no wobble at all with the weights on

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates

date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 January 2024

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: Low cost of entry into classic kettlebell training.
review: I'm new to the Kettlebell exercise scene (coming from a traditional barbell/dumbbell & weight machine gym training back-round).Initially I just bought one of these adjustable Kettlebell handles in order to incorporate 1 & 2 handed KB swings as a supplement to my already existing home gym plan.After a short while of messing around with it though - I started to get hooked on the idea of classic kettlebell training in general (which is actually quite a bit different then traditional BB/DB & gym machine training programs).I then purchased a second handle just so I could start incorporating double kettlebell exercises.Assuming that you already have a decent collection of low profile weight plates - you really cant beat these quality KB handles.Adjustable handles like these are the way to go in my opinion in terms of versatility & cost of entry into classic kettlebell training.From the best that I can tell (so far) - these handles feel & work the same as a regular kettlebell does - with the exception of them standing a few inches taller (which is mostly a non-factor to me at this point).I did a loading experiment - & comfortably fit six 10 lb. & two 1.5 lb. plates on each handle - with collars = (70+ lbs. approximately in total - including the weight of the handle). This is more weight then I'll probably ever need for most any classic kettlebell exercise.You could even use higher weight denomination plates to load it up even heavier then that - but I think you'd run the risk of it being to bulky - which would be less then ideal.Lastly - I would advise purchasing/sourcing a supplemental clamping mechanism for these handles. I use a pair of flipped upside-down old school metal screw-head-lock vice-collars (anti-slip).These keep the weight plates extra secure - & also allow the loaded kettlebell handle(s) to sit balanced & flat on the ground.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 November 2023

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: Perfect Solid solution for a crazy low price
review: First of all, I liked (loved) the cheap cost of this solid steel kettlebell "handle"!!  Unless you just MUST have an all in one, self-contained fancy adjustable kettlebell, with just a turn of a knob to quick change the weight, or you must have the best of the best, or bragging rights, or you do many drop sets, etc., then be frugal and safe you cash and get this! Some of these Adj. Kettlebell sell from$130 - $300 BUCKS!! And some have plenty of plastic parts. And plastic parts DO Break!!! Then you have an expensive Kettlebell Paper Weight!!This Solid Steel Handle does it ALL (for Me!!!)  Only thing is with snatches and some over the head movements could take some getting used to adapting to and mindfully adding smaller 5-10 plates only for comfort. A Kettlebell forearm/wrist Guard is a darn good idea anyway for even standard kettebell workouts that will save you from bruising and most discomfort!  But for swings, dead lifts, squats, and everything else in between, you can load this thing up with whatever plates you want to your heart's content! This beauty is not going to fail!There are some criticisms in the reviews and the even in the few YouTube reviews of this handle, as to the total length of the treaded bar plus handle being too long, (some reviewers stated 16+ inches). And it does indeed look long in the YT videos, "BUT" I just got mine a few days ago from AMAZON and the total exact length of mine is 14 inches long. Two inches is a big difference too, when swinging this thing around you head or doing swings when you are of the shorter statured variety!The handle is 8-1/4 O.D. inches in width, and 6-1/4 I.D. width. Plenty of room for my hands. Thickness of handle is of course then 1 inch.The AMAZON Website description states "non-slip" handle. It is anything but that!! This handle is shiny smooth chromed steel, and I would be careful swinging it in front of a mirror or window even with a full grip you get on it with the one inch thick handle!! Slippery is Slippery no matter what grip you have on it! Haven't tried chalk with it yet.  It can and does get slippery, especially when hands start to sweat a little with your body oils from you hands.Having some extra leftover Mebmik (AMAZON) rubber/silicone Grip Tape solved any problems of this handle becoming slippery. Once in a while it's a good idea to wipe off sweat and body oils from the grip tape with a little alcohol and paper towel, and it cleans that right up and it becomes super tacky again! And this grip tape lasts and lasts!!! AAMOF, I will be ordering more today just to have it around for future projects!! If you intend to do the full Kettlebell workout routines, then the cloth variety of Grip Tape would suit you better which helps with grip and comfort, but not tacky where your hands will stick to the handle more and you won't be able to swing the handle inside of your grip for snatches and the like!  Will also try one of the cloth grip tapes to experiment with!! I only for the time being had this extra silicone/rubber tape on hand!Hey SORRY about the Loooong *ss review. Just wanted to steer some of you in a good direction if your looking to save some money and don't care if you have the latest and greastest.And I guess I have way too much time on my hands and need to get a life!!!!Just sitting here staying out of trouble with that damn COVID and Rampant Crime still lurking out there!!!Best Regards and Good Luck to all!!!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 February 2023

review: This is the best-made Olympic-weight adjustable kettlebell handle that I have found. So far this thing handles everything that I put it through. title: Collars improved
review: This is a perfect addition to my existing 1" barbell set from the 1980s. The collars are improved to the star style for easier use. I believe the correct way to use them back to back, with the rubber rings facing each other, not the way it was depicted on the website. This will ensure the weights stay in place while you swing. The item weighs about 6.8 lbs on my scale. It will take about seven plates.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 September 2023

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: Good value and flexibility for a home gym
review: I’m all about saving space in my home gym, so I’ve been looking at many options for adjustable kettlebells. While there are other options that maybe more compact, the flexibility of using my Olympic plates to adjust weight is great.The diameter of the shaft where you add plates isn’t exactly 2” so the plates have wiggle room that can cause them to clatter a little. However, if you set the clamp tightly against the plates, it minimizes most motion, even with more dynamic motion like swings.It’s a little clunky to load and because of the extended length to accommodate plates, it can make certain exercises uncomfortable or challenging like when the weight rests against your arm in Turkish get ups.Overall, good value and compromise to save space and money in a home gym.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 November 2022

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: Works as good as expected.
review: This works great if you don't want to buy kettlebells but still be able to use them. I have 10lb and 5lb plates I use on this. The only issue is that the clamps spin undone depending on the exercise you're doing. When I do clean and press's on my right side it's fine, but when done on my left the weights spin the clamps loose. Not too big of a problem so long as you stay cognizant of it and don't allow it to get too loose. I've taken to using clamps from my dumbbells on it too, so I'll have literally five corkscrew clamps on this with 3 or 4 weight plates. That has limited it loosening up almost completely. Great product though.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 22 March 2023

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: Great adjustable kettlebell (and a tip if your collar is loosening!)
review: Great kettlebell handle. I bought it mainly to do progressive goblet squats and swings. If you already own a collection of plates (I bought the 1 inch/standard model) it is much cheaper than buying multiple kettlebells, especially if you don't know what size you want. Compared to my other kettlebells the handle is thinner in diameter (about 1 inch vs 1.5 inches or so on the kettlebells) but about the same in terms of width side to side (fits between your legs the same on the swings, not sure how to phrase it), so you actually get more room on the inside of the handle to fit your hands. The welds are a little sloppy, but that is my biggest complaint.Since some people are complaining about it coming loose, here's a tip!If you have never used a spin lock dumbell before, the best way to lock the collar in place is to hand tighten the plates first. Then you put the kettlebell on its side and roll it counter clockwise (to the left if you are holding the handle towards you). The plates will roll and catch the spinlock. After about a 1/4 roll they will be locked tight. This holds everything tight for 100+ swings with no loosening. In fact I sometimes have to knock the collar loose because I can't get it loose by hand after doing this. You don't even have to use the second collar provided with this method! Hope this helps somebody!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 December 2020

review: I wanted to start working with kettlebells, but I didn't want to buy a set of  them in various weights. This kettlebell handle is like an adjustable dumbbell - you adjust the weight by adding or subtracting weight plates. Since I already own several barbell/dumbbell weight plates, this device was the perfect solution for me.

The nuts loosen.If you’re just going to use it for relatively low action movements you’ll be fine but don’t do swings or you’ll manage some home demo in the process.

review: It's well made. Keep collars in place with a standard wire/bar clip.  A chair leg cup at the end of the thread prevents accidental mat, floor, or skin scratches.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 August 2023

prod_name: NewMe Fitness Adjustable Kettlebell Handle for Use with Weight Plates
title: Good for KB swings
review: This product is great for anyone who wants to do 10-20 reps KB swings ~125lbs and below. I have 50lbs on one right now with plenty of room, but I don't think I could fit more than 5 25 lbs plats without it feeling sketchy.There are three flaws with the product:1. The weights will slowly rotate loose. This isn't a problem, they don't come close to falling off, but I wouldn't want to do 100 reps on it without a locking mechanism.2. You can't put the "bell" flat on the ground as it is not flat on the ground.3. It's not appropriate to use this product for most other KB exercises as the plates may get in the way.Overall though, it is a good product for the money, and it is perfect for anyone looking to get into heavy swings.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 25 August 2021

prod_name: Under Armour Men's Armour HeatGear Compression Shorts
title: Atmungsaktiv und angenehm zu Tragen! Der Wolf im Schritt ist Geschicht
review: Die Under Armour Shorts haben sich bei Märschen als solide und funktionale Begleiter erwiesen.Das leichte und atmungsaktive Material der Shorts bietet angenehmen Tragekomfort, besonders bei längeren Märschen. Die Feuchtigkeitsregulierung ist effektiv, was dazu beiträgt, trocken und kühl zu bleiben, auch bei intensiver körperlicher Aktivität.Der Schnitt der Shorts ermöglicht eine gute Bewegungsfreiheit und verhindert Reibung an kritischen Stellen. Die strapazierfähige Verarbeitung des Materials hält den Anforderungen von Outdoor-Aktivitäten stand.Die Taschen der Shorts sind praktisch für die Aufbewahrung kleinerer Gegenstände während des Marsches. Der elastische Bund sorgt für eine bequeme Passform und erleichtert das An- und Ausziehen.Das Design der Shorts ist sportlich und ansprechend, was sie auch für Freizeitaktivitäten abseits der Marschstrecke geeignet macht.Insgesamt kann ich die Under Armour Shorts für Märsche empfehlen. Sie bieten Komfort, Funktionalität und sind eine gute Wahl für Outdoor-Aktivitäten, bei denen Bewegungsfreiheit und Feuchtigkeitsmanagement wichtig sind.

review: Die UA HG Armour Gym Sport Running Shorts von Under Armour haben sich als hervorragende Ausrüstung für mein Training erwiesen. Das Material ist dehnbar und passt sich allen Bewegungen an, ohne einzuschränken, was für dynamische Workouts unerlässlich ist. Der hohe Polyesteranteil sorgt für eine schnelle Trocknung und die Elasthan-Beimischung für eine perfekte Passform.Das Design mit dem großflächigen Logo ist ein echter Hingucker und bleibt auch nach mehrmaligem Waschen unverändert. Die Qualität des Stoffes und der Verarbeitung sind genau das, was man von einer Marke wie Under Armour erwartet: langlebig und zuverlässig.Nicht nur im Fitnessstudio, auch im Freien bieten die Shorts hohen Tragekomfort und halten auch intensiven Trainingseinheiten stand. Die Größenauswahl und die Passform entsprechen den Angaben, was bei Online-Bestellungen ein großer Pluspunkt ist. Abschließend lässt sich sagen, dass diese Shorts eine klare Empfehlung für alle sind, die Wert auf Qualität, Komfort und Stil legen.

review: I bought these after seeing them on Instagram (yeah, I'm easily influenced. lol.) They look and feel great. The material is snug but stretchy. They are a little too revealing for my conservative gym but they fit well under regular workout shorts. Braver men could wear them as outer wear, but they'd definitely draw attention. The side phone pocket is a nice feature if you ever wear pocketless shorts. I'd purchase again.

prod_name: Under Armour Men's Armour HeatGear Compression Shorts
title: Perfekte Passform und Qualität
review: Die Under Armour Herren UA HG Armour Gym Sport Running Shorts verkörpern für mich die Qualität und Wertigkeit, die die Marke Under Armour auszeichnet. Der Preis für diese Shorts ist angemessen und spiegelt die gebotene Leistung und Verarbeitung wider.Der Stoff der Shorts fühlt sich angenehm auf der Haut an und gewährleistet während des Trainings ein bequemes Tragegefühl. Die Qualität der Shorts ist evident, sowohl in der Materialauswahl als auch in der Verarbeitung.Hervorzuheben ist die perfekte Passform der Shorts, die sich optimal an den Körper schmiegt und uneingeschränkte Bewegungsfreiheit ermöglicht. Diese Eigenschaft ist besonders relevant, wenn die Shorts während verschiedenster sportlicher Aktivitäten wie im Fitnessstudio oder beim Laufen getragen werden.Die Vielseitigkeit der Shorts ist ein weiteres Highlight. Sie sind gleichermaßen geeignet für sportliche Betätigungen, das Training im Gym oder das Laufen im Freien. Ihre Qualität und Bequemlichkeit machen sie zur optimalen Wahl für all jene, die nach funktionaler und angenehm zu tragender Sportbekleidung suchen.Zusammenfassend empfehle ich die Under Armour Herren UA HG Armour Gym Sport Running Shorts aufgrund ihrer Qualität, optimalen Passform und Vielseitigkeit. Sie stellen eine lohnenswerte Investition dar für alle, die Sportkleidung suchen, die sowohl Komfort als auch Qualität vereint.

prod_name: Under Armour Men's Armour HeatGear Compression Shorts
title: Unbelievable.
review: I have been using amazon consistently for 5 years and this is my first time writing a review due to these shorts. I have been in the market for new compression shorts for years as i've been stuck with the ones i've had since high school (gross I know) but i've been super picky and fellas you know what I mean, you have to be. I've gone through/returned so many and different brands as well because they were too small/too big/too loose/too tight/uncomfortable/etc. you name it. You need high quality compression shorts so you're not constantly adjusting yourself in the gym/on a run/etc. These shorts are super high quality, perfect amount of stretch on the waist line as well as the area protecting the goods, perfect amount of compression without being uncomfortable. These shorts are absolutely perfect and i'm super happy to finally be able to throw away my torn-to-shreds old pairs. (I am 6'4 240lbs)

prod_name: Amonax Convertible Ab Wheel Roller
title: Aunque lo he usado poco, útil y estable.
review: He estado realizando poco ejercicio, pero lo poco que lo he usado tengo que decir que era estable y fácil de usar.Diseño portátil y liviano: Este rodillo de rueda es ideal para hacer ejercicio en casa o llevarlo al gimnasio. Su diseño compacto y liviano lo hace fácil de transportar y almacenar.Modo dual para todos los niveles: El soporte más ancho del rodillo abdominal brinda más estabilidad y control, especialmente útil para principiantes. Puedes desplazarte con confianza utilizando el robusto marco de rueda y la barra de metal sólido extra gruesa.Calidad superior y comodidad: Las rodilleras y asas están hechas de un material de esterilla de yoga premium conocido como TPE. Proporciona un soporte fuerte pero un toque suave, manteniéndote cómodo mientras trabajas en tu núcleo.Garantía de satisfacción: Ofrecen 2 años de garantía para garantizar el disfrute a largo plazo de tu compra. Si tienes preguntas o inquietudes, están disponibles para ayudarte.En resumen, el Rodillo de Rueda para Abdominales Amonax es una excelente opción para fortalecer tu núcleo y mejorar tu salud física. ¡Prepárate para lucir abdominales definidos! 💪🌟

prod_name: Amonax Convertible Ab Wheel Roller
title: Exercise roller
review: As per described,made of sturdy materials.I was a bit sceptical about the metal tube this comes with.However,it seems strong and easily holds over 150kg.The soft foam handles were easy to put on which is important when changing from double wheel to single wheel use.Overall a great product for the price!
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 February 2024

prod_name: Amonax Convertible Ab Wheel Roller
title: Trevlig
review: Skall inte ljuga och säga att jag använt den jättemycket, men materialet är rejält och handtaget är ett stålrör. Den håller gott och väl. Bra rull också.

prod_name: Amonax Convertible Ab Wheel Roller
title: Fenomenale, ma fate attenzione!!!
review: Parte integrante del potenziamento della palestra che ho a casa Ho deciso di comprare anche questo Ab roller che da molti è stato giudicato più che positivamente.Debbo dire che a parte l'iniziale scetticismo dopo i primi due giorni circa di allenamento ho cominciato effettivamente a sentire che i miei addominali diventavano sempre più duri e la pancia si appiattiva ad una velocità incredibile così colto dall'entusiasmo ho cominciato ad allenarmi tutti i giorni aumentando sempre di più le ripetizioni e il numero di serie.Purtroppo dopo circa tre settimane di utilizzo intensivo ho stirato il muscolo addominale inferiore sul lato sinistro cosa che conferma che questo tipo di attrezzo pone sotto grande sforzo la fascia addominale.In definitiva è estremamente utile e l'allenamento risulta efficiente ma non fate il mio stesso errore di esagerare colti dall'entusiasmo dei risultati.È possibile utilizzarlo con due ruote distanziate, due Ruote attaccate ed una sola ruota a seconda se vogliate operare con un livello di intensità regolare, avanzato oppure estremo.Utilissimo il tappetino in neoprene per le ginocchia incluso senza il quale l'allenamento risulterebbe doloroso.Voto 10.

prod_name: Amonax Convertible Ab Wheel Roller
title: Voir et expérimenter de bons résultats ...！
review: Bien construit et économique par rapport aux autres. L'article fonctionne comme annoncé: après avoir utilisé pendant 1,5 mois tous les (autres) jours à 20 tours, mes muscles de l'estomac se transforment. Une grande masse musculaire est maintenant visible juste en dessous de ma cage thoracique au-dessus de mon ventre! Je commence à voir des "contours" de 6 pack même avec mon mini pot ventre! De plus, je peux ressentir un resserrement dans mes bicepts qui me fait du bien. Je dois mentionner que l'endurance supplémentaire est maintenant ressentie pendant les moments privés, en particulier les missionnaires (pour dire le moins) - j'ai l'impression de recevoir un coup de pouce supplémentaire de ma zone principale pour continuer. Lol. Je prévois définitivement d'utiliser quotidiennement, surtout que la douleur musculaire initiale a disparu. Aimer le produit!Bien construit et économique par rapport aux autres. prod_name: Amonax Convertible Ab Wheel Roller
title: "Magischer Bauchroller: Das Ultimative Fitness-Zauberwerkzeug!"
review: Der Amonax Bauchroller ist zweifellos ein Game-Changer für alle, die ihre Bauchmuskeln auf magische Weise formen möchten! Egal, ob Sie ein Anfänger oder ein Fortgeschrittener sind, dieses Set ist einfach zu verwenden und liefert beeindruckende Ergebnisse.Die rutschfeste Konstruktion sorgt für Stabilität und Sicherheit während des Trainings, was besonders für Anfänger beruhigend ist. Aber auch Fortgeschrittene werden die Herausforderung und den Komfort zu schätzen wissen, den dieser Bauchroller bietet.Was diesen Bauchtrainer wirklich auszeichnet, ist der Spaßfaktor! Mit jedem Einsatz fühlt es sich eher wie ein Zaubertrick als ein Training an. Die glatte Bewegung und das effektive Training machen es schwer, den Amonax Bauchroller nicht zu lieben.Fazit: Dieses Produkt verdient ohne Zweifel fünf Sterne. Es ist nicht nur ein effektives Fitnessgerät, sondern auch ein unterhaltsames Werkzeug, um Ihre Bauchmuskeln zu stählen und Ihren Körper zu transformieren.

prod_name: Amonax Convertible Ab Wheel Roller
title: Spaß beim Bauchmuskeltraining - Mein Erlebnis mit dem Quietschenden Bauchroller
review: Liebe Fitnessbegeisterte,ich möchte meine Erfahrungen mit dem quietschenden Bauchroller teilen, den ich kürzlich in mein Trainingsrepertoire aufgenommen habe. Dieses originelle Trainingsgerät hat nicht nur meine Bauchmuskulatur gestärkt, sondern auch eine unterhaltsame Note zu meinen Workouts hinzugefügt.Effektives Bauchmuskeltraining (5/5): Dieser Bauchroller mag quietschen, aber er bedeutet ernsthaftes Geschäft, wenn es um das Bauchmuskeltraining geht. Die Rollbewegung aktiviert die Bauchmuskeln auf intensive Weise und ermöglicht ein effektives Training, das spürbare Ergebnisse liefert.Quietschendes Vergnügen (4/5): Das quietschende Geräusch des Rollers bei der Bewegung verleiht dem Training eine spaßige Note. Es motiviert mich, die Übungen konsequent durchzuführen und sorgt für eine unterhaltsame Atmosphäre beim Workout. Allerdings könnte das Quietschen für manche Menschen etwas laut sein.Kompaktes Design und Handhabung (4/5): Der Bauchroller ist kompakt und leicht zu verstauen, was ihn ideal für das Heimtraining macht. Die Griffe sind ergonomisch geformt und bieten einen guten Halt während der Übungen. Eine zusätzliche Polsterung könnte den Komfort weiter verbessern.Stabilität und Qualität (4/5): Der Bauchroller ist aus hochwertigem Material gefertigt und fühlt sich stabil an. Er trägt mein Gewicht ohne Probleme und hat bisher gut gehalten. Allerdings könnte die Qualität der Rollen etwas verbessert werden, um ein noch geschmeidigeres Rollen zu ermöglichen.Gesamteindruck (4/5): Der quietschende Bauchroller hat meine Trainingsroutine aufgefrischt und für ein unterhaltsames Workout gesorgt. Die Kombination aus Effektivität und Spaß macht ihn zu einem interessanten Trainingsgerät für alle, die ihre Bauchmuskeln stärken wollen.Fazit: Die Anschaffung dieses quietschenden Bauchrollers war eine Entscheidung für Abwechslung und Effizienz. Er bringt Schwung in mein Bauchmuskeltraining und sorgt dafür, dass ich mich auf meine Workouts freue. Wenn Sie nach einer unterhaltsamen Möglichkeit suchen, Ihre Bauchmuskeln zu trainieren, sollten Sie diesen quietschenden Bauchroller definitiv in Betracht ziehen.

prod_name: Amonax Convertible Ab Wheel Roller

Die Qualität des Bauchrollers ist für den Preis angemessen. title: Ausgezeichneter Bauchmuskeltrainer für effektives Bauchmuskeltraining
review: Der Amonax Bauchroller funktioniert so gut, dass ich ihn kürzlich gekauft habe. Als jemand, der regelmäßig Bauchmuskeltraining macht, suchte ich nach einem qualitativ hochwertigen Bauchmuskeltrainer, der meine Erwartungen erfüllen würde. Außerdem muss ich sagen, dass dieser Bauchroller ihre Erwartungen vollständig übertroffen hat.Die erstklassige Qualität des Produkts war das erste, was mir auffiel. Der Bauchroller ist hochwertig verarbeitet und hat eine hohe Stabilität. Es fühlt sich robust und langlebig an, was mir Vertrauen gibt, dass es lange halten wird. Die Räder sind stabil und können auf verschiedenen Oberflächen sanft rollen.Die rutschfeste Oberfläche der Griffe ist ein weiterer großer Vorteil. Dies hilft mir, während des Trainings fest zu halten und meine Hände nicht abzurutschen. Dadurch kann ich mich voll und ganz auf die Übung konzentrieren, ohne mir Sorgen um meine Sicherheit machen zu müssen.Die mitgelieferte Knieauflage ist sehr gut gepolstert und sorgt für einen angenehmen Komfort während des Trainings. Bei ähnlichen Übungen hatte ich zuvor Knieschmerzen, aber diese Matte hat einen großen Unterschied gemacht. Ich kann ohne Probleme trainieren, da meine Knie gut geschützt sind.Der Amonax Bauchroller hat meine Erwartungen in Bezug auf die Leistung erfüllt. Das Rollen ist reibungslos und gleichmäßig, und ich fühle bei jeder Wiederholung eine intensive Belastung meiner Bauchmuskeln. Nach kurzer Zeit konnte ich meine Bauchmuskelkraft und -definition verbessern.Da der Bauchroller anpassbar ist, passt er sowohl Männern als auch Frauen. Die Schwierigkeitsstufe kann je nach Fitnessniveau angepasst werden, was es sowohl für Anfänger als auch für erfahrene Sportler geeignet macht.Zusammenfassend empfehle ich den Amonax Bauchroller wärmstens. Er ist hochwertig, bequem und ermöglicht effektives Training der Bauchmuskeln. Den Amonax Bauchroller sollten Sie definitiv in Betracht ziehen, wenn Sie nach einem zuverlässigen Bauchmuskeltrainer suchen.

prod_name: Amonax Convertible Ab Wheel Roller
title: Muy útil
review: Es el típico rodillo para trabajar abdominales/core, muy fácil de usar y desde el primer momento notarás que se están ejercitando los músculos. Eso sí, cuidado con la ejecución, porque aunque sea simple no es un aparato recomendado para quien se acaba de iniciar en el mundo el "fitness", y aun así es recomendable ver algún vídeo de cómo se debe utilizar (ya que no recuerdo que en la caja se especificase como se debía hacer, e inconscientemente todos lo hacemos mal a la primera).Por otra parte, no es difícil de montar, pero tampoco es algo super sencillo. En mi caso las ruedas chirrían un montón, no se si es porque se montó de mala manera, pero no sería lo idóneo para quienes lo quieren usar  y no molestar a terceras personas.Por último, el precio está muy bien, pero si no quieres la alfombrilla que te viene (porque ya dispones de una en casa), hay otros rodillos más baratos que solo ofrecen el producto en sí, es decir lo que interesa (el rodillo), como puede ser el de Decathlon.

prod_name: Amonax Convertible Ab Wheel Roller
title: Basic abs roller
review: This is a basic abs roller; does the job without breaking the bank. By basic I mean quality is not great; easy to construct and only time will tell how long it will last. Good product advert, though would not have paid the original claimed price.

prod_name: MALOOW Portable Pilates Exercise Bar Kit with Adjustable Resistance Bands
title: It's neat, but the resistance bands are pretty loose
review: LIKED:I've always wanted to try Pilates but I didn't want to go to an actual class and spend the money for it. So, I bought this bar. So it's nice to have it because you can do this within the privacy of your home especially if you are the type of person who doesn't like to go do this stuff in public. Or any exercise in public. It was really easy to put together and I think for the price it was pretty decent.DISLIKED:However, the resistance bands are pretty soft. What I mean by that is that there's not enough resistance when you use the bands.Now, I've never done Pilates before so I don't know if the bands or cables that they have on their machines are like this. Maybe someone else can answer that question. And it feels like they could snap if I did something the wrong way as someone doing Pilates for the first time.SUMMARY:Easy to assemble, good price, resistance bands feel pretty weak and they could offer different durability options for the resistant bands.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 November 2022

Not only that but it comes with 2 sets of weight bands, one set is 20 lbs and the other one is 30 which is great compare to other similar products which only come with one set.Overall, i would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for new equipment to add to their workouts

title: Good Choice!

prod_name: MALOOW Portable Pilates Exercise Bar Kit with Adjustable Resistance Bands
title: I’m 6-1 and height wise this good for me but….not resistance wise
review: Update:To get better resistance I use BOTH bands and wrap them around each other 3 or 4 times.As stated in the title I am 6-1 so unlike everyone else under my height I didn’t have the problem with the bands being too long. However, like other reviews state the resistance wasn’t enough for me and did try with both bands and it sure didn’t feel like much at all. I know it’s not because I’ve been working out for a long time because at this point and time it’s been a week since I started anything! I know my strength isn’t “THAT” built up hahahaha.Pros:Easy to assembleGood for my tall selfCons:Not enough resistanceHard to disassemble…as pictured I tried.Pushed in the buttons couldn’t get it apart and tried to gently push back the pink foam only to tear it. Used clear packing tape to secure it and keep it from further tearingRecommendations:Once assembled accept its assembled and store accordinglyIdeal for someone on the taller sideNot a lot of resistance consider looking for separate and compatible bands or going elsewhere entirely
date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 October 2021

I tried tying knots on each band to create more resistance but it barely worked and is aesthetically not just a pretty look. I find the crossing the bands and putting it on the opposite foot creates a little bit more resistance, but overall I hate that I have to work around the product rather than work with it. Good price, good concept, just poor execution on the resistance bands. 5/10

prod_name: Lifeline Jungle Gym Suspension Trainer
title: NA
review: I all ready own an ATX ( bit like a Trx). However this is too bulky and damages doors. The Jungle gym is lighter, doesn't damage doors and the straps are a lot longer. So if you have to use a door like I do, you can reach all the way down to the floor to do a chest press. Compare that with the TRX or ATX  which you need to add extension straps. Also the grip part of the  handles has resistance which make workouts a little harder (in a good way ). Some suspension trainers have too loose a grip or just solid. The foot straps don't get in the way like some people have mentioned. The other thing which I find useful is that you can alter the distance of the anchors due to the straps being independent of one another.

prod_name: Lifeline Jungle Gym Suspension Trainer
title: NA
review: I got it on time and the quality of the material and finishing stands out. Jungle Gym XT was recommended by a friend who has been using suspension trainers for the past 30 years. His has lasted for >15 years now and he is a serious exerciser. Comes with a convenient chart to help beginners and videos are easily accessible on site as well as in you tube. Overall, worth the money.

prod_name: Lifeline Jungle Gym Suspension Trainer
title: Fun, versatile, good price, make it as hard as you want
review: This review is from: Lifeline USA Jungle Gym XTThe title says it:  You'll do suspension training because it's fun; the Jungle GYm XT is designed to be versatile; the price is half of the overhyped main competitor; and you can easily vary the exercises to kick your a** as much or little as you want. Something about people makes exercise more fun for us when WE'RE moving, not the weight, the stationary bike wheel, whatever. With the XT, it's just fun to swing around and be getting stronger and flexible and be working ALL your muscle groupls including your core. Good DVD and sheet included; then go online and easily find many dozens of new movements you didn't even know existed.The Jungle Gym XT itself is well planned and built, has better split design than the TRX (which is twice the price); has better footstraps; has more durable handgrips, has incredibly well-executed (and quick adjusting)cam locks to lengthen and shorten the straps. It's just a well thought-out and well-built product.  (I also bought the Lifeline wall-mount kit from Amazon for $24.50 (less than the competition) and that worked well to mount this to my exposed ceiling joists in the basement. It's a very good design, like the whole system.)My advice? Buy the Jungle Gym XT, it will motivate you! Start conservatively, make sure your muscles and joints can take it, stay safe; and then gradually work your way up in difficulty with all muscle groups -- including the core. And feel free to come up with movements you enjoy; that's part of the fun of this apparatus.Bottom line: I've been weight training almost 10 years, getting gradually stuck in a rut, and the XT has me excited to be exercising again. Can't give a much better recommendation than that.

prod_name: Lifeline Jungle Gym Suspension Trainer
title: High quality. Intelligent design.
review: Split straps gives comfortable excercise. Albows and shoulders have room.

prod_name: Lifeline Jungle Gym Suspension Trainer
title: Overall great product at a great price!
review: Great product overall, and a fraction of the coat of some other brands out there. I really like the fact that the foot cradles aren't floppy material, but rather a stiffer silicone type material. This makes it much easier to place my feet in the cradles when doing core and other floor exercises.  Also, you can literally take it anywhere and hook it up anywhere. Very easy to use and effective workout. I'm glad that I purchased this product.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 December 2012

prod_name: Lifeline Jungle Gym Suspension Trainer
title: Buena calidad

prod_name: Lifeline Jungle Gym Suspension Trainer
title: Buena calidad y funciona
review: Ahora que los gyms están cerrados, es una muy buena opción para hacer ejercicio. Yo lo paso por atrás de un árbol afuera de la casa ya que en las puertas no me da confianza que aguante mi peso el marco de la puerta. No es un sistema de ligas por lo cuál no se va aflojando, funciona con tu peso y con tu inclinación. Son cuerdas rígidas, se ven muy bien hechas, da confianza soltarle todo tu peso a esas cuerdas.Es el competidor del TRX, sin haber tenido el TRX pude ver que dicen que el Jungle Gym tiene mejores agarraderas y en efecto son muy buenas, además que son de un material rígido por lo cuál es fácil limpiarlas. Me parece que dicen que las del TRX son como de material más acojinado y pues se va guardando ahí el sudor si tienes el TRX.Elegí el Jungle Gym porque es significativamente más barato que el TRX y estoy muy contento con mi compra.

prod_name: Lifeline Jungle Gym Suspension Trainer
title: Flexible and a must
review: Bought these to help/aid with shoulder operation recovery

prod_name: Lifeline Jungle Gym Suspension Trainer
title: Jungle Gym XT
review: OverviewThe Jungle Gym XT is a versitile, portable, durable piece of equipment, it is good for home workouts and can be adapted to work with P90X style routines.Because you are working against gravity with your own body-weight you get a very natural workout that can be very challenging. The Jungle Gym XT could be used on it's own for a full body workout but through my experience works best when incorporated into an exercise routine with free weights, resistance bands, machines and other body-weight exercises.Pro's & Con's of the Jungle Gym XT-Pro-Extremely durable & well built-Pro-Compatible with resistance bands/free weights/body-weight exercises/P90X-Pro-Improves core strength & overall conditioning-Pro-Cheaper than other suspension trainers but just as good (or better)-Pro-Foot Loops are more easily accessible than other suspension trainers-Con-Portable but not as portable as TRX brand-Con-Does not come with a mounting kit, but a door frame/tree/pull-up bar/etc, would workThe Exercises-Core exercises such as knee tucks will work your core better than traditional crunches or sit ups because your legs are suspended as you control your bodies weight in motion. Or you could plant your feet on the ground and suspended your upper body  for oblique twists.-Leg exercises such as the 1 legged lunge or 1 legged squat are good, but you need balance and coordination and a basic level of fitness to perform. This is also a good warmup exercise for weight training exercises like squats and leg presses.-The hamstring curl is a good leg exercise that also works your core in addition to your hamstrings.-Back exercises such as rows and pull-ups work perfectly on the Jungle Gym XT and the possibilites are endless as you can change your hands position, your bodies elevation, and the width of the handles.-Chest exercises (and dips) are difficult on the Jungle Gym XT because you have to stabilize your body as you press up which is challenging but works the stablilizer muscles well. (If you cannot do push-ups off the ground I would not recommend the Jungle Gym XT pushups as they are more difficult).-Both bicep curls and triceps extensions are great on the Jungle Gym XT, the closer you get to the ground the harder the exercise gets.-Shoulder pulls and rear deltoid lateral raises on the Jungle Gym XT are good exercises but I prefer resistance bands and dumbbells as it feels more natural. If you can work up to hand stand push-ups this is a serious shoulder building exercise but is not for the novice exerciser.In ConclusionThe Jungle Gym XT on it's own can get old quickly if you use it regularly on it's own, but when used in conjunction with other forms of exercise such as resistance training & cardio the Jungle Gym XT is a great way to enhance or add to a pre-existing workout. If you are just getting into fitness I would recommend purchasing resistance bands or dumbbells first as the skill level for the Jungle Gym XT is a little higher and the number of exercises that can be done with bands and dumbbells is a little more comprehensive.

prod_name: Lifeline Jungle Gym Suspension Trainer
title: Great!
review: Great quality and versatile.. great for home gym, would recommend!
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 January 2021

prod_name: Lifeline Jungle Gym Suspension Trainer
title: Mucho mejor que TRX
review: Excelente producto, super práctico y a mi parecer mejor calidad que TRX con la ventaja de que cada handle es independiente lo que te da muchísimas ventjas e ideal para viajar. Me gusó más que mi TRX y a un precio mucho menor
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 March 2012

prod_name: Lifeline Jungle Gym Suspension Trainer
title: We did go on vacation camping all summer and were disappointed because it soo hard finding a good anchor point
review: Just wow!!  I got scared buying trx online because of all the fakes. But i read on this one. I live it. We have a smith machine with bench and poulies. We put those on the bar of the smith machine. We have used it on doors but i feel that our hinges are not enough to handle our weight. We did go on vacation camping all summer and were disappointed because it soo hard finding a good anchor point. The trx probably beats this because it does not need to have parallel locations. Its one anchor point. So not really if you are in the woods. In the city easy!!  Any park will do.  I do love the ease of use. I did hate that no instructions other then a poster. Reallly!!!  I bought the trx app and did not regret it. So for the price i love it.  Does it work. Umm. Yes!!!!!  But not for befinners if u have no core strength at all. Be careful of some positions were u will bend overbend your back or stretch wrong ways. Its easy to lose balance.. if u use the trx app start level one and stay there all the way.  But this is true for any exercise using belts.  So all in all excellent buy. As serious as trx but way cheaper. Love the quality and feel.  Good buy
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 April 2020
